flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="a355cba3-cefe-4e09-9600-92b11993a687" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="170">Removing a database in MySQL is a potentially destructive action that should be performed with care to avoid accidental data loss. Heres how to safely remove a database:</p><hr data-start="172" data-end="175"><h3 data-start="177" data-end="218"><strong data-start="181" data-end="218">Steps to Safely Remove a Database</strong></h3><h4 data-start="220" data-end="256"><strong data-start="225" data-end="256">1. Verify the Database Name</strong></h4><ul data-start="257" data-end="431"><li data-start="257" data-end="357">Double-check the name of the database you want to delete to ensure you dont delete the wrong one.</li><li data-start="358" data-end="431">You can list all databases to confirm:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="401" data-end="431"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> DATABASES;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><hr data-start="433" data-end="436"><h4 data-start="438" data-end="469"><strong data-start="443" data-end="469">2. Backup the Database</strong></h4><ul data-start="470" data-end="765"><li data-start="470" data-end="697"><p data-start="472" data-end="582">Always create a backup of the database before dropping it. Use the <code data-start="539" data-end="550">mysqldump</code> utility or another backup tool.</p><p data-start="588" data-end="613">Example with <code data-start="601" data-end="612">mysqldump</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="616" data-end="697"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>mysqldump -u username -p database_name &gt; backup_database_name.sql
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="698" data-end="765"><p data-start="700" data-end="765">Verify that the backup is complete and stored in a safe location.</p></li></ul><hr data-start="767" data-end="770"><h4 data-start="772" data-end="808"><strong data-start="777" data-end="808">3. Check Active Connections</strong></h4><ul data-start="809" data-end="1087"><li data-start="809" data-end="1087"><p data-start="811" data-end="947">Ensure no active connections are using the database. Dropping a database while its in use can lead to errors or unpredictable behavior.</p><p data-start="951" data-end="972">To check connections:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="975" data-end="1007"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> PROCESSLIST;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1011" data-end="1050">Kill active connections (if necessary):</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1053" data-end="1087"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>KILL connection_id;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><hr data-start="1089" data-end="1092"><h4 data-start="1094" data-end="1144"><strong data-start="1099" data-end="1144">4. Use <code data-start="1108" data-end="1119">IF EXISTS</code> Clause to Avoid Errors</strong></h4><ul data-start="1145" data-end="1320"><li data-start="1145" data-end="1320"><p data-start="1147" data-end="1252">When dropping a database, include the <code data-start="1185" data-end="1196">IF EXISTS</code> clause to avoid an error if the database doesnt exist.</p><p data-start="1256" data-end="1264">Example:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1267" data-end="1320"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DROP</span> DATABASE IF <span class="hljs-keyword">EXISTS</span> database_name;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><hr data-start="1322" data-end="1325"><h4 data-start="1327" data-end="1358"><strong data-start="1332" data-end="1358">5. Execute the Command</strong></h4><ul data-start="1359" data-end="1550"><li data-start="1359" data-end="1550"><p data-start="1361" data-end="1492">Execute the <code data-start="1373" data-end="1388">DROP DATABASE</code> statement carefully. This action is irreversible and permanently deletes the database and all its data.</p><p data-start="1496" data-end="1504">Example:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1507" data-end="1550"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DROP</span> DATABASE database_name;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><hr data-start="1552" data-end="1555"><h4 data-start="1557" data-end="1588"><strong data-start="1562" data-end="1588">6. Verify the Deletion</strong></h4><ul data-start="1589" data-end="1692"><li data-start="1589" data-end="1692">Confirm that the database has been removed by listing all databases:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1662" data-end="1692"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> DATABASES;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><hr data-start="1694" data-end="1697"><h4 data-start="1699" data-end="1735"><strong data-start="1704" data-end="1735">7. Check for Residual Files</strong></h4><ul data-start="1736" data-end="1935"><li data-start="1736" data-end="1935">In some cases, MySQL might leave behind residual files. Check the data directory for any leftover files and clean them up if needed.<ul data-start="1873" data-end="1935"><li data-start="1873" data-end="1935">On Linux, the data directory is typically <code data-start="1917" data-end="1934">/var/lib/mysql/</code>.</li></ul></li></ul><hr data-start="1937" data-end="1940"><h4 data-start="1942" data-end="1985"><strong data-start="1947" data-end="1985">8. Audit and Document the Deletion</strong></h4><ul data-start="1986" data-end="2133"><li data-start="1986" data-end="2048">Keep a record of the database removal for auditing purposes.</li><li data-start="2049" data-end="2133">Note the reason for deletion, the backup location, and the command execution date.</li></ul><hr data-start="2135" data-end="2138"><h3 data-start="2140" data-end="2164"><strong data-start="2144" data-end="2164">Example Workflow</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2165" data-end="2397"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-comment">-- Step 1: Verify the database exists</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> DATABASES;

<span class="hljs-comment">-- Step 2: Backup the database (use mysqldump)</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">-- Step 3: Drop the database safely</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">DROP</span> DATABASE IF <span class="hljs-keyword">EXISTS</span> old_database;

<span class="hljs-comment">-- Step 4: Confirm deletion</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> DATABASES;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="2399" data-end="2402"><h3 data-start="2404" data-end="2427"><strong data-start="2408" data-end="2427">Important Notes</strong></h3><ul data-start="2428" data-end="2764"><li data-start="2428" data-end="2531"><strong data-start="2430" data-end="2453">Irreversible Action</strong>: Once a database is dropped, it cannot be recovered unless you have a backup.</li><li data-start="2532" data-end="2635"><strong data-start="2534" data-end="2549">Permissions</strong>: Ensure you have appropriate privileges (<code data-start="2591" data-end="2597">DROP</code> privilege) to perform this operation.</li><li data-start="2636" data-end="2764"><strong data-start="2638" data-end="2653">Environment</strong>: Be extra cautious when working in production environments. Double-check the database name and connected host.</li></ul><p data-start="2766" data-end="2881" data-is-last-node="">By following these steps, you can safely remove a MySQL database while minimizing the risk of accidental data loss.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 It connects to a MySQL database and inserts the prime number and its index as they are identified.</p><h3 data-start="195" data-end="213">Key Additions:</h3><ol data-start="214" data-end="636"><li data-start="251" data-end="403">You need to replace placeholders (<code data-start="287" data-end="302">your_username</code>, <code data-start="304" data-end="319">your_password</code>, <code data-start="321" data-end="336">your_database</code>) in the <code data-start="345" data-end="356">db_config</code> dictionary with your actual MySQL credentials.</li></ul></li><li data-start="405" data-end="511"><p data-start="408" data-end="442"><strong data-start="408" data-end="441"><code data-start="410" data-end="430">insert_prime_to_db</code> Function</strong>:</p><ul data-start="446" data-end="511"><li data-start="446" data-end="511">This function handles inserting primes into the <code data-start="496" data-end="504">Primes</code> table.</li></ul></li><li data-start="513" Specifically the data type and any other differences between this data field and others that a user might speicify</div><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-full top-0 -mr-3.5 hidden pr-5 pt-1 [.group\/conversation-turn:hover_&amp;]:block"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button aria-label="Edit message" class="flex h-9 w-9 items-center justify-center rounded-full focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-27" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="b0b3dd29-a07d-4b25-bdd4-d4a9bc6c2406" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="201">When designing primary keys in MySQL, there are several best practices to follow to ensure they are efficient, reliable, and maintainable. Heres a breakdown of the key considerations for primary keys:</p><hr data-start="203" data-end="206"><h3 data-start="208" data-end="245"><strong data-start="212" data-end="245">1. Data Type for Primary Keys</strong></h3><p data-start="246" data-end="338">The choice of data type for primary keys is critical for performance and storage efficiency:</p><h4 data-start="340" data-end="365"><strong data-start="345" data-end="365">Best Data Types:</strong></h4><ul data-start="366" data-end="647"><li data-start="366" data-end="647"><strong data-start="368" data-end="389"><code data-start="370" data-end="375">INT</code> or <code data-start="379" data-end="387">BIGINT</code></strong>:<ul data-start="393" data-end="647"><li data-start="393" data-end="471">Use <code data-start="399" data-end="404">INT</code> for most cases where the range (up to ~2.1 billion) is sufficient.</li><li data-start="474" data-end="564">Use <code data-start="480" data-end="488">BIGINT</code> if you expect the range to exceed <code data-start="523" data-end="528">INT</code> limits (e.g., very large datasets).</li><li data-start="567" data-end="647">Use <code data-start="573" data-end="583">UNSIGNED</code> to double the positive range if negative values are not needed.</li></ul></li></ul><h4 data-start="649" data-end="681"><strong data-start="654" data-end="681">Avoid These Data Types:</strong></h4><ul data-start="682" data-end="1113"><li data-start="682" data-end="804"><strong data-start="684" data-end="707"><code data-start="686" data-end="695">VARCHAR</code> or <code data-start="699" data-end="705">CHAR</code></strong>:<ul data-start="711" data-end="804"><li data-start="711" data-end="804">Strings as primary keys can be inefficient due to their larger size and slower comparisons.</li></ul></li><li data-start="805" data-end="910"><strong data-start="807" data-end="830"><code data-start="809" data-end="816">FLOAT</code> or <code data-start="820" data-end="828">DOUBLE</code></strong>:<ul data-start="834" data-end="910"><li data-start="834" data-end="910">Floating-point numbers are imprecise and not recommended for primary keys.</li></ul></li><li data-start="911" data-end="1113"><strong data-start="913" data-end="931">Composite Keys</strong>:<ul data-start="935" data-end="1113"><li data-start="935" data-end="1113">While technically valid, composite keys (multiple columns combined) can make indexing and querying less efficient. Instead, use a surrogate key (e.g., an auto-increment <code data-start="1106" data-end="1111">INT</code>).</li></ul></li></ul><hr data-start="1115" data-end="1118"><h3 data-start="1120" data-end="1154"><strong data-start="1124" data-end="1154">2. Uniqueness and Non-NULL</strong></h3><ul data-start="1155" data-end="1254"><li data-start="1155" data-end="1254">A primary key must be unique and cannot contain <code data-start="1205" data-end="1211">NULL</code> values. MySQL enforces this automatically.</li></ul><hr data-start="1256" data-end="1259"><h3 data-start="1261" data-end="1286"><strong data-start="1265" data-end="1286">3. Auto-Increment</strong></h3><ul data-start="1287" data-end="1531"><li data-start="1287" data-end="1391">Use the <code data-start="1297" data-end="1313">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> attribute for numeric primary keys to ensure they are sequentially generated.</li><li data-start="1392" data-end="1531">Example:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1405" data-end="1531"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> Users (
    id <span class="hljs-type">INT</span> UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-keyword">PRIMARY</span> KEY,
    username <span class="hljs-type">VARCHAR</span>(<span class="hljs-number">50</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>
);
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><h4 data-start="1533" data-end="1569"><strong data-start="1538" data-end="1569">Benefits of Auto-Increment:</strong></h4><ul data-start="1570" data-end="1654"><li data-start="1570" data-end="1611">Guarantees a unique value for each row.</li><li data-start="1612" data-end="1654">Avoids issues with manual ID assignment.</li></ul><h4 data-start="1656" data-end="1680"><strong data-start="1661" data-end="1680">Considerations:</strong></h4><ul data-start="1681" data-end="1782"><li data-start="1681" data-end="1782">Avoid exposing auto-increment IDs to the public in sensitive applications (e.g., user IDs in URLs).</li></ul><hr data-start="1784" data-end="1787"><h3 data-start="1789" data-end="1808"><strong data-start="1793" data-end="1808">4. Indexing</strong></h3><ul data-start="1809" data-end="1940"><li data-start="1809" data-end="1940">MySQL automatically creates a unique, clustered index on the primary key. This makes queries on the primary key highly efficient.</li></ul><hr data-start="1942" data-end="1945"><h3 data-start="1947" data-end="1969"><strong data-start="1951" data-end="1969">5. Consistency</strong></h3><ul data-start="1970" data-end="2106"><li data-start="1970" data-end="2106">Ensure all tables follow a consistent pattern for primary keys (e.g., use <code data-start="2046" data-end="2050">id</code> as the column name with <code data-start="2075" data-end="2104">INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT</code>).</li></ul><hr data-start="2108" data-end="2111"><h3 data-start="2113" data-end="2159"><strong data-start="2117" data-end="2159">6. Use Surrogate Keys vs. Natural Keys</strong></h3><ul data-start="2160" data-end="2505"><li data-start="2160" data-end="2289"><strong data-start="2162" data-end="2179">Surrogate Key</strong>: A system-generated key (e.g., <code data-start="2211" data-end="2227">AUTO_INCREMENT</code>). Preferred for most cases due to simplicity and consistency.</li><li data-start="2290" data-end="2505"><strong data-start="2292" data-end="2307">Natural Key</strong>: A key derived from business data (e.g., email or username). Avoid using natural keys unless:<ul data-start="2404" data-end="2505"><li data-start="2404" data-end="2447">The value is truly unique and unchanging.</li><li data-start="2450" data-end="2505">The size is small (e.g., a 2-character country code).</li></ul></li></ul><hr data-start="2507" data-end="2510"><h3 data-start="2512" data-end="2550"><strong data-start="2516" data-end="2550">7. Avoid Updating Primary Keys</strong></h3><ul data-start="2551" data-end="2680"><li data-start="2551" data-end="2680">Primary keys should be immutable. Changing a primary key can disrupt indexes, foreign key relationships, and application logic.</li></ul><hr data-start="2682" data-end="2685"><h3 data-start="2687" data-end="2723"><strong data-start="2691" data-end="2723">8. Foreign Key Relationships</strong></h3><ul data-start="2724" data-end="2851"><li data-start="2724" data-end="2851">Use the same data type and attributes (e.g., <code data-start="2771" data-end="2781">UNSIGNED</code>) for foreign keys referencing a primary key to avoid type mismatches.</li></ul><hr data-start="2853" data-end="2856"><h3 data-start="2858" data-end="2881"><strong data-start="2862" data-end="2881">9. Partitioning</strong></h3><ul data-start="2882" data-end="3000"><li data-start="2882" data-end="3000">If partitioning is required, ensure the primary key includes the partition key to maintain proper data distribution.</li></ul><hr data-start="3002" data-end="3005"><h3 data-start="3007" data-end="3041"><strong data-start="3011" data-end="3041">10. Avoid Large Data Types</strong></h3><ul data-start="3042" data-end="3129"><li data-start="3042" data-end="3129">Keep primary key columns small to reduce the size of indexes and improve performance.</li></ul><hr data-start="3131" data-end="3134"><h3 data-start="3136" data-end="3179">Example of a Well-Designed Primary Key:</h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3180" data-end="3344"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> Orders (
    order_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span> UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-keyword">PRIMARY</span> KEY,
    customer_id <span class="hljs-type">INT</span> UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>,
    order_date DATETIME <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>
);
</span></code></div></div></pre><h3 data-start="3346" data-end="3405">Key Differences Between Primary Keys and Other Columns:</h3><ol data-start="3406" data-end="3731"><li data-start="3406" data-end="3463"><strong data-start="3409" data-end="3423">Uniqueness</strong>: The primary key must always be unique.</li><li data-start="3464" data-end="3538"><strong data-start="3467" data-end="3479">Indexing</strong>: MySQL automatically creates an index for the primary key.</li><li data-start="3539" data-end="3648"><strong data-start="3542" data-end="3554">Non-NULL</strong>: Primary keys cannot contain <code data-start="3584" data-end="3590">NULL</code> values, unlike other columns unless explicitly specified.</li><li data-start="3649" data-end="3731"><strong data-start="3652" data-end="3665">Data Type</strong>: Primary keys typically use numeric types optimized for indexing.</li></ol><p data-start="3733" data-end="3851" data-is-last-node="">By adhering to these best practices, you can ensure your database design is efficient, scalable, and easy to maintain.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-end="61">To change a password for a user in MySQL, follow these steps:</p><hr data-start="63" data-end="66"><h3 data-start="68" data-end="94"><strong data-start="72" data-end="94">1. Log in to MySQL</strong></h3><p data-start="95" data-end="145">Use the MySQL client or any MySQL management tool:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="146" data-end="174"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>mysql -u root -p
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="175" data-end="213">Enter the root password when prompted.</p><hr data-start="215" data-end="218"><h3 data-start="220" data-end="280"><strong data-start="224" data-end="280">2. Use the Appropriate Method to Change the Password</strong></h3><h4 data-start="282" data-end="362"><strong data-start="287" data-end="362">a. Using the <code data-start="302" data-end="314">ALTER USER</code> Command (Preferred for MySQL 5.7.6 and Later)</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="363" data-end="432"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">USER</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'host'</span> IDENTIFIED <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> <span class="hljs-string">'new_password'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="433" data-end="631"><li data-start="433" data-end="478">Replace <code data-start="443" data-end="453">username</code> with the MySQL username.</li><li data-start="479" data-end="579">Replace <code data-start="489" data-end="495">host</code> with the host from which the user connects (e.g., <code data-start="546" data-end="557">localhost</code> or <code data-start="561" data-end="564">%</code> for any host).</li><li data-start="580" data-end="631">Replace <code data-start="590" data-end="604">new_password</code> with the desired password.</li></ul><p data-start="633" data-end="641">Example:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="642" data-end="714"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">USER</span> <span class="hljs-string">'john'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span> IDENTIFIED <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> <span class="hljs-string">'SecureP@ssw0rd'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="716" data-end="719"><h4 data-start="721" data-end="765"><strong data-start="726" data-end="765">b. Using the <code data-start="741" data-end="755">SET PASSWORD</code> Command</strong></h4><p data-start="766" data-end="800">For versions prior to MySQL 5.7.6:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="801" data-end="874"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SET</span> PASSWORD <span class="hljs-keyword">FOR</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'host'</span> <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> PASSWORD(<span class="hljs-string">'new_password'</span>);
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="876" data-end="884">Example:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="885" data-end="961"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SET</span> PASSWORD <span class="hljs-keyword">FOR</span> <span class="hljs-string">'john'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span> <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> PASSWORD(<span class="hljs-string">'SecureP@ssw0rd'</span>);
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="963" data-end="966"><h4 data-start="968" data-end="1032"><strong data-start="973" data-end="1032">c. Using the <code data-start="988" data-end="996">UPDATE</code> Command on the <code data-start="1012" data-end="1024">mysql.user</code> Table</strong></h4><p data-start="1033" data-end="1100">For older MySQL versions where the above methods are not available:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1101" data-end="1248"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>USE mysql;
<span class="hljs-keyword">UPDATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">user</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">SET</span> authentication_string <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> PASSWORD(<span class="hljs-string">'new_password'</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">user</span> <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> host <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'host'</span>;
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1250" data-end="1258">Example:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1259" data-end="1409"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>USE mysql;
<span class="hljs-keyword">UPDATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">user</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">SET</span> authentication_string <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> PASSWORD(<span class="hljs-string">'SecureP@ssw0rd'</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">user</span> <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'john'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> host <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>;
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1411" data-end="1414"><h3 data-start="1416" data-end="1454"><strong data-start="1420" data-end="1454">3. Apply Changes (If Required)</strong></h3><p data-start="1455" data-end="1541">In some cases, especially for older MySQL versions, you may need to reload privileges:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1542" data-end="1570"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1572" data-end="1575"><h3 data-start="1577" data-end="1614"><strong data-start="1581" data-end="1614">4. Verify the Password Change</strong></h3><p data-start="1615" data-end="1666">Logout and reconnect using the updated credentials:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1667" data-end="1695"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>mysql -u john -p
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1697" data-end="1700"><h3 data-start="1702" data-end="1724"><strong data-start="1706" data-end="1724">Best Practices</strong></h3><ol data-start="1725" data-end="2083"><li data-start="1725" data-end="1800"><strong data-start="1728" data-end="1752">Use Strong Passwords</strong>: Ensure the new password is complex and secure.</li><li data-start="1801" data-end="1883"><strong data-start="1804" data-end="1833">Regular Password Rotation</strong>: Periodically update user passwords for security.</li><li data-start="1884" data-end="2004"><strong data-start="1887" data-end="1917">Avoid Hardcoding Passwords</strong>: Store passwords securely (e.g., in environment variables or secret management tools).</li><li data-start="2005" data-end="2083"><strong data-start="2008" data-end="2031">Audit User Accounts</strong>: Periodically review user accounts and permissions.</li></ol><p data-start="2085" data-end="2144" data-is-last-node="">Would you like specific assistance with any of these steps?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M11 4.9099C11 width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 data-end="101">To access an environment variable in Python, you can use the <code data-start="61" data-end="65">os</code> module. Here's a quick explanation:</p><hr data-start="103" data-end="106"><h3 data-start="108" data-end="153"><strong data-start="112" data-end="153">Steps to Access Environment Variables</strong></h3><ol data-start="155" data-end="650"><li data-start="155" data-end="218"><p data-start="158" data-end="185"><strong data-start="158" data-end="184">Import the <code data-start="171" data-end="175">os</code> module</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="189" data-end="218"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> os
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="220" data-end="465"><p data-start="223" data-end="369"><strong data-start="223" data-end="256">Retrieve Environment Variable</strong>:
Use <code data-start="265" data-end="278">os.getenv()</code> to get the value of an environment variable. It returns <code data-start="335" data-end="341">None</code> if the variable is not set.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="373" data-end="465"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>db_user = os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_USER'</span>)

</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ol><hr data-start="652" data-end="655"><h3 data-start="657" data-end="714"><strong data-start="661" data-end="714">Integrating Environment Variables into the class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> os

<span class="hljs-comment"># Database connection setup using environment variables</span>
db_config = {
    <span class="hljs-string">'host'</span>: os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_HOST'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>),
    <span class="hljs-string">'user'</span>: os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_USER'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'default_user'</span>),
    <span class="hljs-string">'password'</span>: os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_PASSWORD'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'default_password'</span>),
    <span class="hljs-string">'database'</span>: os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_NAME'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'default_database'</span>)
}
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1155" data-end="1158"><p data-start="1160" data-end="1266" data-is-last-node="">Would you like me to update your current script to use environment py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="9083fdb4-866c-4c9f-a70d-5e6a88b9bffa" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="219">When using the <code data-start="15" data-end="42">mysql.connector.connect()</code> function from the MySQL Connector/Python library, you can pass various parameters to customize the connection. Here's a comprehensive list of the most commonly used parameters:</p><hr data-start="221" data-end="224"><h3 data-start="226" data-end="255"><strong data-start="230" data-end="255">Connection Parameters</strong></h3><table data-start="257" data-end="1788"><thead data-start="257" data-end="409"><tr data-start="257" data-end="409"><th data-start="257" data-end="278"><strong data-start="259" data-end="272">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="278" data-end="377"><strong data-start="280" data-end="295">Description</strong></th><th data-start="377" data-end="409"><strong data-start="379" data-end="390">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="564" data-end="1788"><tr data-start="564" data-end="716"><td><code data-start="566" data-end="572">host</code></td><td>Hostname or IP address of the MySQL server.</td><td><code data-start="686" data-end="699">'localhost'</code>, <code data-start="701" data-end="714">'127.0.0.1'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="717" data-end="869"><td><code data-start="719" data-end="725">port</code></td><td>Port number of the MySQL server. Default is <code data-start="784" data-end="790">3306</code>.</td><td><code data-start="839" data-end="845">3306</code></td></tr><tr data-start="870" data-end="1022"><td><code data-start="872" data-end="878">user</code></td><td>Username to use for authentication.</td><td><code data-start="992" data-end="1000">'root'</code>, <code data-start="1002" data-end="1014">'app_user'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1023" data-end="1175"><td><code data-start="1025" data-end="1035">password</code></td><td>Password for the specified user.</td><td><code data-start="1145" data-end="1164">'secure_password'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1176" data-end="1328"><td><code data-start="1178" data-end="1188">database</code></td><td>Default database to use after connection.</td><td><code data-start="1298" data-end="1313">'my_database'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1329" data-end="1481"><td><code data-start="1331" data-end="1344">auth_plugin</code></td><td>Authentication plugin to use.</td><td><code data-start="1451" data-end="1476">'mysql_native_password'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1482" data-end="1635"><td><code data-start="1484" data-end="1497">unix_socket</code></td><td>Path to the Unix socket file for local connections.</td><td><code data-start="1605" data-end="1624">'/tmp/mysql.sock'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1636" data-end="1788"><td><code data-start="1638" data-end="1647">charset</code></td><td>Character set to use for the connection.</td><td><code data-start="1758" data-end="1769">'utf8mb4'</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="1790" data-end="1793"><h3 data-start="1795" data-end="1833"><strong data-start="1799" data-end="1833">Connection Behavior Parameters</strong></h3><table data-start="1835" data-end="3215"><thead data-start="1835" data-end="1987"><tr data-start="1835" data-end="1987"><th data-start="1835" data-end="1856"><strong data-start="1837" data-end="1850">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="1856" data-end="1955"><strong data-start="1858" data-end="1873">Description</strong></th><th data-start="1955" data-end="1987"><strong data-start="1957" data-end="1968">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="2142" data-end="3215"><tr data-start="2142" data-end="2296"><td><code data-start="2144" data-end="2154">use_pure</code></td><td>Whether to use the pure Python implementation (<code data-start="2212" data-end="2218">True</code>) or C extension (<code data-start="2236" data-end="2243">False</code>). Default is <code data-start="2257" data-end="2263">True</code>.</td><td><code data-start="2266" data-end="2272">True</code>, <code data-start="2274" data-end="2281">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2297" data-end="2450"><td><code data-start="2299" data-end="2319">connection_timeout</code></td><td>Timeout for the connection in seconds. Default is no timeout.</td><td><code data-start="2420" data-end="2424">10</code>, <code data-start="2426" data-end="2430">30</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2451" data-end="2603"><td><code data-start="2453" data-end="2472">raise_on_warnings</code></td><td>If <code data-start="2477" data-end="2483">True</code>, raises exceptions for SQL warnings.</td><td><code data-start="2573" data-end="2579">True</code>, <code data-start="2581" data-end="2588">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2604" data-end="2756"><td><code data-start="2606" data-end="2617">pool_name</code></td><td>Name of the connection pool.</td><td><code data-start="2726" data-end="2736">'mypool'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2757" data-end="2909"><td><code data-start="2759" data-end="2770">pool_size</code></td><td>Size of the connection pool.</td><td><code data-start="2879" data-end="2882">5</code>, <code data-start="2884" data-end="2888">10</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2910" data-end="3061"><td><code data-start="2912" data-end="2922">compress</code></td><td>Enables compression for the connection.</td><td><code data-start="3031" data-end="3037">True</code>, <code data-start="3039" data-end="3046">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="3062" data-end="3215"><td><code data-start="3064" data-end="3076">autocommit</code></td><td>Enables autocommit mode (<code data-start="3110" data-end="3116">True</code>) or disables it (<code data-start="3134" data-end="3141">False</code>). Default is <code data-start="3155" data-end="3162">False</code>.</td><td><code data-start="3185" data-end="3191">True</code>, <code data-start="3193" data-end="3200">False</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="3217" data-end="3220"><h3 data-start="3222" data-end="3244"><strong data-start="3226" data-end="3244">SSL Parameters</strong></h3><table data-start="3246" data-end="4470"><thead data-start="3246" data-end="3398"><tr data-start="3246" data-end="3398"><th data-start="3246" data-end="3267"><strong data-start="3248" data-end="3261">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="3267" data-end="3366"><strong data-start="3269" data-end="3284">Description</strong></th><th data-start="3366" data-end="3398"><strong data-start="3368" data-end="3379">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="3553" data-end="4470"><tr data-start="3553" data-end="3705"><td><code data-start="3555" data-end="3563">ssl_ca</code></td><td>Path to the CA certificate file for SSL verification.</td><td><code data-start="3675" data-end="3694">'/path/to/ca.pem'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="3706" data-end="3858"><td><code data-start="3708" data-end="3718">ssl_cert</code></td><td>Path to the client certificate file.</td><td><code data-start="3828" data-end="3856">'/path/to/client-cert.pem'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="3859" data-end="4011"><td><code data-start="3861" data-end="3870">ssl_key</code></td><td>Path to the client private key file.</td><td><code data-start="3981" data-end="4008">'/path/to/client-key.pem'</code></td></tr><tr data-start="4012" data-end="4164"><td><code data-start="4014" data-end="4028">ssl_disabled</code></td><td>Disables SSL if set to <code data-start="4058" data-end="4064">True</code>.</td><td><code data-start="4134" data-end="4140">True</code>, <code data-start="4142" data-end="4149">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="4165" data-end="4317"><td><code data-start="4167" data-end="4184">ssl_verify_cert</code></td><td>If <code data-start="4191" data-end="4197">True</code>, verifies the server's certificate.</td><td><code data-start="4287" data-end="4293">True</code>, <code data-start="4295" data-end="4302">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="4318" data-end="4470"><td><code data-start="4320" data-end="4341">ssl_verify_identity</code></td><td>If <code data-start="4347" data-end="4353">True</code>, verifies the server's hostname against the certificate.</td><td><code data-start="4440" data-end="4446">True</code>, <code data-start="4448" data-end="4455">False</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="4472" data-end="4475"><h3 data-start="4477" data-end="4504"><strong data-start="4481" data-end="4504">Advanced Parameters</strong></h3><table data-start="4506" data-end="5577"><thead data-start="4506" data-end="4658"><tr data-start="4506" data-end="4658"><th data-start="4506" data-end="4527"><strong data-start="4508" data-end="4521">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="4527" data-end="4626"><strong data-start="4529" data-end="4544">Description</strong></th><th data-start="4626" data-end="4658"><strong data-start="4628" data-end="4639">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="4813" data-end="5577"><tr data-start="4813" data-end="4965"><td><code data-start="4815" data-end="4825">buffered</code></td><td>If <code data-start="4839" data-end="4845">True</code>, fetches results immediately into memory.</td><td><code data-start="4935" data-end="4941">True</code>, <code data-start="4943" data-end="4950">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="4966" data-end="5118"><td><code data-start="4968" data-end="4988">allow_local_infile</code></td><td>Enables or disables the <code data-start="5014" data-end="5038">LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE</code> feature. Default is <code data-start="5059" data-end="5066">False</code>.</td><td><code data-start="5088" data-end="5094">True</code>, <code data-start="5096" data-end="5103">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="5119" data-end="5271"><td><code data-start="5121" data-end="5145">allow_multi_statements</code></td><td>Enables multiple statements in a single query. Default is <code data-start="5205" data-end="5212">False</code>.</td><td><code data-start="5241" data-end="5247">True</code>, <code data-start="5249" data-end="5256">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="5272" data-end="5424"><td><code data-start="5274" data-end="5291">consume_results</code></td><td>If <code data-start="5298" data-end="5304">True</code>, reads all results immediately for better performance in some cases.</td><td><code data-start="5394" data-end="5400">True</code>, <code data-start="5402" data-end="5409">False</code></td></tr><tr data-start="5425" data-end="5577"><td><code data-start="5427" data-end="5441">get_warnings</code></td><td>If <code data-start="5451" data-end="5457">True</code>, fetches warnings after queries.</td><td><code data-start="5547" data-end="5553">True</code>, <code data-start="5555" data-end="5562">False</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="5579" data-end="5582"><h3 data-start="5584" data-end="5613">Example Connection String</h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="5614" data-end="5980"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> mysql.connector

conn = mysql.connector.connect(
    host=<span class="hljs-string">'127.0.0.1'</span>,
    user=<span class="hljs-string">'root'</span>,
    password=<span class="hljs-string">'secure_password'</span>,
    database=<span class="hljs-string">'my_database'</span>,
    port=<span class="hljs-number">3306</span>,
    charset=<span class="hljs-string">'utf8mb4'</span>,
    ssl_ca=<span class="hljs-string">'/path/to/ca.pem'</span>,
    ssl_cert=<span class="hljs-string">'/path/to/client-cert.pem'</span>,
    ssl_key=<span class="hljs-string">'/path/to/client-key.pem'</span>,
    autocommit=<span class="hljs-literal">True</span>,
    raise_on_warnings=<span class="hljs-literal">True</span>
)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="5982" data-end="5985"><h3 data-start="5987" data-end="5995">Tips</h3><ol data-start="5996" data-end="6318"><li data-start="5996" data-end="6141"><strong multiple connections efficiently.</li></ol><p data-start="6320" data-end="6363" data-is-last-node="">Let me know if you need further assistance!</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3
