focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-41" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="a8a5142b-80d0-4da1-9a98-1128227ec382" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="269">The <code data-start="4" data-end="12">my.cnf</code> file is the MySQL configuration file where you can set various parameters for <code data-start="91" data-end="99">mysqld</code> (the MySQL server). These parameters control the behavior, performance, and security of the server. Below is a categorized overview of the most commonly used parameters.</p><hr data-start="271" data-end="274"><h3 data-start="276" data-end="300"><strong data-start="280" data-end="300">1. Server Basics</strong></h3><table data-start="302" data-end="1762"><thead data-start="302" data-end="464"><tr data-start="302" data-end="464"><th data-start="302" data-end="328"><strong data-start="304" data-end="317">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="328" data-end="432"><strong data-start="330" data-end="345">Description</strong></th><th data-start="432" data-end="464"><strong data-start="434" data-end="445">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="629" data-end="1762"><tr data-start="629" data-end="790"><td><code data-start="631" data-end="637">port</code></td><td>Port number for the MySQL server. Default is <code data-start="702" data-end="708">3306</code>.</td><td><code data-start="760" data-end="766">3306</code></td></tr><tr data-start="791" data-end="952"><td><code data-start="793" data-end="801">socket</code></td><td>Path to the Unix socket file for local connections.</td><td><code data-start="922" data-end="949">/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock</code></td></tr><tr data-start="953" data-end="1114"><td><code data-start="955" data-end="964">datadir</code></td><td>Directory where MySQL stores data files.</td><td><code data-start="1084" data-end="1100">/var/lib/mysql</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1115" data-end="1276"><td><code data-start="1117" data-end="1127">pid-file</code></td><td>Location of the process ID file.</td><td><code data-start="1246" data-end="1274">/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.pid</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1277" data-end="1438"><td><code data-start="1279" data-end="1288">basedir</code></td><td>Base directory of the MySQL installation.</td><td><code data-start="1408" data-end="1426">/usr/local/mysql</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1439" data-end="1600"><td><code data-start="1441" data-end="1449">tmpdir</code></td><td>Directory for temporary files.</td><td><code data-start="1570" data-end="1576">/tmp</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1601" data-end="1762"><td><code data-start="1603" data-end="1614">server-id</code></td><td>Unique identifier for the server in a replication setup.</td><td><code data-start="1732" data-end="1735">1</code>, <code data-start="1737" data-end="1740">2</code>, <code data-start="1742" data-end="1745">3</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="1764" data-end="1767"><h3 data-start="1769" data-end="1807"><strong data-start="1773" data-end="1807">2. Security and Authentication</strong></h3><table data-start="1809" data-end="2946"><thead data-start="1809" data-end="1971"><tr data-start="1809" data-end="1971"><th data-start="1809" data-end="1835"><strong data-start="1811" data-end="1824">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="1835" data-end="1939"><strong data-start="1837" data-end="1852">Description</strong></th><th data-start="1939" data-end="1971"><strong data-start="1941" data-end="1952">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="2136" data-end="2946"><tr data-start="2136" data-end="2298"><td><code data-start="2138" data-end="2157">skip-grant-tables</code></td><td>Disables the use of the privilege system (not recommended for production).</td><td><code data-start="2268" data-end="2274">true</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2299" data-end="2460"><td><code data-start="2301" data-end="2327">require_secure_transport</code></td><td>Enforces encrypted connections if set to <code data-start="2371" data-end="2375">ON</code>.</td><td><code data-start="2430" data-end="2434">ON</code>, <code data-start="2436" data-end="2441">OFF</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2461" data-end="2622"><td><code data-start="2463" data-end="2471">ssl-ca</code></td><td>Path to the CA certificate file for SSL.</td><td><code data-start="2592" data-end="2609">/path/to/ca.pem</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2623" data-end="2784"><td><code data-start="2625" data-end="2635">ssl-cert</code></td><td>Path to the server certificate file for SSL.</td><td><code data-start="2754" data-end="2780">/path/to/server-cert.pem</code></td></tr><tr data-start="2785" data-end="2946"><td><code data-start="2787" data-end="2796">ssl-key</code></td><td>Path to the server private key file for SSL.</td><td><code data-start="2916" data-end="2941">/path/to/server-key.pem</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="2948" data-end="2951"><h3 data-start="2953" data-end="2990"><strong data-start="2957" data-end="2990">3. Logging and Error Handling</strong></h3><table data-start="2992" data-end="4295"><thead data-start="2992" data-end="3154"><tr data-start="2992" data-end="3154"><th data-start="2992" data-end="3018"><strong data-start="2994" data-end="3007">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="3018" data-end="3122"><strong data-start="3020" data-end="3035">Description</strong></th><th data-start="3122" data-end="3154"><strong data-start="3124" data-end="3135">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="3319" data-end="4295"><tr data-start="3319" data-end="3481"><td><code data-start="3321" data-end="3332">log_error</code></td><td>Path to the error log file.</td><td><code data-start="3451" data-end="3477">/var/log/mysql/error.log</code></td></tr><tr data-start="3482" data-end="3643"><td><code data-start="3484" data-end="3497">general_log</code></td><td>Enables the general query log (logs every query).</td><td><code data-start="3613" data-end="3617">ON</code>, <code data-start="3619" data-end="3624">OFF</code></td></tr><tr data-start="3644" data-end="3806"><td><code data-start="3646" data-end="3664">general_log_file</code></td><td>Path to the general query log file.</td><td><code data-start="3776" data-end="3804">/var/log/mysql/general.log</code></td></tr><tr data-start="3807" data-end="3969"><td><code data-start="3809" data-end="3825">slow_query_log</code></td><td>Enables the slow query log.</td><td><code data-start="3939" data-end="3943">ON</code>, <code data-start="3945" data-end="3950">OFF</code></td></tr><tr data-start="3970" data-end="4132"><td><code data-start="3972" data-end="3993">slow_query_log_file</code></td><td>Path to the slow query log file.</td><td><code data-start="4102" data-end="4127">/var/log/mysql/slow.log</code></td></tr><tr data-start="4133" data-end="4295"><td><code data-start="4135" data-end="4152">long_query_time</code></td><td>Time (in seconds) for a query to be considered slow.</td><td><code data-start="4265" data-end="4269">10</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="4297" data-end="4300"><h3 data-start="4302" data-end="4331"><strong data-start="4306" data-end="4331">4. Performance Tuning</strong></h3><table data-start="4333" data-end="5801"><thead data-start="4333" data-end="4495"><tr data-start="4333" data-end="4495"><th data-start="4333" data-end="4359"><strong data-start="4335" data-end="4348">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="4359" data-end="4463"><strong data-start="4361" data-end="4376">Description</strong></th><th data-start="4463" data-end="4495"><strong data-start="4465" data-end="4476">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="4660" data-end="5801"><tr data-start="4660" data-end="4822"><td><code data-start="4662" data-end="4679">max_connections</code></td><td>Maximum number of simultaneous client connections.</td><td><code data-start="4792" data-end="4797">151</code></td></tr><tr data-start="4823" data-end="4985"><td><code data-start="4825" data-end="4843">query_cache_size</code></td><td>Size of the query cache.</td><td><code data-start="4955" data-end="4960">16M</code></td></tr><tr data-start="4986" data-end="5149"><td><code data-start="4988" data-end="5013">innodb_buffer_pool_size</code></td><td>Size of the InnoDB buffer pool (critical for performance).</td><td><code data-start="5119" data-end="5123">1G</code>, <code data-start="5125" data-end="5129">8G</code></td></tr><tr data-start="5150" data-end="5312"><td><code data-start="5152" data-end="5169">key_buffer_size</code></td><td>Size of the MyISAM key buffer.</td><td><code data-start="5282" data-end="5287">16M</code></td></tr><tr data-start="5313" data-end="5475"><td><code data-start="5315" data-end="5333">table_open_cache</code></td><td>Number of table descriptors cached for open tables.</td><td><code data-start="5445" data-end="5451">2000</code></td></tr><tr data-start="5476" data-end="5638"><td><code data-start="5478" data-end="5497">thread_cache_size</code></td><td>Number of threads to cache for reuse.</td><td><code data-start="5608" data-end="5611">8</code>, <code data-start="5613" data-end="5617">16</code></td></tr><tr data-start="5639" data-end="5801"><td><code data-start="5641" data-end="5663">innodb_log_file_size</code></td><td>Size of each InnoDB redo log file.</td><td><code data-start="5771" data-end="5777">128M</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="5803" data-end="5806"><h3 data-start="5808" data-end="5830"><strong data-start="5812" data-end="5830">5. Replication</strong></h3><table data-start="5832" data-end="7134"><thead data-start="5832" data-end="5994"><tr data-start="5832" data-end="5994"><th data-start="5832" data-end="5858"><strong data-start="5834" data-end="5847">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="5858" data-end="5962"><strong data-start="5860" data-end="5875">Description</strong></th><th data-start="5962" data-end="5994"><strong data-start="5964" data-end="5975">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="6159" data-end="7134"><tr data-start="6159" data-end="6320"><td><code data-start="6161" data-end="6172">server-id</code></td><td>Unique ID for the server in the replication setup.</td><td><code data-start="6290" data-end="6293">1</code>, <code data-start="6295" data-end="6298">2</code>, <code data-start="6300" data-end="6303">3</code></td></tr><tr data-start="6321" data-end="6484"><td><code data-start="6323" data-end="6332">log_bin</code></td><td>Enables binary logging (required for replication).</td><td><code data-start="6452" data-end="6482">/var/log/mysql/mysql-bin.log</code></td></tr><tr data-start="6485" data-end="6648"><td><code data-start="6487" data-end="6498">relay_log</code></td><td>Path to the relay log file for a slave server.</td><td><code data-start="6616" data-end="6646">/var/log/mysql/relay-bin.log</code></td></tr><tr data-start="6649" data-end="6810"><td><code data-start="6651" data-end="6662">read_only</code></td><td>Restricts data modifications on a slave server.</td><td><code data-start="6780" data-end="6784">ON</code>, <code data-start="6786" data-end="6791">OFF</code></td></tr><tr data-start="6811" data-end="6972"><td><code data-start="6813" data-end="6830">replicate_do_db</code></td><td>List of databases to replicate.</td><td><code data-start="6942" data-end="6951">db1,db2</code></td></tr><tr data-start="6973" data-end="7134"><td><code data-start="6975" data-end="6996">replicate_ignore_db</code></td><td>List of databases to ignore during replication.</td><td><code data-start="7104" data-end="7113">db3,db4</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="7136" data-end="7139"><h3 data-start="7141" data-end="7167"><strong data-start="7145" data-end="7167">6. Storage Engines</strong></h3><table data-start="7169" data-end="7982"><thead data-start="7169" data-end="7331"><tr data-start="7169" data-end="7331"><th data-start="7169" data-end="7195"><strong data-start="7171" data-end="7184">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="7195" data-end="7299"><strong data-start="7197" data-end="7212">Description</strong></th><th data-start="7299" data-end="7331"><strong data-start="7301" data-end="7312">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="7496" data-end="7982"><tr data-start="7496" data-end="7657"><td><code data-start="7498" data-end="7522">default_storage_engine</code></td><td>Default storage engine for new tables.</td><td><code data-start="7627" data-end="7635">InnoDB</code>, <code data-start="7637" data-end="7645">MyISAM</code></td></tr><tr data-start="7658" data-end="7819"><td><code data-start="7660" data-end="7683">innodb_file_per_table</code></td><td>Stores each InnoDB table in its own .ibd file.</td><td><code data-start="7789" data-end="7793">ON</code>, <code data-start="7795" data-end="7800">OFF</code></td></tr><tr data-start="7820" data-end="7982"><td><code data-start="7822" data-end="7854">innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit</code></td><td>Controls durability of InnoDB transactions.</td><td><code data-start="7952" data-end="7955">1</code>, <code data-start="7957" data-end="7960">2</code>, <code data-start="7962" data-end="7965">0</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="7984" data-end="7987"><h3 data-start="7989" data-end="8013"><strong data-start="7993" data-end="8013">7. Miscellaneous</strong></h3><table data-start="8015" data-end="8989"><thead data-start="8015" data-end="8177"><tr data-start="8015" data-end="8177"><th data-start="8015" data-end="8041"><strong data-start="8017" data-end="8030">Parameter</strong></th><th data-start="8041" data-end="8145"><strong data-start="8043" data-end="8058">Description</strong></th><th data-start="8145" data-end="8177"><strong data-start="8147" data-end="8158">Example</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="8342" data-end="8989"><tr data-start="8342" data-end="8503"><td><code data-start="8344" data-end="8354">sql_mode</code></td><td>Defines SQL modes for query execution.</td><td><code data-start="8473" data-end="8494">STRICT_TRANS_TABLES</code>, <code data-start="8496" data-end="8502">ANSI</code></td></tr><tr data-start="8504" data-end="8665"><td><code data-start="8506" data-end="8523">event_scheduler</code></td><td>Enables or disables the event scheduler.</td><td><code data-start="8635" data-end="8639">ON</code>, <code data-start="8641" data-end="8646">OFF</code></td></tr><tr data-start="8666" data-end="8827"><td><code data-start="8668" data-end="8690">character_set_server</code></td><td>Default character set for the server.</td><td><code data-start="8797" data-end="8806">utf8mb4</code></td></tr><tr data-start="8828" data-end="8989"><td><code data-start="8830" data-end="8848">collation_server</code></td><td>Default collation for the server.</td><td><code data-start="8959" data-end="8979">utf8mb4_general_ci</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="8991" data-end="8994"><h3 data-start="8996" data-end="9021">Example <code data-start="9008" data-end="9016">my.cnf</code> File</h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="9023" data-end="9360"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">ini</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div [.group\/conversation-turn:hover_&amp;]:block"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button aria-label="Edit message" class="flex h-9 w-9 items-center justify-center rounded-full fill="currentColor"></path></svg></button></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-43" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="089f579c-7f74-40c6-888b-2672902b1854" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="203">The <strong data-start="4" data-end="35"><code data-start="6" data-end="13">mysql</code> command-line client</strong> and Python's <strong data-start="49" data-end="80"><code data-start="51" data-end="78">mysql.connector.connect()</code></strong> function both connect to a MySQL server, but they have distinct mechanisms, use cases, and behaviors. Here's a comparison:</p><hr data-start="205" data-end="208"><h3 data-start="210" data-end="241"><strong data-start="214" data-end="241">1. Connection Mechanism</strong></h3><h4 data-start="243" data-end="279"><strong data-start="248" data-end="279"><code data-start="250" data-end="257">mysql</code> Command-Line Client</strong></h4><ul data-start="280" data-end="671"><li data-start="280" data-end="367">The <code data-start="286" data-end="293">mysql</code> CLI is an executable binary program that interacts with the MySQL server.</li><li data-start="368" data-end="575">It connects using:<ul data-start="391" data-end="575"><li data-start="391" data-end="467"><strong data-start="393" data-end="403">TCP/IP</strong>: When specifying <code data-start="421" data-end="429">--host</code> (e.g., remote server or <code data-start="454" data-end="465">127.0.0.1</code>).</li><li data-start="470" data-end="575"><strong data-start="472" data-end="495">Unix Domain Sockets</strong>: By default for <code data-start="512" data-end="523">localhost</code> on Linux/MacOS (e.g., <code data-start="546" data-end="573">/var/lib/mysql/mysql.sock</code>).</li></ul></li><li data-start="576" data-end="671">Authentication plugins like <code data-start="606" data-end="629">mysql_native_password</code> or <code data-start="633" data-end="656">caching_sha2_password</code> are supported.</li></ul><p data-start="673" data-end="685"><strong data-start="673" data-end="685">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="686" data-end="739"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>mysql -u username -p -h 127.0.0.1 -P 3306
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="741" data-end="777"><strong data-start="746" data-end="777"><code data-start="748" data-end="775">mysql.connector.connect()</code></strong></h4><ul data-start="778" data-end="1238"><li data-start="778" data-end="897">Python's <code data-start="789" data-end="806">mysql.connector</code> is a Python library that provides a programmatic interface to connect to the MySQL server.</li><li data-start="898" data-end="1080">It connects using:<ul data-start="921" data-end="1080"><li data-start="921" data-end="992"><strong data-start="923" data-end="933">TCP/IP</strong>: By default for <code data-start="950" data-end="968">host='127.0.0.1'</code> or any non-socket host.</li><li data-start="995" data-end="1080"><strong data-start="997" data-end="1020">Unix Domain Sockets</strong>: If <code data-start="1025" data-end="1038">unix_socket</code> is specified in the connection arguments.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1081" data-end="1135">Supports the same authentication plugins as the CLI.</li><li data-start="1136" data-end="1238">Allows more fine-grained control via parameters like <code data-start="1191" data-end="1200">charset</code>, <code data-start="1202" data-end="1210">ssl_ca</code>, <code data-start="1212" data-end="1232">connection_timeout</code>, etc.</li></ul><p data-start="1240" data-end="1252"><strong data-start="1240" data-end="1252">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1253" data-end="1430"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> mysql.connector

conn = mysql.connector.connect(
    host=<span class="hljs-string">'127.0.0.1'</span>,
    user=<span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>,
    password=<span class="hljs-string">'password'</span>,
    database=<span class="hljs-string">'test_db'</span>,
    port=<span class="hljs-number">3306</span>
)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1432" data-end="1435"><h3 data-start="1437" data-end="1457"><strong data-start="1441" data-end="1457">2. Use Cases</strong></h3><h4 data-start="1459" data-end="1495"><strong data-start="1464" data-end="1495"><code data-start="1466" data-end="1473">mysql</code> Command-Line Client</strong></h4><ul data-start="1496" data-end="1659"><li data-start="1496" data-end="1592">Ideal for interactive use, such as running ad-hoc queries, debugging, or administrative tasks.</li><li data-start="1593" data-end="1659">Limited to manual or script-based automation via shell commands.</li></ul><h4 data-start="1661" data-end="1697"><strong data-start="1666" data-end="1697"><code data-start="1668" data-end="1695">mysql.connector.connect()</code></strong></h4><ul data-start="1698" data-end="1976"><li data-start="1698" data-end="1752">Designed for programmatic access to MySQL databases.</li><li data-start="1753" data-end="1866">Used in applications and scripts to perform automated database interactions (e.g., CRUD operations, analytics).</li><li data-start="1867" data-end="1976">Supports higher-level functionality like connection pooling, prepared statements, and transaction handling.</li></ul><hr data-start="1978" data-end="1981"><h3 data-start="1983" data-end="2007"><strong data-start="1987" data-end="2007">3. Configuration</strong></h3><h4 data-start="2009" data-end="2045"><strong data-start="2014" data-end="2045"><code data-start="2016" data-end="2023">mysql</code> Command-Line Client</strong></h4><ul data-start="2046" data-end="2194"><li data-start="2046" data-end="2131">Uses configuration files like <code data-start="2078" data-end="2089">~/.my.cnf</code> or <code data-start="2093" data-end="2106">/etc/my.cnf</code> to read default options.</li><li data-start="2132" data-end="2194">Command-line arguments override configuration file settings.</li></ul><p data-start="2196" data-end="2221"><strong data-start="2196" data-end="2221">Example of <code data-start="2209" data-end="2218">.my.cnf</code>:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2222" data-end="2292"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">ini</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-ini"><span><span class="hljs-section">[client]</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">user</span> = root
<span class="hljs-attr">password</span> = mypassword
<span class="hljs-attr">host</span> = localhost
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="2294" data-end="2330"><strong data-start="2299" data-end="2330"><code data-start="2301" data-end="2328">mysql.connector.connect()</code></strong></h4><ul data-start="2331" data-end="2535"><li data-start="2331" data-end="2418">Requires explicit configuration in the application code or via environment variables.</li><li data-start="2419" data-end="2535">The connection parameters must be provided programmatically or retrieved from a configuration management solution.</li></ul><p data-start="2537" data-end="2549"><strong data-start="2537" data-end="2549">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2550" data-end="2789"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> os

conn = mysql.connector.connect(
    host=os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_HOST'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'127.0.0.1'</span>),
    user=os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_USER'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'root'</span>),
    password=os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_PASSWORD'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'mypassword'</span>),
    database=os.getenv(<span class="hljs-string">'DB_NAME'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'test_db'</span>)
)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="2791" data-end="2794"><h3 data-start="2796" data-end="2815"><strong data-start="2800" data-end="2815">4. Security</strong></h3><h4 data-start="2817" data-end="2853"><strong data-start="2822" data-end="2853"><code data-start="2824" data-end="2831">mysql</code> Command-Line Client</strong></h4><ul data-start="2854" data-end="3038"><li data-start="2854" data-end="2950">Passwords can be avoided in the CLI by using <code data-start="2901" data-end="2910">.my.cnf</code> or a Unix socket for local connections.</li><li data-start="2951" data-end="3038">If specified directly, passwords can be visible in the shell history or process list.</li></ul><p data-start="3040" data-end="3063"><strong data-start="3040" data-end="3063">Example (Insecure):</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3064" data-end="3142"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>mysql -u root -p<span class="hljs-string">'mypassword'</span> <span class="hljs-comment"># Password is visible in process list</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="3144" data-end="3180"><strong data-start="3149" data-end="3180"><code data-start="3151" data-end="3178">mysql.connector.connect()</code></strong></h4><ul data-start="3181" data-end="3351"><li data-start="3181" data-end="3297">Passwords are typically managed securely in application code, environment variables, or secret management systems.</li><li data-start="3298" data-end="3351">Supports SSL/TLS encryption for secure connections.</li></ul><p data-start="3353" data-end="3374"><strong data-start="3353" data-end="3374">Example with SSL:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3375" data-end="3600"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>conn = mysql.connector.connect(
    host=<span class="hljs-string">'db.example.com'</span>,
    user=<span class="hljs-string">'user'</span>,
    password=<span class="hljs-string">'password'</span>,
    ssl_ca=<span class="hljs-string">'/path/to/ca.pem'</span>,
    ssl_cert=<span class="hljs-string">'/path/to/client-cert.pem'</span>,
    ssl_key=<span class="hljs-string">'/path/to/client-key.pem'</span>
)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="3602" data-end="3605"><h3 data-start="3607" data-end="3643"><strong data-start="3611" data-end="3643">5. Features and Capabilities</strong></h3><h4 data-start="3645" data-end="3681"><strong data-start="3650" data-end="3681"><code data-start="3652" data-end="3659">mysql</code> Command-Line Client</strong></h4><ul data-start="3682" data-end="3857"><li data-start="3682" data-end="3719">Interactive querying and debugging.</li><li data-start="3720" data-end="3822">Supports batch processing via input redirection:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3773" data-end="3822"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>mysql -u username -p &lt; script.sql
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="3823" data-end="3857">Limited automation capabilities.</li></ul><h4 data-start="3859" data-end="3895"><strong data-start="3864" data-end="3895"><code data-start="3866" data-end="3893">mysql.connector.connect()</code></strong></h4><ul data-start="3896" data-end="4120"><li data-start="3896" data-end="3960">Built for automation and integration into Python applications.</li><li data-start="3961" data-end="4120">Supports:<ul data-start="3975" data-end="4120"><li data-start="3975" data-end="4026">Prepared statements for security and performance.</li><li data-start="4029" data-end="4050">Connection pooling.</li><li data-start="4053" data-end="4120">Explicit transaction management with <code data-start="4092" data-end="4102">commit()</code> and <code data-start="4107" data-end="4119">rollback()</code>.</li></ul></li></ul><hr data-start="4122" data-end="4125"><h3 data-start="4127" data-end="4150"><strong data-start="4131" data-end="4150">6. Dependencies</strong></h3><h4 data-start="4152" data-end="4188"><strong data-start="4157" data-end="4188"><code data-start="4159" data-end="4166">mysql</code> Command-Line Client</strong></h4><ul data-start="4189" data-end="4263"><li data-start="4189" data-end="4263">Requires MySQL server and client binaries to be installed on the system.</li></ul><h4 data-start="4265" data-end="4301"><strong data-start="4270" data-end="4301"><code data-start="4272" data-end="4299">mysql.connector.connect()</code></strong></h4><ul data-start="4302" data-end="4424"><li data-start="4302" data-end="4424">Requires the <code data-start="4317" data-end="4341">mysql-connector-python</code> library, installed via <code data-start="4365" data-end="4370">pip</code>:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="4374" data-end="4424"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">bash</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-bash"><span>pip install mysql-connector-python
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><hr data-start="4426" data-end="4429"><h3 data-start="4431" data-end="4442">Summary</h3><table data-start="4444" data-end="5398"><thead data-start="4444" data-end="4563"><tr data-start="4444" data-end="4563"><th data-start="4444" data-end="4473">Aspect</th><th data-start="4473" data-end="4521"><code data-start="4475" data-end="4482">mysql</code> CLI</th><th data-start="4521" data-end="4563"><code data-start="4523" data-end="4550">mysql.connector.connect()</code></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="4684" data-end="5398"><tr data-start="4684" data-end="4802"><td><strong data-start="4686" data-end="4705">Connection Type</strong></td><td>Interactive (manual)</td><td>Programmatic (automated)</td></tr><tr data-start="4803" data-end="4923"><td><strong data-start="4805" data-end="4825">Default Protocol</strong></td><td>Unix socket (localhost), TCP/IP (others)</td><td>TCP/IP (default), Unix socket (optional)</td></tr><tr data-start="4924" data-end="5043"><td><strong data-start="4926" data-end="4943">Configuration</strong></td><td>Config files (<code data-start="4969" data-end="4977">my.cnf</code>), command-line args</td><td>Application code, environment variables</td></tr><tr data-start="5044" data-end="5162"><td><strong data-start="5046" data-end="5058">Use Case</strong></td><td>Debugging, ad-hoc queries, admin tasks</td><td>Application queries, automation</td></tr><tr data-start="5163" data-end="5280"><td><strong data-start="5165" data-end="5177">Security</strong></td><td><code data-start="5194" data-end="5203">.my.cnf</code> or shell-based</td><td>Secure storage via code or environment</td></tr><tr data-start="5281" data-end="5398"><td><strong data-start="5283" data-end="5299">Dependencies</strong></td><td>MySQL client binary</td><td><code data-start="5358" data-end="5382">mysql-connector-python</code> library</td></tr></tbody></table><p data-start="5400" data-end="5526" data-is-last-node="">Both methods are essential tools for interacting with MySQL, serving different purposes based on the context and requirements.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" 18.2929 9.29291L18 9.5858Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg></button></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-47" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="18b2bc6e-9453-490d-8e90-aba9255c5a6b" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="327">You're correct that opening and closing the connection for each function call is inefficient, particularly if you are performing many database operations in a loop. A better approach is to reuse a single connection and cursor throughout the script or within a specific scope of operations. Here's how you can refactor the code:</p><hr data-start="329" data-end="332"><h3 data-start="334" data-end="358"><strong data-start="338" data-end="358">Proposed Changes</strong></h3><ol data-start="359" data-end="658"><li data-start="359" data-end="562"><p data-start="362" data-end="404"><strong data-start="362" data-end="403">Create a Single Connection and Cursor</strong>:</p><ul data-start="408" data-end="562"><li data-start="408" data-end="475">Open the connection once at the start of the script or operation.</li><li data-start="479" data-end="562">Pass the connection and cursor to the functions that perform database operations.</li></ul></li><li data-start="564" data-end="658"><p data-start="567" data-end="597"><strong data-start="567" data-end="596">Close the Connection Once</strong>:</p><ul data-start="601" data-end="658"><li data-start="601" data-end="658">Close the connection after all operations are complete.</li></ul></li></ol><hr data-start="660" data-end="663"><h3 data-start="665" data-end="688"><strong data-start="669" data-end="688">Refactored Code</strong></h3><p data-start="690" data-end="794">Below is the updated version of your script with a single connection and cursor passed to the functions:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="796" data-end="5586"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> gzip
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> re
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> mysql.connector

<span class="hljs-comment"># Define the file name</span>
prime_factor_file = __file__.replace(<span class="hljs-string">'.py'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'.txt.gz'</span>)

<span class="hljs-comment"># Database connection setup</span>
db_config = {
    <span class="hljs-string">'host'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-string">'user'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'your_username'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-string">'password'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'your_password'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-string">'database'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'your_database'</span>
}

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">insert_prime_to_db</span>(<span class="hljs-params">cursor, prime, prime_index</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span>:
        <span class="hljs-comment"># Insert prime into the Primes table</span>
        query = <span class="hljs-string">"INSERT INTO Primes (prime_number) VALUES (%s)"</span>
        cursor.execute(query, (prime,))
        prime_id = cursor.lastrowid
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Inserted prime <span class="hljs-subst">{prime}</span> as the <span class="hljs-subst">{prime_index}</span>-th prime into the database with ID <span class="hljs-subst">{prime_id}</span>."</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> prime_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> mysql.connector.Error <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> err:
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Error: <span class="hljs-subst">{err}</span>"</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">insert_number_to_db</span>(<span class="hljs-params">cursor, number</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span>:
        <span class="hljs-comment"># Insert number into the Numbers table</span>
        query = <span class="hljs-string">"INSERT INTO Numbers (number_value) VALUES (%s)"</span>
        cursor.execute(query, (number,))
        number_id = cursor.lastrowid
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Inserted number <span class="hljs-subst">{number}</span> into the database with ID <span class="hljs-subst">{number_id}</span>."</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> number_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> mysql.connector.Error <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> err:
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Error: <span class="hljs-subst">{err}</span>"</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">insert_prime_factors_to_db</span>(<span class="hljs-params">cursor, number, factors</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span>:
        <span class="hljs-comment"># Insert into PrimeFactors table</span>
        query = <span class="hljs-string">"INSERT INTO PrimeFactors (number_id, prime_id, exponent) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)"</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> prime, exponent <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> factors.items():
            cursor.execute(query, (number, prime, exponent))
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Inserted prime factors for number <span class="hljs-subst">{number}</span> into the database."</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> mysql.connector.Error <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> err:
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Error: <span class="hljs-subst">{err}</span>"</span>)

<span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">query_primes_below_limit</span>(<span class="hljs-params">cursor, limit</span>):
    <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span>:
        <span class="hljs-comment"># Query primes below the limit</span>
        query = <span class="hljs-string">"SELECT prime_id, prime_number FROM Primes WHERE prime_number &lt; %s"</span>
        cursor.execute(query, (limit,))
        results = cursor.fetchall()
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Primes below <span class="hljs-subst">{limit}</span>:"</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> prime_id, prime <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> results:
            <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"ID: <span class="hljs-subst">{prime_id}</span>, Prime: <span class="hljs-subst">{prime}</span>"</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> results
    <span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> mysql.connector.Error <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> err:
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Error: <span class="hljs-subst">{err}</span>"</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>

<span class="hljs-comment"># Main logic</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">try</span>:
    conn = mysql.connector.connect(**db_config)
    cursor = conn.cursor()

    <span class="hljs-keyword">with</span> gzip.<span class="hljs-built_in">open</span>(prime_factor_file, <span class="hljs-string">'rt'</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> z:
        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> line <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> z:
            <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-string">'='</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> line:
                <span class="hljs-keyword">continue</span>

            <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(line.strip())
            line = line.strip()

            <span class="hljs-comment"># Extract number and RHS</span>
            <span class="hljs-keyword">match</span> = re.<span class="hljs-keyword">match</span>(<span class="hljs-string">r'(^\d+)=(.*)'</span>, line)
            <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">match</span>:
                number, RHS = <span class="hljs-keyword">match</span>.groups()
                number = <span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>(number)

                <span class="hljs-comment"># Insert the number into the Numbers table</span>
                number_id = insert_number_to_db(cursor, number)

                <span class="hljs-comment"># Check if the number is a prime</span>
                prime_match = re.search(<span class="hljs-string">r'\((\d+)\)'</span>, line)
                <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> prime_match:
                    prime = number
                    prime_index = <span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>(prime_match.group(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>))
                    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f" <span class="hljs-subst">{number}</span> is the <span class="hljs-subst">{prime_index}</span>-th prime."</span>)

                    <span class="hljs-comment"># Insert the prime into the database</span>
                    prime_id = insert_prime_to_db(cursor, prime, prime_index)

                <span class="hljs-comment"># Check for prime factor sequence</span>
                <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-string">';'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> RHS:
                    prime_factor_sequence = <span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>(RHS.split(<span class="hljs-string">';'</span>)[-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>])
                    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f" <span class="hljs-subst">{number}</span> is a prime factor sequence: <span class="hljs-subst">{prime_factor_sequence}</span>"</span>)
                    RHS = RHS.split(<span class="hljs-string">';'</span>)[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]

                <span class="hljs-comment"># Parse factorization if it's a product of primes</span>
                <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> re.<span class="hljs-keyword">match</span>(<span class="hljs-string">r'^[0-9x^]+$'</span>, RHS):
                    <span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">parse_factorization</span>(<span class="hljs-params">factorization_string</span>):
                        factors = factorization_string.split(<span class="hljs-string">'x'</span>)
                        factor_exponents = {}
                        <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> prime_factor <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> factors:
                            factor, _, exponent = prime_factor.partition(<span class="hljs-string">'^'</span>)
                            factor = <span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>(factor)
                            exponent = <span class="hljs-built_in">int</span>(exponent) <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> exponent <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
                            factor_exponents[factor] = exponent
                        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">" "</span>, <span class="hljs-string">", "</span>.join(factors))
                        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> factor_exponents

                    factors = parse_factorization(RHS)

                    <span class="hljs-comment"># Insert prime factors into the database</span>
                    insert_prime_factors_to_db(cursor, number_id, factors)

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Commit all changes at once</span>
    conn.commit()

<span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> FileNotFoundError:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Cannot read from '<span class="hljs-subst">{prime_factor_file}</span>': File not found."</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> OSError <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> e:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Error reading gzip file: <span class="hljs-subst">{e}</span>"</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> mysql.connector.Error <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> err:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Database error: <span class="hljs-subst">{err}</span>"</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">finally</span>:
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> cursor:
        cursor.close()
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> conn:
        conn.close()
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="5588" data-end="5591"><h3 data-start="5593" data-end="5611"><strong data-start="5597" data-end="5611">Advantages</strong></h3><ol data-start="5612" data-end="5885"><li data-start="5612" data-end="5706"><strong data-start="5615" data-end="5629">Efficiency</strong>:<ul data-start="5634" data-end="5706"><li data-start="5634" data-end="5706">The connection and cursor are reused, significantly reducing overhead.</li></ul></li><li data-start="5707" data-end="5797"><strong data-start="5710" data-end="5737">Transactional Integrity</strong>:<ul data-start="5742" data-end="5797"><li data-start="5742" data-end="5797">Changes are committed at the end, ensuring atomicity.</li></ul></li><li data-start="5798" data-end="5885"><strong data-start="5801" data-end="5816">Readability</strong>:<ul data-start="5821" data-end="5885"><li data-start="5821" data-end="5885">The code is cleaner and avoids repetitive connection handling.</li></ul></li></ol><p data-start="5887" data-end="5922" data-is-last-node="">Would you like further adjustments?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex 10.8805 21.9922L10.4267 21.9355C7.95958 21.6271 6.36855 19.1665 7.09975 16.7901L7.65054 15H6.93226C4.29476 15 2.37923 12.4921 3.0732 9.94753L4.43684 4.94753C4.91145 3.20728 6.49209 2 8.29589 data-testid="conversation-turn-48" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="aaa26354-f49b-40b1-a0b8-50bcd21554d9" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 aria-label="Edit message" class="flex h-9 w-9 items-center justify-center rounded-full text-token-text-secondary transition hover:bg-token-main-surface-tertiary"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-49" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="4a30dfc0-8354-4303-ac97-f52ba5dfe46b" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="103">In Python, you can test whether a key exists in a dictionary using the <code data-start="71" data-end="75">in</code> keyword. Heres the syntax:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="105" data-end="136"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>key <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> dictionary
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="138" data-end="217">This returns <code data-start="151" data-end="157">True</code> if the key exists in the dictionary, and <code data-start="199" data-end="206">False</code> otherwise.</p><hr data-start="219" data-end="222"><h3 data-start="224" data-end="240"><strong data-start="228" data-end="240">Examples</strong></h3><h4 data-start="242" data-end="267"><strong data-start="247" data-end="267">1. Basic Example</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="268" data-end="417"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3</span>}

<span class="hljs-comment"># Test if a key exists</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_dict)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: True</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'z'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_dict)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: False</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="419" data-end="453"><strong data-start="424" data-end="453">2. With an <code data-start="437" data-end="441">if</code> Statement</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="454" data-end="576"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_dict:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key 'b' exists in the dictionary."</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key 'b' does not exist."</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="578" data-end="635"><strong data-start="583" data-end="635">3. Checking for a Key Before Accessing Its Value</strong></h4><p data-start="636" data-end="702">This avoids a <code data-start="650" data-end="660">KeyError</code> when trying to access a non-existent key:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="703" data-end="854"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>key = <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> key <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_dict:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"The value for '<span class="hljs-subst">{key}</span>' is <span class="hljs-subst">{my_dict[key]}</span>."</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"'<span class="hljs-subst">{key}</span>' is not in the dictionary."</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="856" data-end="882"><strong data-start="861" data-end="882">4. Using <code data-start="872" data-end="880">not in</code></strong></h4><p data-start="883" data-end="932">You can test if a key is <strong data-start="908" data-end="915">not</strong> in a dictionary:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="933" data-end="1006"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-string">'d'</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_dict:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key 'd' does not exist."</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1008" data-end="1011"><h3 data-start="1013" data-end="1035"><strong data-start="1017" data-end="1035">Best Practices</strong></h3><ul data-start="1036" data-end="1289"><li data-start="1036" data-end="1079">Use <code data-start="1042" data-end="1046">in</code> for simple key existence checks.</li><li data-start="1080" data-end="1289">Combine <code data-start="1090" data-end="1094">in</code> with <code data-start="1100" data-end="1107">get()</code> if you want to retrieve a value with a default fallback:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1167" data-end="1289"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>value = my_dict.get(<span class="hljs-string">'e'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'default_value'</span>)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Returns 'default_value' if key 'e' is not in the dictionary</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><p data-start="1291" data-end="1342" data-is-last-node="">Let me know if youd like more examples or details!</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12.1318 2.50389C12.3321 2.15338 12.7235 1.95768 13.124 2.00775L13.5778 2.06447C16.0449 2.37286 17.636 4.83353 16.9048 7.20993L16.354 8.99999H17.0722C19.7097 11V19C7 19.3506 7.06015 19.6872 7.17071 20H6C5.44772 20 5 19.5523 5 19V12C5 11.4477 5.44772 11 6 11H7Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg></span></button></span><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Bad response" data-testid="bad-response-turn-action-button"><span class="flex flex-col @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="aaa2707f-33f7-4b53-9f05-89d36c96d206" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] rounded-3xl bg-token-message-surface px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">how would I use get in an if statement</div><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-full top-0 -mr-3.5 hidden pr-5 pt-1 [.group\/conversation-turn:hover_&amp;]:block"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button aria-label="Edit message" class="flex h-9 w-9 items-center justify-center rounded-full text-token-text-secondary transition hover:bg-token-main-surface-tertiary"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M13.2929 4.29291C15.0641 2.52167 17.9359 2.52167 19.7071 4.2929C21.4784 6.06414 21.4784 8.93588 19.7071 10.7071L18.7073 11.7069L11.6135 18.8007C10.8766
