7.41422ZM18 9.5858L14.4142 6.00001L14.7071 5.70712C15.6973 4.71693 17.3027 4.71693 18.2929 5.70712C19.2831 6.69731 19.2831 8.30272 18.2929 9.29291L18 9.5858Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg></button></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-51" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="738febe9-dae4-46de-be09-2ac80ad24e07" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="200">You can use the <code data-start="16" data-end="23">get()</code> method in an <code data-start="37" data-end="41">if</code> statement to check if a key exists in a dictionary and optionally retrieve its value. If the key does not exist, you can specify a default value with <code data-start="192" data-end="199">get()</code>.</p><hr data-start="202" data-end="205"><h3 data-start="207" data-end="221"><strong data-start="211" data-end="221">Syntax</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="223" data-end="279"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>value = dictionary.get(key, default_value)
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="281" data-end="427"><li data-start="281" data-end="360">If <code data-start="286" data-end="291">key</code> exists in the dictionary, <code data-start="318" data-end="325">value</code> will hold the corresponding value.</li><li data-start="361" data-end="427">If <code data-start="366" data-end="371">key</code> does not exist, <code data-start="388" data-end="395">value</code> will be set to <code data-start="411" data-end="426">default_value</code>.</li></ul><hr data-start="429" data-end="432"><h3 data-start="434" data-end="450"><strong data-start="438" data-end="450">Examples</strong></h3><h4 data-start="452" data-end="475"><strong data-start="457" data-end="475">1. Basic Check</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="476" data-end="677"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">30</span>}

<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> my_dict.get(<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">is</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>:  <span class="hljs-comment"># Check if 'b' exists</span>
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key 'b' exists, value:"</span>, my_dict[<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>])
<span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key 'b' does not exist."</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="679" data-end="716"><strong data-start="684" data-end="716">2. Providing a Default Value</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="717" data-end="932"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">30</span>}

value = my_dict.get(<span class="hljs-string">'d'</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)  <span class="hljs-comment"># If 'd' doesn't exist, default to 0</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> value != <span class="hljs-number">0</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Key exists, value is <span class="hljs-subst">{value}</span>"</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key does not exist."</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="934" data-end="975"><strong data-start="939" data-end="975">3. Combining Retrieval and Check</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="976" data-end="1148"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'x'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'y'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">200</span>}

value = my_dict.get(<span class="hljs-string">'y'</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> value:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Key 'y' exists with value <span class="hljs-subst">{value}</span>."</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key 'y' does not exist."</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="1150" data-end="1199"><strong data-start="1155" data-end="1199">4. Checking for a Specific Default Value</strong></h4><p data-start="1200" data-end="1292">You can use a unique default value to distinguish between a missing key and an actual value:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1293" data-end="1545"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'Alice'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'age'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">25</span>}

value = my_dict.get(<span class="hljs-string">'address'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'not_found'</span>)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Default to 'not_found'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> value == <span class="hljs-string">'not_found'</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key 'address' does not exist."</span>)
<span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Key 'address' exists with value <span class="hljs-subst">{value}</span>."</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1547" data-end="1550"><h3 data-start="1552" data-end="1576"><strong data-start="1556" data-end="1576">Why Use <code data-start="1566" data-end="1573">get()</code>?</strong></h3><ul data-start="1578" data-end="1785"><li data-start="1578" data-end="1684"><strong data-start="1580" data-end="1597">No <code data-start="1585" data-end="1595">KeyError</code></strong>: <code data-start="1599" data-end="1606">get()</code> ensures you dont accidentally raise a <code data-start="1646" data-end="1656">KeyError</code> when the key doesnt exist.</li><li data-start="1685" data-end="1785"><strong data-start="1687" data-end="1705">Default Values</strong>: You can specify fallback values, making your code cleaner and more expressive.</li></ul><p data-start="1787" data-end="1851" data-is-last-node="">Let me know if you need further clarifications or more examples!</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M11 4.9099C11 4.47485 10.4828 4.24734 10.1621 4.54132L6.67572 7.7372C6.49129 7.90626 6.25019 8.00005 6 8.00005H4C3.44772 8.00005 3 8.44776 3 9.00005V15C3 15.5523 3.44772 16 4 16H6C6.25019 16 6.49129 16.0938 6.67572 16.2629L10.1621 19.4588C10.4828 19.7527 11 19.5252 11 19.0902V4.9099ZM8.81069 3.06701C10.4142 1.59714 13 2.73463 13 4.9099V19.0902C13 [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] rounded-3xl bg-token-message-surface px-5 py-2.5"><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">how does one reset the auto increment  feature for tables in MySQL</div><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-full top-0 -mr-3.5 hidden pr-5 pt-1 [.group\/conversation-turn:hover_&amp;]:block"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button aria-label="Edit message" class="flex h-9 w-9 items-center justify-center rounded-full text-token-text-secondary transition hover:bg-token-main-surface-tertiary"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M13.2929 4.29291C15.0641 2.52167 17.9359 2.52167 19.7071 4.2929C21.4784 6.06414 21.4784 8.93588 19.7071 10.7071L18.7073 11.7069L11.6135 18.8007C10.8766 fill="currentColor"></path></svg></button></span></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-53" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="823d78e2-9acc-4a3e-bfab-6e56b9df9d6f" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="206">To reset the auto-increment counter for a table in MySQL, you can use the <code data-start="74" data-end="87">ALTER TABLE</code> statement with the <code data-start="107" data-end="123">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> option. This lets you specify the next value the auto-increment column should use.</p><hr data-start="208" data-end="211"><h3 data-start="213" data-end="250"><strong data-start="217" data-end="250">Steps to Reset Auto-Increment</strong></h3><h4 data-start="252" data-end="289"><strong data-start="257" data-end="289">1. Reset to a Specific Value</strong></h4><p data-start="290" data-end="346">To reset the auto-increment counter to a specific value:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="347" data-end="404"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> table_name AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">value</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="406" data-end="529"><li data-start="406" data-end="457">Replace <code data-start="416" data-end="428">table_name</code> with the name of your table.</li><li data-start="458" data-end="529">Replace <code data-start="468" data-end="475">value</code> with the desired starting value (e.g., <code data-start="515" data-end="518">1</code> to reset).</li></ul><p data-start="531" data-end="543"><strong data-start="531" data-end="543">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="544" data-end="592"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> users AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="594" data-end="673"><li data-start="594" data-end="673">This resets the auto-increment counter for the <code data-start="643" data-end="650">users</code> table to start at <code data-start="669" data-end="672">1</code>.</li></ul><hr data-start="675" data-end="678"><h4 data-start="680" data-end="724"><strong data-start="685" data-end="724">2. Reset After Truncating the Table</strong></h4><p data-start="725" data-end="813">If you delete all rows from a table and want to reset the auto-increment counter to <code data-start="809" data-end="812">1</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="814" data-end="851"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">TRUNCATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> table_name;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="853" data-end="999"><li data-start="853" data-end="999">The <code data-start="859" data-end="869">TRUNCATE</code> statement:<ul data-start="883" data-end="999"><li data-start="883" data-end="917">Removes all rows from the table.</li><li data-start="920" data-end="999">Resets the auto-increment counter to <code data-start="959" data-end="962">1</code> (or the minimum value if specified).</li></ul></li></ul><hr data-start="1001" data-end="1004"><h4 data-start="1006" data-end="1043"><strong data-start="1011" data-end="1043">3. Reset After Deleting Rows</strong></h4><p data-start="1044" data-end="1161">If youve deleted rows but didnt use <code data-start="1082" data-end="1092">TRUNCATE</code>, the auto-increment value does not automatically reset. To reset it:</p><ol data-start="1163" data-end="1424"><li data-start="1163" data-end="1288"><p data-start="1166" data-end="1217">Determine the highest value currently in the table:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1221" data-end="1288"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">MAX</span>(auto_increment_column) <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> table_name;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="1290" data-end="1424"><p data-start="1293" data-end="1353">Set the auto-increment value to one higher than the maximum:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1357" data-end="1424"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> table_name AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> new_value;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ol><p data-start="1426" data-end="1438"><strong data-start="1426" data-end="1438">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1439" data-end="1546"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">MAX</span>(id) <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> users;
<span class="hljs-comment">-- Assume the maximum ID is 50</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> users AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">51</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1548" data-end="1551"><h3 data-start="1553" data-end="1576"><strong data-start="1557" data-end="1576">Important Notes</strong></h3><ol data-start="1577" data-end="1950"><li data-start="1577" data-end="1707"><strong data-start="1580" data-end="1597">Minimum Value</strong>:<ul data-start="1602" data-end="1707"><li data-start="1602" data-end="1707">The <code data-start="1608" data-end="1624">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> value cannot be set to a value lower than the highest existing value in the table.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1708" data-end="1814"><strong data-start="1711" data-end="1726">Permissions</strong>:<ul data-start="1731" data-end="1814"><li data-start="1731" data-end="1814">You need the <code data-start="1746" data-end="1753">ALTER</code> privilege on the table to modify its <code data-start="1791" data-end="1807">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> value.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1815" data-end="1950"><strong data-start="1818" data-end="1845">Impact on Existing Rows</strong>:<ul data-start="1850" data-end="1950"><li data-start="1850" data-end="1950">Changing the <code data-start="1865" data-end="1881">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> value does not affect existing rows. It only affects future inserts.</li></ul></li></ol><hr data-start="1952" data-end="1955"><h3 data-start="1957" data-end="1984"><strong data-start="1961" data-end="1984">Practical Use Cases</strong></h3><ul data-start="1985" data-end="2158"><li data-start="1985" data-end="2060"><strong data-start="1987" data-end="2008">Reset for Testing</strong>:
After testing, reset the counter to start fresh.</li><li data-start="2061" data-end="2155"><strong data-start="2063" data-end="2081">Reorganize IDs</strong>:
After deleting rows, reset the counter to maintain a sequential order.</li></ul><p data-start="2159" data-end="2203" data-is-last-node="">Would you like further assistance with this?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 data-testid="conversation-turn-54" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-55" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="7ac521b9-69cd-4c87-99c1-1626c04db70c" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="88">To add the <code data-start="11" data-end="19">DELETE</code> privilege to a user in MySQL, use the <code data-start="58" data-end="65">GRANT</code> statement. Here's how:</p><hr data-start="90" data-end="93"><h3 data-start="95" data-end="127"><strong data-start="99" data-end="127">Grant <code data-start="107" data-end="115">DELETE</code> Privilege</strong></h3><h4 data-start="129" data-end="188"><strong data-start="134" data-end="188">1. Grant <code data-start="145" data-end="153">DELETE</code> on a Specific Database and Table</strong></h4><p data-start="189" data-end="237">To give <code data-start="197" data-end="205">DELETE</code> privileges on a specific table:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="238" data-end="311"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">GRANT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> database_name.table_name <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'host'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="313" data-end="556"><li data-start="313" data-end="369">Replace <code data-start="323" data-end="338">database_name</code> with the name of the database.</li><li data-start="370" data-end="420">Replace <code data-start="380" data-end="392">table_name</code> with the name of the table.</li><li data-start="421" data-end="466">Replace <code data-start="431" data-end="441">username</code> with the MySQL username.</li><li data-start="467" data-end="556">Replace <code data-start="477" data-end="483">host</code> with the hostname or IP address (e.g., <code data-start="523" data-end="534">localhost</code> or <code data-start="538" data-end="541">%</code> for any host).</li></ul><p data-start="558" data-end="570"><strong data-start="558" data-end="570">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="571" data-end="641"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">GRANT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> my_database.my_table <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> <span class="hljs-string">'john'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="643" data-end="697"><strong data-start="648" data-end="697">2. Grant <code data-start="659" data-end="667">DELETE</code> on All Tables in a Database</strong></h4><p data-start="698" data-end="763">To give <code data-start="706" data-end="714">DELETE</code> privileges on all tables in a specific database:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="764" data-end="828"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">GRANT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> database_name.<span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'host'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="830" data-end="842"><strong data-start="830" data-end="842">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="843" data-end="906"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">GRANT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> my_database.<span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> <span class="hljs-string">'john'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><h4 data-start="908" data-end="951"><strong data-start="913" data-end="951">3. Grant <code data-start="924" data-end="932">DELETE</code> on All Databases</strong></h4><p data-start="952" data-end="1009">To give <code data-start="960" data-end="968">DELETE</code> privileges globally (for all databases):</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1010" data-end="1062"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">GRANT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> <span class="hljs-operator">*</span>.<span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'host'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1064" data-end="1076"><strong data-start="1064" data-end="1076">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1077" data-end="1122"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">GRANT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> <span class="hljs-operator">*</span>.<span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> <span class="hljs-string">'john'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'%'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1124" data-end="1127"><h3 data-start="1129" data-end="1150"><strong data-start="1133" data-end="1150">Apply Changes</strong></h3><p data-start="1151" data-end="1200">After granting privileges, apply them by running:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1201" data-end="1229"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1231" data-end="1234"><h3 data-start="1236" data-end="1261"><strong data-start="1240" data-end="1261">Verify Privileges</strong></h3><p data-start="1262" data-end="1293">To check the users privileges:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1294" data-end="1339"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> GRANTS <span class="hljs-keyword">FOR</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'host'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1341" data-end="1353"><strong data-start="1341" data-end="1353">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1354" data-end="1400"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> GRANTS <span class="hljs-keyword">FOR</span> <span class="hljs-string">'john'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1402" data-end="1405"><h3 data-start="1407" data-end="1440"><strong data-start="1411" data-end="1440">Revoke <code data-start="1420" data-end="1428">DELETE</code> Privilege</strong></h3><p data-start="1441" data-end="1486">If you need to remove the <code data-start="1467" data-end="1475">DELETE</code> privilege:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1487" data-end="1563"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">REVOKE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> database_name.table_name <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'host'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1565" data-end="1577"><strong data-start="1565" data-end="1577">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1578" data-end="1651"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">REVOKE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> my_database.my_table <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> <span class="hljs-string">'john'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1653" data-end="1656"><h3 data-start="1658" data-end="1681"><strong data-start="1662" data-end="1681">Important Notes</strong></h3><ol data-start="1682" data-end="2110"><li data-start="1682" data-end="1870"><p data-start="1685" data-end="1703"><strong data-start="1685" data-end="1702">User Creation</strong>:</p><ul data-start="1707" data-end="1870"><li data-start="1707" data-end="1870">Ensure the user exists before granting privileges. You can create a user using:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1794" data-end="1870"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">USER</span> <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'host'</span> IDENTIFIED <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> <span class="hljs-string">'password'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul></li><li data-start="1872" data-end="1974"><p data-start="1875" data-end="1905"><strong data-start="1875" data-end="1904">Least Privilege Principle</strong>:</p><ul data-start="1909" data-end="1974"><li data-start="1909" data-end="1974">Grant only the necessary privileges to minimize security risks.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1976" data-end="2110"><p data-start="1979" data-end="2000"><strong data-start="1979" data-end="1999">Wildcard in Host</strong>:</p><ul data-start="2004" data-end="2110"><li data-start="2004" data-end="2110">Use <code data-start="2010" data-end="2013">%</code> for <code data-start="2018" data-end="2024">host</code> to allow access from any host, or specify a specific hostname/IP for tighter control.</li></ul></li></ol><p data-start="2112" data-end="2182" data-is-last-node="">Would you like further guidance on privilege management or user setup?</p></div></div></div></div><div
