class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-57" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="1e91758e-83d8-4d58-90d1-a3a87db9b378" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="166">Lists and dictionaries are both built-in data structures in Python, but they serve different purposes and have distinct characteristics. Here's a detailed comparison:</p><hr data-start="168" data-end="171"><h3 data-start="173" data-end="227"><strong data-start="177" data-end="227">Key Differences Between Lists and Dictionaries</strong></h3><table data-start="229" data-end="1715"><thead data-start="229" data-end="365"><tr data-start="229" data-end="365"><th data-start="229" data-end="256"><strong data-start="231" data-end="242">Feature</strong></th><th data-start="256" data-end="312"><strong data-start="258" data-end="266">List</strong></th><th data-start="312" data-end="365"><strong data-start="314" data-end="328">Dictionary</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="500" data-end="1715"><tr data-start="500" data-end="633"><td><strong data-start="502" data-end="516">Definition</strong></td><td>An ordered collection of elements.</td><td>An unordered collection of key-value pairs.</td></tr><tr data-start="634" data-end="769"><td><strong data-start="636" data-end="653">Access Method</strong></td><td>Access elements by their <strong data-start="688" data-end="697">index</strong> (integer-based).</td><td>Access values by their <strong data-start="741" data-end="748">key</strong> (hashable object).</td></tr><tr data-start="770" data-end="903"><td><strong data-start="772" data-end="782">Syntax</strong></td><td>Defined using square brackets <code data-start="829" data-end="833">[]</code>.</td><td>Defined using curly braces <code data-start="881" data-end="885">{}</code>.</td></tr><tr data-start="904" data-end="1037"><td><strong data-start="906" data-end="917">Example</strong></td><td><code data-start="933" data-end="944">[1, 2, 3]</code></td><td><code data-start="988" data-end="1006">{'a': 1, 'b': 2}</code></td></tr><tr data-start="1038" data-end="1171"><td><strong data-start="1040" data-end="1049">Order</strong></td><td>Maintains insertion order (as of Python 3.7+).</td><td>Maintains insertion order (as of Python 3.7+).</td></tr><tr data-start="1172" data-end="1305"><td><strong data-start="1174" data-end="1188">Duplicates</strong></td><td>Allows duplicate elements.</td><td>Keys must be unique, but values can duplicate.</td></tr><tr data-start="1306" data-end="1442"><td><strong data-start="1308" data-end="1322">Mutability</strong></td><td>Mutable: Elements can be modified.</td><td>Mutable: Keys and values can be added or modified.</td></tr><tr data-start="1443" data-end="1581"><td><strong data-start="1445" data-end="1460">Homogeneity</strong></td><td>Typically used for homogeneous data (but not required).</td><td>Typically used for heterogeneous key-value pairs.</td></tr><tr data-start="1582" data-end="1715"><td><strong data-start="1584" data-end="1599">Performance</strong></td><td>Element access is <strong data-start="1629" data-end="1637">O(1)</strong> for indices.</td><td>Key-based access is <strong data-start="1686" data-end="1694">O(1)</strong> (average case).</td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="1717" data-end="1720"><h3 data-start="1722" data-end="1739"><strong data-start="1726" data-end="1739">Use Cases</strong></h3><h4 data-start="1741" data-end="1756"><strong data-start="1746" data-end="1756">Lists:</strong></h4><ul data-start="1757" data-end="1876"><li data-start="1757" data-end="1809">Storing a collection of items where order matters.</li><li data-start="1810" data-end="1840">Iterating through sequences.</li><li data-start="1841" data-end="1876">Accessing data by position/index.</li></ul><p data-start="1878" data-end="1890"><strong data-start="1878" data-end="1890">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1891" data-end="1959"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list = [<span class="hljs-number">10</span>, <span class="hljs-number">20</span>, <span class="hljs-number">30</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_list[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>])  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: 20</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1961" data-end="1964"><h4 data-start="1966" data-end="1988"><strong data-start="1971" data-end="1988">Dictionaries:</strong></h4><ul data-start="1989" data-end="2123"><li data-start="1989" data-end="2054">Storing data as key-value pairs where the relationship matters.</li><li data-start="2055" data-end="2085">Quick lookups based on keys.</li><li data-start="2086" data-end="2123">Flexible indexing with custom keys.</li></ul><p data-start="2125" data-end="2137"><strong data-start="2125" data-end="2137">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2138" data-end="2230"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'Alice'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'age'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">25</span>}
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_dict[<span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>])  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: Alice</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="2232" data-end="2235"><h3 data-start="2237" data-end="2276"><strong data-start="2241" data-end="2276">Detailed Comparison of Features</strong></h3><h4 data-start="2278" data-end="2305"><strong data-start="2283" data-end="2305">1. Element Storage</strong></h4><ul data-start="2306" data-end="2482"><li data-start="2306" data-end="2385"><strong data-start="2308" data-end="2316">List</strong>: Stores individual elements.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2348" data-end="2385"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list = [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="2386" data-end="2482"><strong data-start="2388" data-end="2402">Dictionary</strong>: Stores key-value pairs.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2430" data-end="2482"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'c'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3</span>}
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><h4 data-start="2484" data-end="2504"><strong data-start="2489" data-end="2504">2. Indexing</strong></h4><ul data-start="2505" data-end="2807"><li data-start="2505" data-end="2655"><strong data-start="2507" data-end="2515">List</strong>: Indexed numerically (starting from 0).<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2558" data-end="2655"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list = [<span class="hljs-string">'apple'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'banana'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'cherry'</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_list[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>])  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: 'banana'</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="2656" data-end="2807"><strong data-start="2658" data-end="2672">Dictionary</strong>: Indexed by keys.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2693" data-end="2807"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'fruit1'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'apple'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'fruit2'</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'banana'</span>}
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_dict[<span class="hljs-string">'fruit2'</span>])  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: 'banana'</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><h4 data-start="2809" data-end="2833"><strong data-start="2814" data-end="2833">3. Modification</strong></h4><ul data-start="2834" data-end="3105"><li data-start="2834" data-end="2959"><strong data-start="2836" data-end="2844">List</strong>: Modify by index.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2865" data-end="2959"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list = [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
my_list[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>] = <span class="hljs-number">20</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_list)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: [1, 20, 3]</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="2960" data-end="3105"><strong data-start="2962" data-end="2976">Dictionary</strong>: Modify by key.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2995" data-end="3105"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>}
my_dict[<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>] = <span class="hljs-number">20</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_dict)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: {'a': 1, 'b': 20}</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><h4 data-start="3107" data-end="3134"><strong data-start="3112" data-end="3134">4. Adding Elements</strong></h4><ul data-start="3135" data-end="3421"><li data-start="3135" data-end="3274"><strong data-start="3137" data-end="3145">List</strong>: Use <code data-start="3151" data-end="3161">append()</code> or slicing.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3176" data-end="3274"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list = [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
my_list.append(<span class="hljs-number">4</span>)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_list)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: [1, 2, 3, 4]</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="3275" data-end="3421"><strong data-start="3277" data-end="3291">Dictionary</strong>: Add a new key-value pair.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3321" data-end="3421"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>}
my_dict[<span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>] = <span class="hljs-number">2</span>
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_dict)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: {'a': 1, 'b': 2}</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><h4 data-start="3423" data-end="3452"><strong data-start="3428" data-end="3452">5. Removing Elements</strong></h4><ul data-start="3453" data-end="3739"><li data-start="3453" data-end="3596"><strong data-start="3455" data-end="3463">List</strong>: Use <code data-start="3469" data-end="3479">remove()</code>, <code data-start="3481" data-end="3488">pop()</code>, or slicing.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3504" data-end="3596"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list = [<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>]
my_list.remove(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_list)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: [1, 3]</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="3597" data-end="3739"><strong data-start="3599" data-end="3613">Dictionary</strong>: Use <code data-start="3619" data-end="3624">del</code> or <code data-start="3628" data-end="3635">pop()</code>.<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3639" data-end="3739"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_dict = {<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'b'</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>}
<span class="hljs-keyword">del</span> my_dict[<span class="hljs-string">'a'</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(my_dict)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Output: {'b': 2}</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul><hr data-start="3741" data-end="3744"><h3 data-start="3746" data-end="3765"><strong data-start="3750" data-end="3765">When to Use</strong></h3><ul data-start="3766" data-end="3920"><li data-start="3766" data-end="3837"><strong data-start="3768" data-end="3777">Lists</strong>: When you need an ordered collection or sequence of values.</li><li <span class="hljs-comment"># Append the tuple to the list</span>

</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="294" data-end="305"><strong data-start="294" data-end="305">Output:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="306" data-end="364"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>[(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'apple'</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'banana'</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'cherry'</span>)]
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="366" data-end="369"><h3 data-start="371" data-end="398"><strong data-start="375" data-end="398">Alternative Methods</strong></h3><h4 data-start="399" data-end="437"><strong data-start="404" data-end="437">1. Using <code data-start="415" data-end="419">+=</code> (Concatenation)</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="438" data-end="476"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list += [(<span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'date'</span>)]
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="477" data-end="531">This creates a new list and extends the existing list.</p><hr data-start="533" data-end="536"><h4 data-start="538" data-end="603"><strong data-start="543" data-end="603">2. Using <code data-start="554" data-end="564">extend()</code> (Not Recommended for a Single Tuple)</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="604" data-end="653"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list.extend([(<span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'elderberry'</span>)])
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="654" data-end="763"><code data-start="654" data-end="664">extend()</code> is designed to add multiple elements from an iterable but works with a single tuple inside a list.</p><hr data-start="765" data-end="768"><h3 data-start="770" data-end="788"><strong data-start="774" data-end="788">Key Points</strong></h3><ul data-start="789" data-end="976"><li data-start="789" data-end="848"><code data-start="791" data-end="801">append()</code> adds the <strong data-start="811" data-end="827">entire tuple</strong> as a single element.</li><li data-start="849" data-end="922"><code data-start="851" data-end="861">extend()</code> should be used when adding multiple tuples from an iterable.</li><li data-start="923" data-end="976"><code data-start="925" data-end="929">+=</code> can be used but creates a new list internally.</li></ul><p data-start="978" data-end="1029" data-is-last-node="">Would you like additional examples or explanations?</p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 data-message-id="6ae4f45d-85b1-469c-8a7e-fc3ce3c91bce" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="101">To remove a row from a table in MySQL, use the <code data-start="47" data-end="55">DELETE</code> statement. Below are different ways to do it:</p><hr data-start="103" data-end="106"><h3 data-start="108" data-end="154"><strong data-start="112" data-end="154">1. Delete a Specific Row Using <code data-start="145" data-end="152">WHERE</code></strong></h3><p data-start="155" data-end="201">To delete a specific row based on a condition:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="202" data-end="264"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> table_name <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> column_name <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'value'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="265" data-end="277"><strong data-start="265" data-end="277">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="278" data-end="325"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> users <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> user_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">5</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="326" data-end="436"><li data-start="326" data-end="372">This removes the row where <code data-start="355" data-end="364">user_id</code> is <code data-start="368" data-end="371">5</code>.</li><li data-start="373" data-end="436">Always include a <code data-start="392" data-end="399">WHERE</code> clause to prevent deleting all rows.</li></ul><hr data-start="438" data-end="441"><h3 data-start="443" data-end="474"><strong data-start="447" data-end="474">2. Delete Multiple Rows</strong></h3><p data-start="475" data-end="522">To delete multiple rows that match a condition:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="523" data-end="567"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> users <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> age <span class="hljs-operator">&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-number">50</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="568" data-end="607"><li data-start="568" data-end="607">This removes all users older than 50.</li></ul><hr data-start="609" data-end="612"><h3 data-start="614" data-end="665"><strong data-start="618" data-end="665">3. Delete All Rows (<code data-start="640" data-end="650">TRUNCATE</code> vs <code data-start="654" data-end="662">DELETE</code>)</strong></h3><p data-start="666" data-end="714">If you want to remove <strong data-start="688" data-end="695">all</strong> rows from a table:</p><h4 data-start="716" data-end="760"><strong data-start="721" data-end="760">Using <code data-start="729" data-end="737">DELETE</code> (Can Be Rolled Back)</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="761" data-end="795"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> table_name;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="796" data-end="914"><li data-start="796" data-end="849">Deletes all rows <strong data-start="815" data-end="848">but keeps the table structure</strong>.</li><li data-start="850" data-end="914">If using transactions, you can <strong data-start="883" data-end="895">ROLLBACK</strong> before committing.</li></ul><h4 data-start="916" data-end="976"><strong data-start="921" data-end="976">Using <code data-start="929" data-end="939">TRUNCATE</code> (Faster but Cannot Be Rolled Back)</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="977" data-end="1014"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">TRUNCATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> table_name;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="1015" data-end="1103"><li data-start="1015" data-end="1078">Deletes all rows and <strong data-start="1038" data-end="1077">resets the <code data-start="1051" data-end="1067">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> counter</strong>.</li><li data-start="1079" data-end="1103">Cannot be rolled back.</li></ul><hr data-start="1105" data-end="1108"><h3 data-start="1110" data-end="1140"><strong data-start="1114" data-end="1140">4. Delete with <code data-start="1131" data-end="1138">LIMIT</code></strong></h3><p data-start="1141" data-end="1176">To delete a limited number of rows:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1177" data-end="1243"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> orders <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> status <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'cancelled'</span> LIMIT <span class="hljs-number">10</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="1244" data-end="1284"><li data-start="1244" data-end="1284">Deletes up to <strong data-start="1260" data-end="1266">10</strong> cancelled orders.</li></ul><hr data-start="1286" data-end="1289"><h3 data-start="1291" data-end="1354"><strong data-start="1295" data-end="1354">5. Delete with <code data-start="1312" data-end="1318">JOIN</code> (Deleting Based on Another Table)</strong></h3><p data-start="1355" data-end="1420">If you need to delete rows based on a condition in another table:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1421" data-end="1536"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> users <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> users
<span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> orders <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> users.user_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> orders.user_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> orders.status <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'cancelled'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="1537" data-end="1584"><li data-start="1537" data-end="1584">Deletes users who have only cancelled orders.</li></ul><hr data-start="1586" data-end="1589"><h3 data-start="1591" data-end="1635"><strong data-start="1595" data-end="1635">6. Delete and Reset <code data-start="1617" data-end="1633">AUTO_INCREMENT</code></strong></h3><p data-start="1636" data-end="1704">If you delete rows and want to reset the <strong data-start="1677" data-end="1703">auto-increment counter</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1705" data-end="1791"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> users <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> user_id <span class="hljs-operator">&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-number">10</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> users AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="1792" data-end="1883"><li data-start="1792" data-end="1883">This resets the <code data-start="1810" data-end="1826">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> value (if there are no rows left or IDs are sequential).</li></ul><hr data-start="1885" data-end="1888"><h3 data-start="1890" data-end="1912"><strong data-start="1894" data-end="1912">7. Safety Tips</strong></h3><p data-start="1913" data-end="2022"> Always use <code data-start="1926" data-end="1933">WHERE</code> to avoid deleting all rows accidentally.<br data-start="1974" data-end="1977"> Consider using a <strong data-start="1996" data-end="2011">transaction</strong> if needed:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2023" data-end="2154"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">START</span> TRANSACTION;
<span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> users <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> user_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">5</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">ROLLBACK</span>; <span class="hljs-comment">-- Undo delete (optional)</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">COMMIT</span>;   <span class="hljs-comment">-- Finalize delete</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2155" data-end="2220"> <strong data-start="2157" data-end="2181">Backup your database</strong> before running bulk delete operations.</p><p data-start="2222" data-end="2275" data-is-last-node="">Would you like more help with a specific use case? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" data-message-id="93f5e4c3-3ec1-4587-bdbc-2d0e8b04526c" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="100">You can loop over a list of 2-tuples in Python using a <code data-start="55" data-end="60">for</code> loop. Here are different ways to do it:</p><hr data-start="102" data-end="105"><h3 data-start="107" data-end="134"><strong data-start="111" data-end="134">1. Basic <code data-start="122" data-end="127">for</code> Loop</strong></h3><p data-start="135" data-end="175">Each tuple is unpacked into <code data-start="163" data-end="166">a</code> and <code data-start="171" data-end="174">b</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="176" data-end="300"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>my_list = [(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'apple'</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'banana'</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'cherry'</span>)]

<span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> a, b <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_list:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"ID: <span class="hljs-subst">{a}</span>, Fruit: <span class="hljs-subst">{b}</span>"</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="301" data-end="312"><strong data-start="301" data-end="312">Output:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="313" data-end="382"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">yaml</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre"><span><span class="hljs-attr">ID:</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span><span class="hljs-string">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">Fruit:</span> <span class="hljs-string">apple</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">ID:</span> <span class="hljs-number">2</span><span class="hljs-string">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">Fruit:</span> <span class="hljs-string">banana</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">ID:</span> <span class="hljs-number">3</span><span class="hljs-string">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">Fruit:</span> <span class="hljs-string">cherry</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="384" data-end="387"><h3 data-start="389" data-end="422"><strong data-start="393" data-end="422">2. Loop Without Unpacking</strong></h3><p data-start="423" data-end="505">If you dont need to unpack the tuple, you can iterate over the elements directly:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="506" data-end="605"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> item <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_list:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Tuple: <span class="hljs-subst">{item}</span>, First: <span class="hljs-subst">{item[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]}</span>, Second: <span class="hljs-subst">{item[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]}</span>"</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="606" data-end="617"><strong data-start="606" data-end="617">Output:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="618" data-end="764"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre"><span>Tuple: (<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'apple'</span>), <span class="hljs-keyword">First</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">Second</span>: apple
Tuple: (<span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'banana'</span>), <span class="hljs-keyword">First</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">Second</span>: banana
Tuple: (<span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'cherry'</span>), <span class="hljs-keyword">First</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">Second</span>: cherry
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="766" data-end="769"><h3 data-start="771" data-end="801"><strong data-start="775" data-end="801">3. Using <code data-start="786" data-end="799">enumerate()</code></strong></h3><p data-start="802" data-end="839">If you need an index while iterating:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="840" data-end="939"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> index, (a, b) <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">enumerate</span>(my_list):
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Row <span class="hljs-subst">{index}</span>: ID=<span class="hljs-subst">{a}</span>, Fruit=<span class="hljs-subst">{b}</span>"</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="940" data-end="951"><strong data-start="940" data-end="951">Output:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="952" data-end="1036"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre"><span><span class="hljs-type">Row</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>: ID<span class="hljs-operator">=</span><span class="hljs-number">1</span>, Fruit<span class="hljs-operator">=</span>apple
<span class="hljs-type">Row</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span>: ID<span class="hljs-operator">=</span><span class="hljs-number">2</span>, Fruit<span class="hljs-operator">=</span>banana

</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1038" data-end="1041"><h3 data-start="1043" data-end="1103"><strong data-start="1047" data-end="1103">4. Using List Comprehension (If You Need a New List)</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1104" data-end="1189"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>new_list = [<span class="hljs-string">f"ID: <span class="hljs-subst">{a}</span>, Fruit: <span class="hljs-subst">{b}</span>"</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> a, b <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_list]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(new_list)
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1190" data-end="1201"><strong data-start="1190" data-end="1201">Output:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1202" data-end="1287"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>[<span class="hljs-string">'ID: 1, Fruit: apple'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'ID: 2, Fruit: banana'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'ID: 3, Fruit: cherry'</span>]
