data-end="104">To determine the <strong data-start="17" data-end="35">AUTO_INCREMENT</strong> value for a given table in MySQL, you can use the following methods:</p><hr data-start="106" data-end="109"><h3 data-start="111" data-end="147"><strong data-start="115" data-end="147">1. Using <code data-start="126" data-end="145">SHOW TABLE STATUS</code></strong></h3><p data-start="148" data-end="236">This command provides metadata about a table, including the next <code data-start="213" data-end="229">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> value.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="238" data-end="285"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> STATUS <span class="hljs-keyword">LIKE</span> <span class="hljs-string">'table_name'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="287" data-end="299"><strong data-start="287" data-end="299">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="300" data-end="342"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> STATUS <span class="hljs-keyword">LIKE</span> <span class="hljs-string">'users'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="344" data-end="428"><li data-start="344" data-end="428">The <strong data-start="350" data-end="370"><code data-start="352" data-end="368">Auto_increment</code></strong> column in the result shows the next value to be assigned.</li></ul><hr data-start="430" data-end="433"><h3 data-start="435" data-end="479"><strong data-start="439" data-end="479">2. Using <code data-start="450" data-end="477">INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES</code></strong></h3><p data-start="480" data-end="554">You can query the <code data-start="498" data-end="518">INFORMATION_SCHEMA</code> to find the <code data-start="531" data-end="547">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> value:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="556" data-end="688"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> AUTO_INCREMENT
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
<span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> TABLE_SCHEMA <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'database_name'</span> 
<span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> TABLE_NAME <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'table_name'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="690" data-end="702"><strong data-start="690" data-end="702">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="703" data-end="828"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> AUTO_INCREMENT
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
<span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> TABLE_SCHEMA <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'my_database'</span> 
<span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> TABLE_NAME <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'users'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="830" data-end="925"><li data-start="830" data-end="885">Replace <code data-start="840" data-end="853">my_database</code> with your actual database name.</li><li data-start="886" data-end="925">Replace <code data-start="896" data-end="903">users</code> with your table name.</li></ul><hr data-start="927" data-end="930"><h3 data-start="932" data-end="974"><strong data-start="936" data-end="974">3. Using MySQL <code data-start="953" data-end="972">SHOW CREATE TABLE</code></strong></h3><p data-start="975" data-end="1073">This method shows the full table creation statement, which may include the <code data-start="1050" data-end="1066">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> value.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1075" data-end="1115"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> table_name;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1117" data-end="1129"><strong data-start="1117" data-end="1129">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1130" data-end="1165"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> users;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="1167" data-end="1220"><li data-start="1167" data-end="1220">Look for the <code data-start="1182" data-end="1199">AUTO_INCREMENT=</code> value in the output.</li></ul><hr data-start="1222" data-end="1225"><h3 data-start="1227" data-end="1270"><strong data-start="1231" data-end="1270">4. Using Python (<code data-start="1250" data-end="1267">mysql.connector</code>)</strong></h3><p data-start="1271" data-end="1315">To fetch the auto-increment value in Python:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1316" data-end="1812"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> mysql.connector

conn = mysql.connector.connect(
    host=<span class="hljs-string">"localhost"</span>,
    user=<span class="hljs-string">"your_user"</span>,
    password=<span class="hljs-string">"your_password"</span>,
    database=<span class="hljs-string">"your_database"</span>
)

cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(<span class="hljs-string">"""
    SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT 
    FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
    WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'your_database' 
    AND TABLE_NAME = 'your_table';
"""</span>)

auto_increment_value = cursor.fetchone()[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]
<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Next AUTO_INCREMENT value: <span class="hljs-subst">{auto_increment_value}</span>"</span>)

cursor.close()
conn.close()
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1814" data-end="1817"><h3 data-start="1819" data-end="1851"><strong data-start="1823" data-end="1851">Understanding the Output</strong></h3><ul data-start="1852" data-end="2221"><li data-start="1852" data-end="1953">If <code data-start="1857" data-end="1873">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> is <strong data-start="1877" data-end="1887"><code data-start="1879" data-end="1885">NULL</code></strong>, it means the table <strong data-start="1908" data-end="1925">does not have</strong> an <code data-start="1929" data-end="1945">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> column.</li><li data-start="1954" data-end="2221">If rows have been deleted, the next <code data-start="1992" data-end="2008">AUTO_INCREMENT</code> value <strong data-start="2015" data-end="2027">does not</strong> automatically reset. You can reset it manually:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2078" data-end="2143"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> table_name AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> new_value;
</span></code></div></div></pre><em data-start="2146" data-end="2221">(Make sure <code data-start="2158" data-end="2169">new_value</code> is greater than the highest existing primary key.)</em></li></ul><p data-start="2223" data-end="2285" data-is-last-node="">Would you like help adjusting this for a specific use case? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M11 4.9099C11 4.47485 10.4828 4.24734 10.1621 4.54132L6.67572 7.7372C6.49129 7.90626 6.25019 8.00005 6 8.00005H4C3.44772 8.00005 3 8.44776 3 9.00005V15C3 15.5523 3.44772 16 4 16H6C6.25019 16 6.49129 16.0938 6.67572 16.2629L10.1621 19.4588C10.4828 19.7527 11 19.5252 11 19.0902V4.9099ZM8.81069 3.06701C10.4142 1.59714 13 2.73463 13 4.9099V19.0902C13 21.2655 10.4142 22.403 8.81069 20.9331L5.61102 18H4C2.34315 18 1 16.6569 1 15V9.00005C1 7.34319 2.34315 6.00005 4 6.00005H5.61102L8.81069 3.06701ZM20.3166 6.35665C20.8019 6.09313 21.409 6.27296 21.6725 6.75833C22.5191 8.3176 22.9996 10.1042 22.9996 12.0001C22.9996 13.8507 22.5418 15.5974 21.7323 17.1302C21.4744 17.6185 20.8695 17.8054 20.3811 17.5475C19.8927 17.2896 19.7059 16.6846 19.9638 16.1962C20.6249 14.9444 20.9996 13.5175 20.9996 12.0001C20.9996 10.4458 20.6064 8.98627 19.9149 7.71262C19.6514 7.22726 19.8312 6.62017 20.3166 6.35665ZM15.7994 7.90049C16.241 7.5688 16.8679 7.65789 17.1995 8.09947C18.0156 9.18593 18.4996 10.5379 18.4996 12.0001C18.4996 13.3127 18.1094 14.5372 17.4385 15.5604C17.1357 16.0222 16.5158 16.1511 16.0539 15.8483C15.5921 15.5455 15.4632 14.9255 15.766 14.4637C16.2298 13.7564 16.4996 12.9113 16.4996 12.0001C16.4996 10.9859 16.1653 10.0526 15.6004 9.30063C15.2687 8.85905 15.3578 8.23218 15.7994 7.90049Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg></span></button></span><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Copy" data-testid="copy-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 type <code data-start="471" data-end="476">INT</code>.</li><li data-start="478" data-end="575"><code data-start="480" data-end="511">ADD COLUMN unique_factors INT</code>: Adds a new column named <code class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="0334d3e2-5c6e-444b-859f-daffee3cc0da" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="199">Yes! You can use an <strong data-start="20" data-end="42"><code data-start="22" data-end="30">UPDATE</code> statement</strong> with a <strong data-start="50" data-end="72"><code data-start="52" data-end="58">JOIN</code> and <code data-start="63" data-end="70">SUM()</code></strong> to set the <code data-start="84" data-end="98">total_factor</code> field in the <code data-start="112" data-end="121">Numbers</code> table based on the sum of the <code data-start="152" data-end="162">exponent</code> field from the <code data-start="178" data-end="192">PrimeFactors</code> table.</p><h3 data-start="201" data-end="219"><strong data-start="205" data-end="219">SQL Query:</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="220" data-end="376"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">UPDATE</span> Numbers n
<span class="hljs-keyword">SET</span> n.total_factor <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> (
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">COALESCE</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">SUM</span>(pf.exponent), <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> PrimeFactors pf
    <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> pf.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number_id
);
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="378" data-end="381"><h3 data-start="383" data-end="403"><strong data-start="387" data-end="403">Explanation:</strong></h3><ol data-start="404" data-end="997"><li data-start="404" data-end="507"><p data-start="407" data-end="431"><strong data-start="407" data-end="429"><code data-start="409" data-end="427">UPDATE Numbers n</code></strong></p><ul data-start="435" data-end="507"><li data-start="435" data-end="503">Specifies that we are updating the <code data-start="472" data-end="481">Numbers</code> table with alias <code data-start="499" data-end="502">n</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="508" data-end="622"><p data-start="511" data-end="545"><strong data-start="511" data-end="543"><code data-start="513" data-end="541">SET n.total_factor = (...)</code></strong></p><ul data-start="549" data-end="622"><li data-start="549" data-end="622">We update <code data-start="561" data-end="575">total_factor</code> with the sum of exponents from <code data-start="607" data-end="621">PrimeFactors</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="624" data-end="731"><p data-start="627" data-end="658"><strong data-start="627" data-end="656"><code data-start="629" data-end="654">SELECT SUM(pf.exponent)</code></strong></p><ul data-start="662" data-end="731"><li data-start="662" data-end="731">Calculates the total sum of <code data-start="692" data-end="702">exponent</code> values for each <code data-start="719" data-end="730">number_id</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="733" data-end="847"><p data-start="736" data-end="776"><strong data-start="736" data-end="774"><code data-start="738" data-end="772">WHERE pf.number_id = n.number_id</code></strong></p><ul data-start="780" data-end="847"><li data-start="780" data-end="847">Ensures we only sum the exponents that belong to the same number.</li></ul></li><li data-start="849" data-end="997"><p data-start="852" data-end="889"><strong data-start="852" data-end="887"><code data-start="854" data-end="885">COALESCE(SUM(pf.exponent), 0)</code></strong></p><ul data-start="893" data-end="997"><li data-start="893" data-end="997">If there are no prime factors for a number, it ensures <code data-start="950" data-end="964">total_factor</code> is set to <code data-start="975" data-end="978">0</code> instead of <code data-start="990" data-end="996">NULL</code>.</li></ul></li></ol><hr data-start="999" data-end="1002"><h3 data-start="1004" data-end="1032"><strong data-start="1008" data-end="1032">Verifying the Update</strong></h3><p data-end="58">JOIN</code> and <code data-start="63" data-end="72">COUNT()</code></strong> to set the <code data-start="86" data-end="102">unique_factors</code> field in the <code data-start="116" data-end="125">Numbers</code> table based on the count of related rows in the <code data-start="174" data-end="188">PrimeFactors</code> table.</p><h3 data-start="197" data-end="215"><strong data-start="201" data-end="215">SQL Query:</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="216" data-end="376"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">UPDATE</span> Numbers n
<span class="hljs-keyword">SET</span> n.unique_factors <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> (
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">COALESCE</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">COUNT</span>(pf.prime_id), <span class="hljs-number">0</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> PrimeFactors pf
    <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> pf.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number_id
);
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="378" data-end="381"><h3 data-start="383" data-end="403"><strong data-start="387" data-end="403">Explanation:</strong></h3><ol data-start="404" data-end="1051"><li data-start="404" data-end="503"><p data-start="407" data-end="431"><strong data-start="407" data-end="429"><code data-start="409" data-end="427">UPDATE Numbers n</code></strong></p><ul data-start="435" data-end="503"><li data-start="435" data-end="503">Specifies that we are updating the <code data-start="472" data-end="481">Numbers</code> table with alias <code data-start="499" data-end="502">n</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="505" data-end="624"><p data-start="508" data-end="544"><strong data-start="508" data-end="542"><code data-start="510" data-end="540">SET n.unique_factors = (...)</code></strong></p><ul data-start="548" data-end="624"><li data-start="548" data-end="624">Updates <code data-start="558" data-end="574">unique_factors</code> with the count of related rows in <code data-start="609" data-end="623">PrimeFactors</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="626" data-end="724"><p data-start="629" data-end="662"><strong data-start="629" data-end="660"><code data-start="631" data-end="658">SELECT COUNT(pf.prime_id)</code></strong></p><ul data-start="666" data-end="724"><li data-start="666" data-end="724">Counts the number of prime factors for each <code data-start="712" data-end="723">number_id</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="726" data-end="852"><p data-start="729" data-end="769"><strong data-start="729" data-end="767"><code data-start="731" data-end="765">WHERE pf.number_id = n.number_id</code></strong></p><ul data-start="773" data-end="852"><li data-start="773" data-end="852">Ensures that only prime factors related to the given <code data-start="828" data-end="839">number_id</code> are counted.</li></ul></li><li data-start="854" data-end="1051"><p data-start="857" data-end="896"><strong data-start="857" data-end="894"><code data-start="859" data-end="892">COALESCE(COUNT(pf.prime_id), 0)</code></strong></p><ul data-start="900" data-end="1051"><li data-start="900" data-end="1051">If no prime factors exist for a number, <code data-start="942" data-end="951">COUNT()</code> would return <code data-start="965" data-end="971">NULL</code>, so we use <code data-start="983" data-end="1001">COALESCE(..., 0)</code> to ensure <code data-start="1012" data-end="1028">unique_factors</code> is set to <code data-start="1039" data-end="1042">0</code> instead.</li></ul></li></ol><hr data-start="1053" data-end="1056"><h3 data-start="1058" data-end="1086"><strong data-start="1062" data-end="1086">Verifying the Update</strong></h3><p data-start="1087" data-end="1132">After executing the query, check the results:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1133" data-end="1190"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> number_id, unique_factors </span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1192" data-end="1311" data-is-last-node="">Would you also like a <strong data-start="1214" data-end="1225">trigger</strong> to automatically update <code [.group\/conversation-turn:hover_&amp;]:block"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button aria-label="Edit message" class="flex h-9 w-9 items-center justify-center rounded-full focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-79" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="9c9ec009-29d5-4c59-88e3-0d1de44a22f5" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="139">Yes! You can rename a field (column) in a MySQL table using the <code data-start="64" data-end="77">ALTER TABLE</code> statement with the <code data-start="97" data-end="112">CHANGE COLUMN</code> or <code data-start="116" data-end="131">RENAME COLUMN</code> clause.</p><hr data-start="141" data-end="144"><h3 data-start="146" data-end="208"><strong data-start="150" data-end="208">1. Using <code data-start="161" data-end="176">CHANGE COLUMN</code> (Works in All MySQL Versions)</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="209" data-end="302"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> table_name 
CHANGE <span class="hljs-keyword">COLUMN</span> old_column_name new_column_name column_type;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="303" data-end="535"><li data-start="303" data-end="351"><code data-start="305" data-end="317">table_name</code>: The table containing the column.</li><li data-start="352" data-end="397"><code data-start="354" data-end="371">old_column_name</code>: The current column name.</li><li data-start="398" data-end="447"><code data-start="400" data-end="417">new_column_name</code>: The new name for the column.</li><li data-start="448" data-end="535"><code data-start="450" data-end="463">column_type</code>: The column's existing data type (required when using <code data-start="518" data-end="533">CHANGE COLUMN</code>).</li></ul><p data-start="537" data-end="549"><strong data-start="537" data-end="549">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="550" data-end="637"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> Numbers 
CHANGE <span class="hljs-keyword">COLUMN</span> total_factor total_exponent <span class="hljs-type">INT</span> UNSIGNED;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="638" data-end="726"><li data-start="638" data-end="726">This renames <code data-start="653" data-end="667">total_factor</code> to <code data-start="671" data-end="687">total_exponent</code> while keeping the <code data-start="706" data-end="720">INT UNSIGNED</code> type.</li></ul><hr data-start="728" data-end="731"><h3 data-start="733" data-end="778"><strong data-start="737" data-end="778">2. Using <code data-start="748" data-end="763">RENAME COLUMN</code> (MySQL 8.0+)</strong></h3><p data-start="779" data-end="865">If you're using <strong data-start="795" data-end="817">MySQL 8.0 or later</strong>, you can use <code data-start="831" data-end="846">RENAME COLUMN</code>, which is simpler:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="866" data-end="950"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> table_name 
RENAME <span class="hljs-keyword">COLUMN</span> old_column_name <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> new_column_name;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="952" data-end="964"><strong data-start="952" data-end="964">Example:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="965" data-end="1042"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> Numbers 
RENAME <span class="hljs-keyword">COLUMN</span> total_factor <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> total_exponent;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="1043" data-end="1131"><li data-start="1043" data-end="1131">This renames <code data-start="1058" data-end="1072">total_factor</code> to <code data-start="1076" data-end="1092">total_exponent</code> <strong data-start="1093" data-end="1130">without requiring the column type</strong>.</li></ul><hr data-start="1133" data-end="1136"><h3 data-start="1138" data-end="1169"><strong data-start="1142" data-end="1169">3. Verifying the Change</strong></h3><p data-start="1170" data-end="1223">After renaming the column, check the table structure:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1224" data-end="1252"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DESCRIBE</span> Numbers;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1253" data-end="1255">or</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1256" data-end="1293"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> COLUMNS <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> Numbers;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1295" data-end="1298"><h3 data-start="1300" data-end="1326"><strong data-start="1304" data-end="1326">Things to Consider</strong></h3><p data-start="1327" data-end="1559"> <strong data-start="1329" data-end="1355">Check for dependencies</strong> (views, stored procedures, foreign keys) that may reference the column.<br data-start="1427" data-end="1430"> <strong data-start="1432" data-end="1475">Ensure no queries or applications break</strong> after renaming a column.<br data-start="1500" data-end="1503"> <strong data-start="1505" data-end="1529">Backup your database</strong> before making schema changes.</p><p data-start="1561" data-end="1635" data-is-last-node="">Would you like help updating queries that reference the renamed column? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary 12.5196 16.7071 12.7071L10.7071 18.7071C10.3166 19.0976 9.68342 19.0976 9.29289 18.7071Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg></button></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></article><article class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-81" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="fa49aa64-a79a-4929-ad8a-b0b090f4f90f" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="161">To create a MySQL user and grant it <code data-start="36" data-end="44">SELECT</code>, <code data-start="46" data-end="54">INSERT</code>, <code data-start="56" data-end="64">UPDATE</code>, and <code data-start="70" data-end="78">DELETE</code> privileges on all tables in the <code data-start="111" data-end="117">PFEN</code> database, use the following SQL statements:</p><hr data-start="163" data-end="166"><h3 data-start="168" data-end="194"><strong data-start="172" data-end="194">1. Create the User</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="195" data-end="273"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">USER</span> <span class="hljs-string">'new_user'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span> IDENTIFIED <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> <span class="hljs-string">'secure_password'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="274" data-end="454"><li data-start="274" data-end="323">Replace <code data-start="284" data-end="296">'new_user'</code> with the desired username.</li><li data-start="324" data-end="400">Replace <code data-start="334" data-end="347">'localhost'</code> with <code data-start="353" data-end="357">'%</code>' if the user should connect from any host.</li><li data-start="401" data-end="454">Replace <code data-start="411" data-end="430">'secure_password'</code> with a strong password.</li></ul><hr data-start="456" data-end="459"><h3 data-start="461" data-end="488"><strong data-start="465" data-end="488">2. Grant Privileges</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="489" data-end="573"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">GRANT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">INSERT</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">UPDATE</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> PFEN.<span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> <span class="hljs-string">'new_user'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="574" data-end="722"><li data-start="574" data-end="644"><code data-start="576" data-end="584">PFEN.*</code> grants privileges on <strong data-start="606" data-end="620">all tables</strong> in the <code data-start="628" data-end="634">PFEN</code> database.</li><li data-start="645" data-end="722">The privileges allow the user to <strong data-start="680" data-end="713">read, add, modify, and delete</strong> records.</li></ul><hr data-start="724" data-end="727"><h3 data-start="729" data-end="753"><strong data-start="733" data-end="753">3. Apply Changes</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="754" data-end="782"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="783" data-end="838"><li data-start="783" data-end="838">Ensures MySQL applies the new privileges immediately.</li></ul><hr data-start="840" data-end="843"><h3 data-start="845" data-end="873"><strong data-start="849" data-end="873">4. Verify Privileges</strong></h3><p data-start="874" data-end="906">To check the granted privileges:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="907" data-end="957"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> GRANTS <span class="hljs-keyword">FOR</span> <span class="hljs-string">'new_user'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'localhost'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="959" data-end="962"><h3 data-start="964" data-end="1003"><strong data-start="968" data-end="1003">Allow Remote Access (If Needed)</strong></h3><p data-start="1004" data-end="1079">If the user should be able to connect from any host (not just <code data-start="1066" data-end="1077">localhost</code>):</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1080" data-end="1234"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">USER</span> <span class="hljs-string">'new_user'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'%'</span> IDENTIFIED <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> <span class="hljs-string">'secure_password'</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">GRANT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">INSERT</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">UPDATE</span>, <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> PFEN.<span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TO</span> <span class="hljs-string">'new_user'</span>@<span class="hljs-string">'%'</span>;
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1236" data-end="1239"><h3 data-start="1241" data-end="1273"><strong data-start="1245" data-end="1273">Security Recommendations</strong></h3><p data-start="1274" data-end="1461"> Use <strong data-start="1280" data-end="1300">strong passwords</strong>.<br data-start="1301" data-end="1304"> Restrict access by setting a <strong data-start="1335" data-end="1355">specific host/IP</strong> instead of <code data-start="1367" data-end="1370">%</code>.<br data-start="1371" data-end="1374"> Only grant <strong data-start="1387" data-end="1411">necessary privileges</strong> to follow the <strong data-start="1426" data-end="1458">principle of least privilege</strong>.</p><p data-start="1463" data-end="1577" data-is-last-node="">Would you like any further restrictions or configurations, such as <strong data-start="1530" data-end="1550">read-only access</strong> or <strong data-start="1554" data-end="1573">SSL enforcement</strong>? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 data-message-id="d1269dfe-35a4-4ada-a3e6-107aaf976456" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="181">To find the <code data-start="12" data-end="23">number_id</code> that <strong data-start="29" data-end="48">exactly matches</strong> a given set of prime factors in the <code data-start="85" data-end="99">PrimeFactors</code> table (i.e., it contains all and only the specified factors), follow these steps:</p><hr data-start="183" data-end="186"><h3 data-start="188" data-end="206"><strong data-start="192" data-end="206">SQL Query:</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="207" data-end="1011"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">WITH</span> GivenFactors <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> (
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> prime_id, exponent <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> PrimeFactors <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> ?  <span class="hljs-comment">-- Replace ? with a specific number_id or use a subquery</span>
),
MatchingNumbers <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> (
    <span class="hljs-comment">-- Find number_id values that contain at least the given prime factors</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> pf.number_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> PrimeFactors pf
    <span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> GivenFactors gf <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.prime_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> gf.prime_id <span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> pf.exponent <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> gf.exponent
    <span class="hljs-keyword">GROUP</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> pf.number_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">HAVING</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">COUNT</span>(<span class="hljs-operator">*</span>) <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">COUNT</span>(<span class="hljs-operator">*</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> GivenFactors)  <span class="hljs-comment">-- Ensure all given factors exist</span>
)
<span class="hljs-comment">-- Ensure the candidate number_id contains only the given factors</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> mn.number_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> MatchingNumbers mn
<span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">EXISTS</span> (
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> PrimeFactors pf
    <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> pf.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> mn.number_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> (pf.prime_id, pf.exponent) <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">IN</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> prime_id, exponent <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> GivenFactors)
);
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1013" data-end="1016"><h3 data-start="1018" data-end="1038"><strong data-start="1022" data-end="1038">Explanation:</strong></h3><ol data-start="1039" data-end="1571"><li data-start="1039" data-end="1183"><p data-start="1042" data-end="1067"><strong data-start="1042" data-end="1064"><code data-start="1044" data-end="1058">GivenFactors</code> CTE</strong>:</p><ul data-start="1071" data-end="1183"><li data-start="1071" data-end="1183">Extracts the prime factors and their exponents for a given <code data-start="1132" data-end="1143">number_id</code> (or a predefined set of prime factors).</li></ul></li><li data-start="1185" data-end="1418"><p data-start="1188" data-end="1216"><strong data-start="1188" data-end="1213"><code data-start="1190" data-end="1207">MatchingNumbers</code> CTE</strong>:</p><ul data-start="1220" data-end="1418"><li data-start="1220" data-end="1319">Finds <code data-start="1228" data-end="1239">number_id</code> values that contain at least the given prime factors and match their exponents.</li><li data-start="1323" data-end="1418">Uses <code data-start="1330" data-end="1385">HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GivenFactors)</code> to ensure <strong data-start="1396" data-end="1403">all</strong> factors match.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1420" data-end="1571"><p data-start="1423" data-end="1462"><strong data-start="1423" data-end="1459">Final <code data-start="1431" data-end="1439">SELECT</code> with <code data-start="1445" data-end="1457">NOT EXISTS</code></strong>:</p><ul data-start="1466" data-end="1571"><li data-start="1466" data-end="1571">Ensures the candidate <code data-start="1490" data-end="1501">number_id</code> does not have <strong data-start="1516" data-end="1525">extra</strong> prime factors beyond those in <code data-start="1556" data-end="1570">GivenFactors</code>.</li></ul></li></ol><hr data-start="1573" data-end="1576"><h3 data-start="1578" data-end="1602"><strong data-start="1582" data-end="1602">Use Case Example</strong></h3><p data-start="1603" data-end="1830">If you are looking for a <code data-start="1628" data-end="1639">number_id</code> that exactly matches <code data-start="1661" data-end="1719">{(prime_id: 2, exponent: 3), (prime_id: 5, exponent: 1)}</code>, replace <code data-start="1729" data-end="1732">?</code> in the query with a specific <code data-start="1762" data-end="1773">number_id</code> or use a subquery to dynamically provide <code data-start="1815" data-end="1829">GivenFactors</code>.</p><p data-start="1832" data-end="1943" data-is-last-node="">Would you like me to adjust the query for a different use case, such as checking from an input list instead? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex data-testid="conversation-turn-86" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="e575e6ce-f8aa-4f76-aca8-c03ce7253203" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 class="icon-md"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M13.2929 4.29291C15.0641 2.52167 17.9359 2.52167 19.7071 4.2929C21.4784 6.06414 21.4784 8.93588 19.7071 10.7071L18.7073 11.7069L11.6135
