class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-101" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="7af56dee-0303-45d9-98d0-8cdbd4f04ebe" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="320">The error <strong data-start="10" data-end="66">"1064 (42000): You have an error in your SQL syntax"</strong> is caused by the incorrect usage of the <code data-start="107" data-end="115">VALUES</code> clause inside a <code data-start="132" data-end="138">WITH</code> statement. <strong data-start="150" data-end="239">MySQL does not support <code data-start="175" data-end="183">VALUES</code> directly in a <code data-start="198" data-end="204">WITH</code> (Common Table Expression - CTE).</strong> Instead, you should use <code data-start="264" data-end="286">SELECT ... UNION ALL</code> to define the <code data-start="301" data-end="315">GivenFactors</code> CTE.</p><hr data-start="322" data-end="325"><h2 data-start="327" data-end="383"><strong data-start="330" data-end="383"> Fixed Version of <code data-start="352" data-end="381">find_number_by_primefactors</code></strong></h2><p data-start="384" data-end="464">Heres the corrected query using <strong data-start="417" data-end="443"><code data-start="419" data-end="441">SELECT ... UNION ALL</code></strong> instead of <code data-start="455" data-end="463">VALUES</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="466" data-end="1642"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">find_number_by_primefactors</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, prime_factors</span>):
    <span class="hljs-comment"># Convert prime numbers to their corresponding prime_id using self.prime_ids</span>
    primeid_factors = [(self.prime_ids[pf[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]], pf[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> pf <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> prime_factors]

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Build the GivenFactors CTE dynamically using SELECT ... UNION ALL</span>
    given_factors_sql = <span class="hljs-string">" UNION ALL "</span>.join(
        <span class="hljs-string">"SELECT %s AS prime_id, %s AS exponent"</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> _ <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> primeid_factors
    )
    values = [val <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> pair <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> primeid_factors <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> val <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> pair]  <span class="hljs-comment"># Flatten values</span>

    sql = <span class="hljs-string">f"""
    WITH GivenFactors AS (
        <span class="hljs-subst">{given_factors_sql}</span>
    ),
    MatchingNumbers AS (
        SELECT pf.number_id
        FROM PrimeFactors pf
        JOIN GivenFactors gf ON pf.prime_id = gf.prime_id AND pf.exponent = gf.exponent
        GROUP BY pf.number_id
        HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GivenFactors)
    )
    SELECT mn.number_id
    FROM MatchingNumbers mn
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM PrimeFactors pf
        WHERE pf.number_id = mn.number_id
        AND (pf.prime_id, pf.exponent) NOT IN (SELECT prime_id, exponent FROM GivenFactors)
    );
    """</span>

    result = self.query(sql, values)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> result <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1644" data-end="1647"><h2 data-start="1649" data-end="1679"><strong data-start="1652" data-end="1679"> Explanation of Fixes</strong></h2><ol data-start="1680" data-end="2618"><li data-start="1680" data-end="2105"><p data-start="1683" data-end="1766"><strong data-start="1683" data-end="1766"> MySQL does not support <code data-start="1710" data-end="1718">VALUES</code> inside <code data-start="1726" data-end="1732">WITH</code>   Used <code data-start="1742" data-end="1764">SELECT ... UNION ALL</code></strong></p><ul data-start="1770" data-end="2105"><li data-start="1770" data-end="1904"> <strong data-start="1774" data-end="1787">Incorrect</strong>:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1794" data-end="1904"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">WITH</span> GivenFactors (prime_id, exponent) <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> (
    <span class="hljs-keyword">VALUES</span> (<span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
)
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="1908" data-end="2105"> <strong data-start="1912" data-end="1923">Correct</strong>:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1930" data-end="2105"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">WITH</span> GivenFactors <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> (
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> prime_id, <span class="hljs-number">1</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> exponent
    <span class="hljs-keyword">UNION</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ALL</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">UNION</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ALL</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
)
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul></li><li data-start="2107" data-end="2399"><p data-start="2110" data-end="2185"><strong data-start="2110" data-end="2185"> Uses Python's <code data-start="2128" data-end="2136">join()</code> to dynamically generate <code data-start="2161" data-end="2183">SELECT ... UNION ALL</code></strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2189" data-end="2325"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>given_factors_sql = <span class="hljs-string">" UNION ALL "</span>.join(
    <span class="hljs-string">"SELECT %s AS prime_id, %s AS exponent"</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> _ <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> primeid_factors
)
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="2329" data-end="2399"><li data-start="2329" data-end="2399">This dynamically creates the CTE based on the given <code data-start="2383" data-end="2398">prime_factors</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="2401" data-end="2618"><p data-start="2404" data-end="2459"><strong data-start="2404" data-end="2459"> Uses <code data-start="2413" data-end="2421">values</code> list for safe parameterized queries</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2463" data-end="2580"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>values = [val <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> pair <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> primeid_factors <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> val <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> pair]  <span class="hljs-comment"># Flattens [(1,1), (2,1)]  [1,1,2,1]</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="2584" data-end="2618"><li data-start="2584" data-end="2618">This avoids SQL injection risks.</li></ul></li></ol><hr data-start="2620" data-end="2623"><h2 data-start="2625" data-end="2647"><strong data-start="2628" data-end="2647"> Example Usage</strong></h2><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2648" data-end="2926"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>prime_db = PrimeDB()
primefactor_db = PrimeFactorDB(prime_db)

prime_factors = [(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>), (<span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)]  <span class="hljs-comment"># Example: (prime_number, exponent)</span>

</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="2928" data-end="2931"><h2 data-start="2933" data-end="2954"><strong data-start="2936" data-end="2954"> Final Notes</strong></h2><p data-start="2955" data-end="3189"> <strong data-start="2957" data-end="2987">Fixes the SQL syntax error</strong><br data-start="2987" data-end="2990"> <strong data-start="2992" data-end="3064">Efficiently finds the exact <code data-start="3022" data-end="3033">number_id</code> matching given prime factors</strong><br data-start="3064" data-end="3067"> <strong data-start="3069" data-end="3124">Uses <code data-start="3076" data-end="3098">SELECT ... UNION ALL</code> for MySQL compatibility</strong><br data-start="3124" data-end="3127"> <strong data-start="3129" data-end="3187">Safe against SQL injection using parameterized queries</strong></p><p data-start="3191" data-end="3304" data-is-last-node="">Would you like additional improvements, such as handling cases where a prime is missing from <code data-start="3284" focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-103" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="144eacbc-f829-4de9-baca-8e0766bc98d3" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="313">Your error is due to MySQL <strong data-start="27" data-end="139">not supporting <code data-start="44" data-end="50">WITH</code> (Common Table Expressions, CTEs) with <code data-start="89" data-end="111">SELECT ... UNION ALL</code> directly as a table alias</strong> in older versions of MySQL (pre-8.0). If you're using <strong data-start="194" data-end="218">MySQL 5.7 or earlier</strong>, you cannot use CTEs, and you'll need to use <strong data-start="264" data-end="304">a temporary table or a derived table</strong> instead.</p><hr data-start="315" data-end="318"><h2 data-start="320" data-end="381"><strong data-start="323" data-end="381"> Fixed Query: Using a Derived Table Instead of <code data-start="373" data-end="379">WITH</code></strong></h2><p data-start="382" data-end="523">Since MySQL <strong data-start="394" data-end="449">does not support <code data-start="413" data-end="421">VALUES</code> or <code data-start="425" data-end="431">WITH</code> in this context</strong>, we need to use a <strong data-start="468" data-end="497">subquery with <code data-start="484" data-end="495">UNION ALL</code></strong> inside the <code data-start="509" data-end="515">FROM</code> clause.</p><h3 data-start="525" data-end="551"><strong data-start="529" data-end="551"> Corrected Code:</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="552" data-end="1773"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">find_number_by_primefactors</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, prime_factors</span>):
    <span class="hljs-comment"># Convert prime numbers to their corresponding prime_id using self.prime_ids</span>
    primeid_factors = [(self.prime_ids[pf[<span class="hljs-number">0</span>]], pf[<span class="hljs-number">1</span>]) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> pf <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> prime_factors]

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Build the GivenFactors dynamically using SELECT ... UNION ALL</span>
    given_factors_sql = <span class="hljs-string">" UNION ALL "</span>.join(
        <span class="hljs-string">"SELECT %s AS prime_id, %s AS exponent"</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> _ <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> primeid_factors
    )
    values = [val <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> pair <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> primeid_factors <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> val <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> pair]  <span class="hljs-comment"># Flatten values</span>

    sql = <span class="hljs-string">f"""
    SELECT mn.number_id
    FROM (
        SELECT pf.number_id
        FROM PrimeFactors pf
        JOIN (
            <span class="hljs-subst">{given_factors_sql}</span>
        ) AS GivenFactors ON pf.prime_id = GivenFactors.prime_id AND pf.exponent = GivenFactors.exponent
        GROUP BY pf.number_id
        HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( <span class="hljs-subst">{given_factors_sql}</span> ) AS GF)
    ) AS mn
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM PrimeFactors pf
        WHERE pf.number_id = mn.number_id
        AND (pf.prime_id, pf.exponent) NOT IN (SELECT prime_id, exponent FROM ( <span class="hljs-subst">{given_factors_sql}</span> ) AS GF2)
    );
    """</span>

    result = self.query(sql, values * <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Triple values to replace all occurrences</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> result <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1775" data-end="1778"><h3 data-start="1780" data-end="1811"><strong data-start="1784" data-end="1811"> Explanation of Fixes</strong></h3><ol data-start="1812" data-end="2343"><li data-start="1812" data-end="2107"><p data-start="1815" data-end="1898"><strong data-start="1815" data-end="1898"> Removed <code data-start="1827" data-end="1833">WITH</code> (CTE)   Used a Derived Table (<code data-start="1866" data-end="1895">JOIN (SELECT ... UNION ALL)</code>)</strong></p><ul data-start="1902" data-end="2107"><li data-start="1902" data-end="1956"> MySQL does not support <code data-start="1929" data-end="1935">WITH</code> in pre-8.0 versions.</li><li data-start="1960" data-end="2107"> Used:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1975" data-end="2107"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> (
   <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">2</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> prime_id, <span class="hljs-number">3</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> exponent
   <span class="hljs-keyword">UNION</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ALL</span>
   <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
) <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> GivenFactors
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul></li><li data-start="2109" data-end="2343"><p data-start="2112" data-end="2170"><strong data-start="2112" data-end="2170"> Used <code data-start="2121" data-end="2133">values * 3</code> to replace all placeholders (<code data-start="2163" data-end="2167">%s</code>)</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2174" data-end="2230"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>result = self.query(sql, values * <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="2234" data-end="2343"><li data-start="2234" data-end="2343">Since <code data-start="2242" data-end="2261">given_factors_sql</code> is used <strong data-start="2270" data-end="2285">three times</strong> in the SQL query, we need to repeat <code data-start="2322" data-end="2330">values</code> three times.</li></ul></li></ol><hr data-start="2345" data-end="2348"><h2 data-start="2350" data-end="2372"><strong data-start="2353" data-end="2372"> Example Usage</strong></h2><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2373" data-end="2651"><div primefactor_db = PrimeFactorDB(prime_db)

data-start="2802" data-end="2813">number_id</code> matching the exact prime factors</strong><br data-start="2848" data-end="2851"> <strong data-start="2853" data-end="2911">Avoids SQL injection risks whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="212">Yes! I will now fix <code data-start="20" data-end="54">find_number_by_primefactor_ids()</code> using the <strong data-start="65" data-end="82">same approach</strong> as the corrected <code data-start="100" data-end="131">find_number_by_primefactors()</code>, replacing the <strong data-start="147" data-end="161"><code data-start="149" data-end="155">WITH</code> CTE</strong> with a <strong data-start="169" data-end="211">derived table (<code data-start="186" data-end="208">SELECT ... UNION ALL</code>)</strong>.</p><hr data-start="214" data-end="217"><h3 data-start="219" data-end="270"><strong data-start="223" data-end="270"> Fixed <code data-start="234" data-end="268">find_number_by_primefactor_ids()</code></strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="271" data-end="1337"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">find_number_by_primefactor_ids</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, primeid_factors</span>):
    <span class="hljs-comment"># Build the GivenFactors dynamically using SELECT ... UNION ALL</span>
    given_factors_sql = <span class="hljs-string">" UNION ALL "</span>.join(
        <span class="hljs-string">"SELECT %s AS prime_id, %s AS exponent"</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> _ <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> primeid_factors
    )
    values = [val <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> pair <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> primeid_factors <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> val <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> pair]  <span class="hljs-comment"># Flatten values</span>

    sql = <span class="hljs-string">f"""
    SELECT mn.number_id
    FROM (
        SELECT pf.number_id
        FROM PrimeFactors pf
        JOIN (
            <span class="hljs-subst">{given_factors_sql}</span>
        ) AS GivenFactors ON pf.prime_id = GivenFactors.prime_id AND pf.exponent = GivenFactors.exponent
        GROUP BY pf.number_id
        HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( <span class="hljs-subst">{given_factors_sql}</span> ) AS GF)
    ) AS mn
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM PrimeFactors pf
        WHERE pf.number_id = mn.number_id
        AND (pf.prime_id, pf.exponent) NOT IN (SELECT prime_id, exponent FROM ( <span class="hljs-subst">{given_factors_sql}</span> ) AS GF2)
    );
    """</span>

    result = self.query(sql, values * <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Triple values to replace all placeholders</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> result <span class="hljs-keyword">or</span> <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1339" data-end="1342"><h3 data-start="1344" data-end="1375"><strong data-start="1348" data-end="1375"> Explanation of Fixes</strong></h3><ol data-start="1376" data-end="1857"><li data-start="1376" data-end="1621"><p data-start="1379" data-end="1462"><strong data-start="1379" data-end="1462"> Removed <code data-start="1391" data-end="1397">WITH</code> (CTE)   Used a Derived Table (<code data-start="1430" data-end="1459">JOIN (SELECT ... UNION ALL)</code>)</strong></p><ul data-start="1466" data-end="1621"><li data-start="1466" data-end="1621"> Corrected to:<pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1489" data-end="1621"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> (
   <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">2</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> prime_id, <span class="hljs-number">3</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> exponent
   <span class="hljs-keyword">UNION</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ALL</span>
   <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">5</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1</span>
) <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> GivenFactors
</span></code></div></div></pre></li></ul></li><li data-start="1623" data-end="1857"><p data-start="1626" data-end="1684"><strong data-start="1626" data-end="1684"> Used <code data-start="1635" data-end="1647">values * 3</code> to replace all placeholders (<code data-start="1677" data-end="1681">%s</code>)</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1688" data-end="1744"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>result = self.query(sql, values * <span class="hljs-number">3</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="1748" data-end="1857"><li data-start="1748" data-end="1857">Since <code data-start="1756" data-end="1775">given_factors_sql</code> is used <strong data-start="1784" data-end="1799">three times</strong> in the SQL query, we need to repeat <code data-start="1836" data-end="1844">values</code> three times.</li></ul></li></ol><hr data-start="1859" [.group\/conversation-turn:hover_&amp;]:block"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button aria-label="Edit message" class="flex h-9 w-9 items-center justify-center rounded-full fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M13.2929 4.29291C15.0641 2.52167 17.9359 2.52167 19.7071 4.2929C21.4784 6.06414 21.4784 8.93588 19.7071 10.7071L18.7073 11.7069L11.6135 18.8007C10.8766 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-107" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="1dfeba3d-528d-4112-89c1-6a85bd860f86" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="182">Great! Let's create a method that takes the <strong data-start="44" data-end="76">prime factors of two numbers</strong> (represented as dictionaries) and returns their <strong data-start="125" data-end="134">union</strong>. The result should be a new dictionary where:</p><ul data-start="184" data-end="322"><li data-start="184" data-end="257">If a prime appears in both numbers, the <strong data-start="226" data-end="246">maximum exponent</strong> is kept.</li><li data-start="258" data-end="322">If a prime appears in only one number, it is included as is.</li></ul><hr data-start="324" data-end="327"><h3 data-start="329" data-end="371"><strong data-start="333" data-end="371"> Method: <code data-start="346" data-end="369">union_prime_factors()</code></strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="372" data-end="1160"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">union_prime_factors</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, factors1, factors2</span>):
    <span class="hljs-string">"""
    Returns the union of two prime factor dictionaries.
    The union keeps the highest exponent when a prime is in both.
    
    :param factors1: Dictionary of prime factors for number 1 {prime_id: exponent}
    :param factors2: Dictionary of prime factors for number 2 {prime_id: exponent}
    :return: Dictionary representing the union of both sets of prime factors.
    """</span>
    union_factors = factors1.copy()  <span class="hljs-comment"># Start with factors1</span>
    
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> prime, exponent <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> factors2.items():
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> prime <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> union_factors:
            union_factors[prime] = <span class="hljs-built_in">max</span>(union_factors[prime], exponent)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Keep max exponent</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
            union_factors[prime] = exponent  <span class="hljs-comment"># Add new prime</span>

    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> union_factors
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1162" data-end="1165"><h3 data-start="1167" data-end="1189"><strong data-start="1171" data-end="1189"> Explanation</strong></h3><ol data-start="1190" data-end="1462"><li data-start="1190" data-end="1252"><strong data-start="1193" data-end="1211">Creates a copy</strong> of <code data-start="1215" data-end="1225">factors1</code> to store the union result.</li><li data-start="1253" data-end="1425"><strong data-start="1256" data-end="1284">Iterates over <code data-start="1272" data-end="1282">factors2</code></strong>:<ul data-start="1289" data-end="1425"><li data-start="1289" data-end="1350">If the prime exists in both, <strong data-start="1320" data-end="1349">keep the maximum exponent</strong>.</li><li data-start="1354" data-end="1425">If the prime exists only in <code data-start="1384" data-end="1394">factors2</code>, <strong data-start="1396" data-end="1406">add it</strong> to the dictionary.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1426" data-end="1462"><strong data-start="1429" data-end="1461">Returns the union dictionary</strong>.</li></ol><hr data-start="1464" data-end="1467"><h3 data-start="1469" data-end="1492"><strong data-start="1473" data-end="1492"> Example Usage</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1493" data-end="1771"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>primefactor_db = PrimeFactorDB(get_prime_db())

factors_a = {<span class="hljs-number">2</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>}  <span class="hljs-comment"># 2^3 * 3^2 * 5^1</span>
factors_b = {<span class="hljs-number">3</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>}        <span class="hljs-comment"># 3^4 * 7^2</span>

union_factors = primefactor_db.union_prime_factors(factors_a, factors_b)

<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Union of prime factors:"</span>, union_factors)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1773" data-end="1776"><h3 data-start="1778" data-end="1804"><strong data-start="1782" data-end="1804"> Expected Output</strong></h3><pre </span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1868" data-end="1886"><strong data-start="1868" data-end="1883">Explanation</strong>:</p><ul data-start="1887" data-end="2085"><li data-start="1887" data-end="1939"><code data-start="1889" data-end="1892">2</code> appears in <strong data-start="1904" data-end="1917">factors_a</strong> (3)  Kept as <strong data-start="1932" data-end="1937">3</strong></li><li data-start="1940" data-end="1987"><code data-start="1942" data-end="1945">3</code> appears in <strong data-start="1957" data-end="1965">both</strong>  <strong data-start="1968" data-end="1985">Max(2, 4) = 4</strong></li><li data-start="1988" data-end="2036"><code data-start="1990" data-end="1993">5</code> appears in <strong data-start="2005" data-end="2018">factors_a</strong>  Kept as <strong data-start="2029" data-end="2034">1</strong></li><li data-start="2037" data-end="2085"><code data-start="2039" data-end="2042">7</code> appears in <strong data-start="2054" data-end="2067">factors_b</strong>  Kept as <strong data-start="2078" data-end="2083">2</strong></li></ul><hr data-start="2087" data-end="2090"><h2 data-start="2092" data-end="2109"><strong data-start="2095" data-end="2109"> Summary</strong></h2><p data-start="2110" data-end="2266"> <strong data-start="2112" data-end="2160">Creates a union of two sets of prime focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-109" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="06d4c514-b58c-4db4-9101-015aa82d0d51" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="109">Awesome! Now, let's create a method to compute the <strong data-start="51" data-end="106">intersection (GCD) of two prime factor dictionaries</strong>.</p><h3 data-start="111" data-end="134"><strong data-start="115" data-end="134"> How It Works</strong></h3><ul data-start="135" data-end="345"><li data-start="135" data-end="246">The <strong data-start="141" data-end="157">intersection</strong> (Greatest Common Divisor, <strong data-start="184" data-end="191">GCD</strong>) includes only <strong data-start="207" data-end="245">primes that appear in both numbers</strong>.</li><li data-start="247" data-end="345">The exponent for each prime in the result is <strong data-start="294" data-end="318">the minimum exponent</strong> from the two dictionaries.</li></ul><hr data-start="347" data-end="350"><h3 data-start="352" data-end="398"><strong data-start="356" data-end="398"> Method: <code data-start="369" data-end="396">intersect_prime_factors()</code></strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="399" data-end="975"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">intersect_prime_factors</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, factors1, factors2</span>):
    <span class="hljs-string">"""
    Returns the intersection (GCD) of two prime factor dictionaries.
    Keeps only primes that appear in both, with the minimum exponent.

    :param factors1: Dictionary of prime factors for number 1 {prime_id: exponent}
    :param factors2: Dictionary of prime factors for number 2 {prime_id: exponent}
    :return: Dictionary representing the intersection of both sets of prime factors.
    """</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> {prime: <span class="hljs-built_in">min</span>(factors1[prime], factors2[prime]) <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> prime <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> factors1 <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> prime <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> factors2}
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="977" data-end="980"><h3 data-start="982" data-end="1004"><strong data-start="986" data-end="1004"> Explanation</strong></h3><ol data-start="1005" data-end="1218"><li data-start="1005" data-end="1086"><strong data-start="1008" data-end="1036">Iterates over <code data-start="1024" data-end="1034">factors1</code></strong> and <strong data-start="1041" data-end="1085">checks if the prime exists in <code data-start="1073" data-end="1083">factors2</code></strong>.</li><li data-start="1087" data-end="1155"><strong data-start="1090" data-end="1114">If it exists in both</strong>, the exponent is <strong data-start="1132" data-end="1154">set to the minimum</strong>.</li><li data-start="1156" data-end="1218"><strong data-start="1159" data-end="1187">Creates a new dictionary</strong> with the common prime factors.</li></ol><hr data-start="1220" data-end="1223"><h3 data-start="1225" data-end="1248"><strong data-start="1229" data-end="1248"> Example Usage</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1249" data-end="1546"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>primefactor_db = PrimeFactorDB(get_prime_db())

factors_a = {<span class="hljs-number">2</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>}  <span class="hljs-comment"># 2^3 * 3^2 * 5^1</span>
factors_b = {<span class="hljs-number">3</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>}  <span class="hljs-comment"># 3^4 * 5^1 * 7^2</span>

gcd_factors = primefactor_db.intersect_prime_factors(factors_a, factors_b)

<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Intersection (GCD) of prime factors:"</span>, gcd_factors)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1548" data-end="1551"><h3 data-start="1553" data-end="1579"><strong data-start="1557" data-end="1579"> Expected Output</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1580" data-end="1643"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>Intersection (GCD) of prime factors: {<span class="hljs-number">3</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>}
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1644" data-end="1662"><strong data-start="1644" data-end="1659">Explanation</strong>:</p><ul data-start="1663" data-end="1868"><li data-start="1663" data-end="1717"><code data-start="1665" data-end="1668">2</code> appears <strong data-start="1677" data-end="1685">only</strong> in <code data-start="1689" data-end="1700">factors_a</code>  <strong data-start="1703" data-end="1715">Excluded</strong></li><li data-start="1718" data-end="1765"><code data-start="1720" data-end="1723">3</code> appears in <strong data-start="1735" data-end="1743">both</strong>  <strong data-start="1746" data-end="1763">Min(2, 4) = 2</strong></li><li data-start="1766" data-end="1813"><code data-start="1768" data-end="1771">5</code> appears in <strong data-start="1783" data-end="1791">both</strong>  <strong data-start="1794" data-end="1811">Min(1, 1) = 1</strong></li><li data-start="1814" data-end="1868"><code data-start="1816" data-end="1819">7</code> appears <strong data-start="1828" data-end="1836">only</strong> in <code data-start="1840" data-end="1851">factors_b</code>  <strong data-start="1854" data-end="1866">Excluded</strong></li></ul><hr data-start="1870" data-end="1873"><h2 data-start="1875" data-end="1892"><strong data-start="1878" data-end="1892"> Summary</strong></h2><p data-start="1893" data-end="2058"> <strong data-start="1895" data-end="1935">Finds the common prime factors (GCD)</strong><br data-start="1935" data-end="1938"> <strong data-start="1940" data-end="1991">Keeps the lowest exponent for each shared prime</strong><br data-start="1991" data-end="1994"> <strong data-start="1996" data-end="2056">Optimized for performance using dictionary comprehension</strong></p><p data-start="2060" data-end="2152" data-is-last-node="">Would you like me to add a <strong data-start="2087" data-end="2113">method for multiplying</strong> two prime factor dictionaries next? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M11 4.9099C11 4.47485 10.4828 4.24734 10.1621 4.54132L6.67572 7.7372C6.49129 7.90626 6.25019 class="icon-md"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M13.2929 4.29291C15.0641 2.52167 17.9359 2.52167 19.7071 4.2929C21.4784 6.06414 21.4784 8.93588 19.7071 10.7071L18.7073 11.7069L11.6135 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-111" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="49b74773-771c-48eb-a5cf-83b288ee9000" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="78">Great! Now, let's create a method to <strong data-start="37" data-end="49">multiply</strong> two sets of prime factors.</p><h3 data-start="80" data-end="103"><strong data-start="84" data-end="103"> How It Works</strong></h3><ul data-start="104" data-end="406"><li data-start="104" data-end="224">The <strong data-start="110" data-end="128">multiplication</strong> of two prime factor dictionaries represents <strong data-start="173" data-end="208">the Least Common Multiple (LCM)</strong> of the numbers.</li><li data-start="225" data-end="340">Each prime factor in the result has an <strong data-start="266" data-end="295">exponent equal to the sum</strong> of the exponents in both input dictionaries.</li><li data-start="341" data-end="406">If a prime exists in only one dictionary, it is included as is.</li></ul><hr data-start="408" data-end="411"><h3 data-start="413" data-end="458"><strong data-start="417" data-end="458"> Method: <code data-start="430" data-end="456">multiply_prime_factors()</code></strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="459" data-end="1253"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">multiply_prime_factors</span>(<span class="hljs-params">self, factors1, factors2</span>):
    <span class="hljs-string">"""
    Returns the product (multiplication) of two prime factor dictionaries.
    Keeps all primes, summing their exponents when they appear in both.

    :param factors1: Dictionary of prime factors for number 1 {prime_id: exponent}
    :param factors2: Dictionary of prime factors for number 2 {prime_id: exponent}
    :return: Dictionary representing the product of both sets of prime factors.
    """</span>
    product_factors = factors1.copy()  <span class="hljs-comment"># Start with factors1</span>
    
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> prime, exponent <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> factors2.items():
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> prime <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> product_factors:
            product_factors[prime] += exponent  <span class="hljs-comment"># Sum exponents</span>
        <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
            product_factors[prime] = exponent  <span class="hljs-comment"># Add new prime</span>

    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> product_factors
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1255" data-end="1258"><h3 data-start="1260" data-end="1282"><strong data-start="1264" data-end="1282"> Explanation</strong></h3><ol data-start="1283" data-end="1579"><li data-start="1283" data-end="1339"><strong data-start="1286" data-end="1304">Creates a copy</strong> of <code data-start="1308" data-end="1318">factors1</code> to store the result.</li><li data-start="1340" data-end="1504"><strong data-start="1343" data-end="1371">Iterates over <code data-start="1359" data-end="1369">factors2</code></strong>:<ul data-start="1376" data-end="1504"><li data-start="1376" data-end="1429">If the prime exists in both, <strong data-start="1407" data-end="1428">sum the exponents</strong>.</li><li data-start="1433" data-end="1504">If the prime exists only in <code data-start="1463" data-end="1473">factors2</code>, <strong data-start="1475" data-end="1485">add it</strong> to the dictionary.</li></ul></li><li data-start="1505" data-end="1579"><strong data-start="1508" data-end="1578">Returns the dictionary representing the product of the two numbers</strong>.</li></ol><hr data-start="1581" data-end="1584"><h3 data-start="1586" data-end="1609"><strong data-start="1590" data-end="1609"> Example Usage</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1610" data-end="1920"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>primefactor_db = PrimeFactorDB(get_prime_db())

factors_a = {<span class="hljs-number">2</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>}  <span class="hljs-comment"># 2^3 * 3^2 * 5^1</span>
factors_b = {<span class="hljs-number">3</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>}  <span class="hljs-comment"># 3^4 * 5^1 * 7^2</span>

product_factors = primefactor_db.multiply_prime_factors(factors_a, factors_b)

<span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Product (Multiplication) of prime factors:"</span>, product_factors)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1922" data-end="1925"><h3 data-start="1927" data-end="1953"><strong data-start="1931" data-end="1953"> Expected Output</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1954" data-end="2035"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>Product (Multiplication) of prime factors: {<span class="hljs-number">2</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">3</span>: <span class="hljs-number">6</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>}
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2036" data-end="2054"><strong data-start="2036" data-end="2051">Explanation</strong>:</p><ul data-start="2055" data-end="2264"><li data-start="2055" data-end="2110"><code data-start="2057" data-end="2060">2</code> appears <strong data-start="2069" data-end="2077">only</strong> in <code data-start="2081" data-end="2092">factors_a</code>  <strong data-start="2095" data-end="2108">Kept as 3</strong></li><li data-start="2111" data-end="2159"><code data-start="2113" data-end="2116">3</code> appears in <strong data-start="2128" data-end="2136">both</strong>  <strong data-start="2139" data-end="2157">Sum(2 + 4) = 6</strong></li><li data-start="2160" data-end="2208"><code data-start="2162" data-end="2165">5</code> appears in <strong data-start="2177" data-end="2185">both</strong>  <strong data-start="2188" data-end="2206">Sum(1 + 1) = 2</strong></li><li data-start="2209" data-end="2264"><code data-start="2211" data-end="2214">7</code> appears <strong data-start="2223" data-end="2231">only</strong> in <code data-start="2235" data-end="2246">factors_b</code>  <strong data-start="2249" data-end="2262">Kept as 2</strong></li></ul><hr data-start="2266" data-end="2269"><h2 data-start="2271" data-end="2288"><strong data-start="2274" data-end="2288"> Summary</strong></h2><p data-start="2289" data-end="2465"> <strong data-start="2291" data-end="2365">Computes the product (multiplication) of two numbers via prime factors</strong><br data-start="2365" data-end="2368"> <strong data-start="2370" data-end="2417">Sums the exponents for shared prime factors</strong><br data-start="2417" data-end="2420"> <strong data-start="2422" data-end="2463">Optimized using dictionary operations</strong></p><p data-start="2467" data-end="2544" data-is-last-node="">Would you like a <strong data-start="2484" data-end="2508">division method next</strong>, where exponents are subtracted? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M11 4.9099C11 4.47485 10.4828 4.24734 10.1621 4.54132L6.67572 7.7372C6.49129 7.90626 6.25019 [.group\/conversation-turn:hover_&amp;]:block"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button aria-label="Edit message" class="flex h-9 w-9 items-center justify-center rounded-full fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M13.2929 4.29291C15.0641 2.52167 17.9359 2.52167 19.7071 4.2929C21.4784 6.06414 21.4784 8.93588 19.7071 10.7071L18.7073 11.7069L11.6135 18.8007C10.8766
