focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-153" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="a50a07da-e46b-4807-8288-de67448bf2b3" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="32">Yes! Below is a function that:</p><ol data-start="33" data-end="339"><li data-start="33" data-end="106"><strong data-start="36" data-end="67">Retrieves the prime factors</strong> of a given number from the database.</li><li data-start="107" data-end="283"><strong data-start="110" data-end="153">Checks if the prime factor 2 is present</strong>:<ul data-start="160" data-end="283"><li data-start="160" data-end="216">If <strong data-start="165" data-end="176">present</strong>, it <strong data-start="181" data-end="195">increments</strong> the exponent by 1.</li><li data-start="220" data-end="283">If <strong data-start="225" data-end="240">not present</strong>, it <strong data-start="245" data-end="253">adds</strong> <code data-start="254" data-end="259">2^1</code> to the prime factors.</li></ul></li><li data-start="284" data-end="339"><strong data-start="287" data-end="324">Updates the <code data-start="301" data-end="316">prime_factors</code> table</strong> accordingly.</li></ol><hr data-start="341" data-end="344"><h3 data-start="346" data-end="399"><strong data-start="350" data-end="399"> Function: Modify Prime Factorization for 2</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="400" data-end="1681"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">modify_prime_factor_of_2</span>(<span class="hljs-params">number</span>):
    prime_db = get_prime_db()
    primefactor_db = get_primefactor_db(prime_db)
    number_db = get_number_db()

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Retrieve number details</span>
    number_entry = number_db.get_number(number)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> number_entry:
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Number <span class="hljs-subst">{number}</span> not found in the database."</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>

    number_id = number_entry[<span class="hljs-string">'number_id'</span>]

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Retrieve prime factors for the number</span>
    prime_factors = primefactor_db.get_primefactors(number_id)

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Convert result to a dictionary {prime_id: exponent}</span>
    factors_dict = {factor[<span class="hljs-string">'prime_id'</span>]: factor[<span class="hljs-string">'exponent'</span>] <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> factor <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> prime_factors}

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Get prime_id for 2</span>
    prime_id_2 = prime_db.prime_ids.get(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> prime_id_2:
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Error: Prime number 2 not found in the primes table."</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Modify the prime factorization</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> prime_id_2 <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> factors_dict:
        factors_dict[prime_id_2] += <span class="hljs-number">1</span>  <span class="hljs-comment"># Increment exponent for 2</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
        factors_dict[prime_id_2] = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>  <span class="hljs-comment"># Add 2^1 if not present</span>

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Update the database with modified prime factors</span>
    primefactor_db.insert_primefactors(number_id, factors_dict)

    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Updated prime factors for <span class="hljs-subst">{number}</span>: Added or incremented factor of 2."</span>)

<span class="hljs-comment"># Example usage</span>
modify_prime_factor_of_2(<span class="hljs-number">100</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1683" data-end="1686"><h3 data-start="1688" data-end="1711"><strong data-start="1692" data-end="1711"> How It Works</strong></h3><ol data-start="1712" data-end="2099"><li data-start="1712" data-end="1760"><strong data-start="1715" data-end="1738">Fetches <code data-start="1725" data-end="1736">number_id</code></strong> from <code data-start="1744" data-end="1753">numbers</code> table.</li><li data-start="1761" data-end="1827"><strong data-start="1764" data-end="1799">Retrieves current prime factors</strong> from <code data-start="1805" data-end="1820">prime_factors</code> table.</li><li data-start="1828" data-end="1881"><strong data-start="1831" data-end="1860">Gets the <code data-start="1842" data-end="1852">prime_id</code> for 2</strong> from <code data-start="1866" data-end="1874">primes</code> table.</li><li data-start="1882" data-end="2032"><strong data-start="1885" data-end="1911">Modifies factorization</strong>:<ul data-start="1916" data-end="2032"><li data-start="1916" data-end="1973">If <code data-start="1921" data-end="1924">2</code> is <strong data-start="1928" data-end="1948">already a factor</strong>, increment its exponent.</li><li data-start="1977" data-end="2032">If <code data-start="1982" data-end="1985">2</code> is <strong data-start="1989" data-end="2005">not a factor</strong>, add it with exponent <code data-start="2028" data-end="2031">1</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="2033" data-end="2099"><strong data-start="2036" data-end="2060">Updates the database</strong> with the modified prime factorization.</li></ol><hr data-start="2101" data-end="2104"><h3 data-start="2106" data-end="2133"><strong data-start="2110" data-end="2133"> Example Execution</strong></h3><p data-start="2134" data-end="2281">If <strong data-start="2137" data-end="2144">100</strong> originally had <code data-start="2160" data-end="2168">{5: 2}</code> (i.e., <code data-start="2176" data-end="2181">5^2</code>),<br data-start="2183" data-end="2186">After running <code data-start="2200" data-end="2231">modify_prime_factor_of_2(100)</code>,<br data-start="2232" data-end="2235">It becomes <code data-start="2246" data-end="2260">{2: 1, 5: 2}</code> (i.e., <code data-start="2268" data-end="2279">2^1 * 5^2</code>).</p><p data-start="2283" data-end="2393">If <strong data-start="2286" data-end="2293">100</strong> originally had <code data-start="2309" data-end="2323">{2: 2, 5: 2}</code> (i.e., <code data-start="2331" data-end="2342">2^2 * 5^2</code>),<br data-start="2344" data-end="2347">It becomes <code data-start="2358" data-end="2372">{2: 3, 5: 2}</code> (i.e., <code data-start="2380" data-end="2391">2^3 * 5^2</code>).</p><hr data-start="2395" data-end="2398"><h3 data-start="2400" data-end="2423"><strong data-start="2404" data-end="2423"> Enhancements</strong></h3><p data-start="2424" data-end="2539" data-is-last-node="">Would you like me to <strong data-start="2445" data-end="2492">update <code data-start="2454" data-end="2469">total_factors</code> and <code data-start="2474" data-end="2490">unique_factors</code></strong> in <code data-start="2496" data-end="2505">numbers</code> after modifying prime factors? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center data-testid="conversation-turn-154" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="f48e8b70-be8b-4bd4-a9c5-313de5bd3c57" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 class="icon-md"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M13.2929 4.29291C15.0641 2.52167 17.9359 2.52167 19.7071 4.2929C21.4784 6.06414 21.4784 8.93588 19.7071 10.7071L18.7073 11.7069L11.6135 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-155" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="96f4e5fe-a2bc-423a-b71f-ca73ec32fb87" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="49">Great! Below is the <strong data-start="20" data-end="32">enhanced</strong> function that:</p><ol data-start="50" data-end="410"><li data-start="50" data-end="105"><strong data-start="53" data-end="84">Retrieves the prime factors</strong> of a given number.</li><li data-start="106" data-end="171"><strong data-start="109" data-end="147">Adds or increments the factor of 2</strong> in the factorization.</li><li data-start="172" data-end="242"><strong data-start="175" data-end="212">Updates the <code data-start="189" data-end="204">prime_factors</code> table</strong> with the new factorization.</li><li data-start="243" data-end="352"><strong data-start="246" data-end="278">Recalculates <code data-start="261" data-end="276">total_factors</code></strong> (sum of exponents) and <strong data-start="302" data-end="322"><code data-start="304" data-end="320">unique_factors</code></strong> (count of distinct primes).</li><li data-start="353" data-end="410"><strong data-start="356" data-end="387">Updates the <code data-start="370" data-end="379">numbers</code> table</strong> with the new values.</li></ol><hr data-start="412" data-end="415"><h3 data-start="417" data-end="476"><strong data-start="421" data-end="476"> Final Function: Modify Prime Factorization for 2</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="477" data-end="2161"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">modify_prime_factor_of_2</span>(<span class="hljs-params">number</span>):
    prime_db = get_prime_db()
    primefactor_db = get_primefactor_db(prime_db)
    number_db = get_number_db()

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Retrieve number details</span>
    number_entry = number_db.get_number(number)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> number_entry:
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Number <span class="hljs-subst">{number}</span> not found in the database."</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>

    number_id = number_entry[<span class="hljs-string">'number_id'</span>]

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Retrieve prime factors for the number</span>
    prime_factors = primefactor_db.get_primefactors(number_id)

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Convert result to a dictionary {prime_id: exponent}</span>
    factors_dict = {factor[<span class="hljs-string">'prime_id'</span>]: factor[<span class="hljs-string">'exponent'</span>] <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> factor <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> prime_factors}

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Get prime_id for 2</span>
    prime_id_2 = prime_db.prime_ids.get(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> prime_id_2:
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Error: Prime number 2 not found in the primes table."</span>)
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Modify the prime factorization</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> prime_id_2 <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> factors_dict:
        factors_dict[prime_id_2] += <span class="hljs-number">1</span>  <span class="hljs-comment"># Increment exponent for 2</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span>:
        factors_dict[prime_id_2] = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>  <span class="hljs-comment"># Add 2^1 if not present</span>

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Update the prime_factors table with modified factors</span>
    primefactor_db.insert_primefactors(number_id, factors_dict)

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Recalculate total_factors and unique_factors</span>
    total_factors = <span class="hljs-built_in">sum</span>(factors_dict.values())  <span class="hljs-comment"># Sum of all exponents</span>
    unique_factors = <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(factors_dict)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Number of distinct prime factors</span>

    <span class="hljs-comment"># Update the numbers table</span>
    number_db.insert_number(number, total_factors, unique_factors)

    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Updated prime factors for <span class="hljs-subst">{number}</span>: Added or incremented factor of 2."</span>)
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Updated numbers table: total_factors=<span class="hljs-subst">{total_factors}</span>, unique_factors=<span class="hljs-subst">{unique_factors}</span>."</span>)

<span class="hljs-comment"># Example usage</span>
modify_prime_factor_of_2(<span class="hljs-number">100</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="2163" data-end="2166"><h3 data-start="2168" data-end="2191"><strong data-start="2172" data-end="2191"> How It Works</strong></h3><ol data-start="2192" data-end="2761"><li data-start="2192" data-end="2244"><strong data-start="2195" data-end="2218">Fetches <code data-start="2205" data-end="2216">number_id</code></strong> from the <code data-start="2228" data-end="2237">numbers</code> table.</li><li data-start="2245" data-end="2315"><strong data-start="2248" data-end="2283">Retrieves current prime factors</strong> from the <code data-start="2293" data-end="2308">prime_factors</code> table.</li><li data-start="2316" data-end="2373"><strong data-start="2319" data-end="2348">Gets the <code data-start="2330" data-end="2340">prime_id</code> for 2</strong> from the <code data-start="2358" data-end="2366">primes</code> table.</li><li data-start="2374" data-end="2524"><strong data-start="2377" data-end="2403">Modifies factorization</strong>:<ul data-start="2408" data-end="2524"><li data-start="2408" data-end="2465">If <code data-start="2413" data-end="2416">2</code> is <strong data-start="2420" data-end="2440">already a factor</strong>, increment its exponent.</li><li data-start="2469" data-end="2524">If <code data-start="2474" data-end="2477">2</code> is <strong data-start="2481" data-end="2497">not a factor</strong>, add it with exponent <code data-start="2520" data-end="2523">1</code>.</li></ul></li><li data-start="2525" data-end="2593"><strong data-start="2528" data-end="2565">Updates the <code data-start="2542" data-end="2557">prime_factors</code> table</strong> with the new factorization.</li><li data-start="2594" data-end="2709"><strong data-start="2597" data-end="2613">Recalculates</strong>:<ul data-start="2618" data-end="2709"><li data-start="2618" data-end="2659"><code data-start="2620" data-end="2635">total_factors</code> = sum of all exponents.</li><li data-start="2663" data-end="2709"><code data-start="2665" data-end="2681">unique_factors</code> = count of distinct primes.</li></ul></li><li data-start="2710" data-end="2761"><strong data-start="2713" data-end="2744">Updates the <code data-start="2727" data-end="2736">numbers</code> table</strong> with new values.</li></ol><hr data-start="2763" data-end="2766"><h3 data-start="2768" data-end="2795"><strong data-start="2772" data-end="2795"> Example Execution</strong></h3><h4 data-start="2796" data-end="2849"><strong data-start="2801" data-end="2832">Before Running the Function</strong> (<code data-start="2834" data-end="2848">number = 100</code>)</h4><table data-start="2850" data-end="2906"><thead data-start="2850" data-end="2870"><tr data-start="2850" data-end="2870"><th data-start="2850" data-end="2858">Prime</th><th data-start="2858" data-end="2870">Exponent</th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="2891" data-end="2906"><tr data-start="2891" data-end="2906"><td><code data-start="2893" data-end="2896">5</code></td><td><code data-start="2901" data-end="2904">2</code></td></tr></tbody></table><p data-start="2908" data-end="2930"><strong data-start="2908" data-end="2928"><code data-start="2910" data-end="2919">numbers</code> table:</strong></p><table data-start="2931" data-end="3060"><thead data-start="2931" data-end="2974"><tr data-start="2931" data-end="2974"><th data-start="2931" data-end="2940">Number</th><th data-start="2940" data-end="2956">total_factors</th><th data-start="2956" data-end="2974">unique_factors</th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="3018" data-end="3060"><tr data-start="3018" data-end="3060"><td><code data-start="3020" data-end="3025">100</code></td><td><code data-start="3029" data-end="3032">2</code></td><td><code data-start="3044" data-end="3047">1</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="3062" data-end="3065"><h4 data-start="3067" data-end="3121"><strong data-start="3072" data-end="3121">After Running <code data-start="3088" data-end="3119">modify_prime_factor_of_2(100)</code></strong></h4><table data-start="3122" data-end="3194"><thead data-start="3122" data-end="3142"><tr data-start="3122" data-end="3142"><th data-start="3122" data-end="3130">Prime</th><th data-start="3130" data-end="3142">Exponent</th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="3163" data-end="3194"><tr data-start="3163" data-end="3178"><td><code data-start="3165" data-end="3168">2</code></td><td><code data-start="3173" data-end="3176">1</code></td></tr><tr data-start="3179" data-end="3194"><td><code data-start="3181" data-end="3184">5</code></td><td><code data-start="3189" data-end="3192">2</code></td></tr></tbody></table><p data-start="3196" data-end="3218"><strong data-start="3196" data-end="3216"><code data-start="3198" data-end="3207">numbers</code> table:</strong></p><table data-start="3219" data-end="3348"><thead data-start="3219" data-end="3262"><tr data-start="3219" data-end="3262"><th data-start="3219" data-end="3228">Number</th><th data-start="3228" data-end="3244">total_factors</th><th data-start="3244" data-end="3262">unique_factors</th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="3306" data-end="3348"><tr data-start="3306" data-end="3348"><td><code data-start="3308" data-end="3313">100</code></td><td><code data-start="3317" data-end="3320">3</code></td><td><code data-start="3332" data-end="3335">2</code></td></tr></tbody></table><hr data-start="3350" data-end="3353"><h3 data-start="3355" data-end="3373"><strong data-start="3359" data-end="3373"> Summary</strong></h3><p data-start="3374" data-end="3567"> <strong data-start="3376" data-end="3438">Inserts or updates the factor of 2 in prime factorization.</strong><br data-start="3438" data-end="3441"> <strong data-start="3443" data-end="3492">Updates <code data-start="3453" data-end="3468">prime_factors</code> and <code data-start="3473" data-end="3482">numbers</code> tables.</strong><br data-start="3492" data-end="3495"> <strong data-start="3497" data-end="3565">Ensures <code data-start="3507" data-end="3522">total_factors</code> and <code data-start="3527" data-end="3543">unique_factors</code> are always correct.</strong></p><p data-start="3569" data-end="3643" data-is-last-node="">Would you like a <strong data-start="3586" data-end="3604">batch function</strong> to modify multiple numbers at once? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-157" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="85d39476-cee3-4d6b-a949-aabc9e9c61e7" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="114">You can use Pythons built-in <code data-start="30" data-end="39">range()</code> function to count <strong data-start="58" data-end="71">backwards</strong> from <code data-start="77" data-end="88">2,000,000</code> to <code data-start="92" data-end="103">1,000,001</code> by <code data-start="107" data-end="111">-1</code>.</p><h3 data-start="116" data-end="137"><strong data-start="120" data-end="137"> Simple Loop</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="138" data-end="228"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> num <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">2000000</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1000000</span>, -<span class="hljs-number">1</span>):
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(num)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Process the number</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="229" data-end="375"><li data-start="229" data-end="291">The <strong data-start="235" data-end="260">third argument (<code data-start="253" data-end="257">-1</code>)</strong> makes it count <strong data-start="276" data-end="288">downward</strong>.</li><li data-start="292" data-end="375">The <strong data-start="298" data-end="327">loop stops at <code data-start="314" data-end="325">1,000,001</code></strong>, since <code data-start="335" data-end="344">range()</code> <strong data-start="345" data-end="357">excludes</strong> the stop value.</li></ul><hr data-start="377" data-end="380"><h3 data-start="382" data-end="422"><strong data-start="386" data-end="422"> More Efficient with a Function</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="423" data-end="579"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5     <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> num <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">range</span>(<span class="hljs-number">2000000</span>, <span class="hljs-number">1000000</span>, -<span class="hljs-number">1</span>):

        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Processing <span class="hljs-subst">{num}</span>"</span>)

</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="580" data-end="620"> <strong data-start="582" data-end="617">Keeps code modular and reusable</strong>.</p><p data-start="622" data-end="719" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="56">Heres the <strong data-start="11" data-end="24">SQL query</strong> that retrieves numbers where:</p><ol data-start="57" data-end="193"><li data-start="57" data-end="110"><strong <code data-start="150" data-end="159">numbers</code> table has <code data-start="170" data-end="189">total_factors = 0</code></strong></li></ol><hr data-start="195" data-end="198"><h3 data-start="200" data-end="219"><strong data-start="204" data-end="219"> SQL Query</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="220" data-end="409"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> n.number 
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> numbers n
<span class="hljs-keyword">LEFT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> numbers n2 <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> n2.number <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number <span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-number">7</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> n.number <span class="hljs-keyword">BETWEEN</span> <span class="hljs-number">285715</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> <span class="hljs-number">1428571</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> (n2.total_factors <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">OR</span> n2.total_factors <span class="hljs-keyword">IS</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>);
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="411" data-end="414"><h3 data-start="416" data-end="438"><strong data-start="420" data-end="438"> Explanation</strong></h3><ul data-start="439" data-end="839"><li data-start="439" data-end="504"><code data-start="441" data-end="444">n</code> represents the <strong data-start="460" data-end="480">original numbers</strong> in the <code data-start="488" data-end="497">numbers</code> table.</li><li data-start="505" data-end="594"><code data-start="507" data-end="511">n2</code> represents the <strong data-start="527" data-end="553">entry for <code data-start="539" data-end="551">number * 7</code></strong> (joining on <code data-start="566" data-end="592">n2.number = n.number * 7</code>).</li><li data-start="595" data-end="839"><strong data-start="597" data-end="620">Conditions Applied:</strong><ul data-start="623" data-end="839"><li data-start="623" data-end="683"><code data-start="625" data-end="662">n.number BETWEEN 285715 AND 1428571</code>  Filters the range.</li><li data-start="686" data-end="839"><code data-start="688" data-end="740">(n2.total_factors = 0 OR n2.total_factors IS NULL)</code><ul data-start="747" data-end="839"><li data-start="747" data-end="839">Ensures that <code data-start="762" data-end="774">number * 7</code> <strong data-start="775" data-end="800">either does not exist</strong> (<code data-start="802" data-end="808">NULL</code>) or has <code data-start="817" data-end="836">total_factors = 0</code>.</li></ul></li></ul></li></ul><hr data-start="841" data-end="844"><h3 data-start="846" data-end="873"><strong data-start="850" data-end="873"> Example Execution</strong></h3><h4 data-start="874" data-end="908"><strong data-start="879" data-end="908"> </span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="496" data-end="499"><h3 data-start="501" data-end="542"><strong data-start="505" data-end="542"> Using <code data-start="515" data-end="522">gtime</code> for More Accuracy</strong></h3><p data-start="543" data-end="656">MacOSs built-in <code data-start="560" data-end="566">time</code> has limitations. You can install GNU <code data-start="604" data-end="610">time</code> (<code data-start="612" data-end="619">gtime</code>) for <strong data-start="625" data-end="653">more detailed statistics</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="657" data-end="688"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sh</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sh"><span>brew install gnu-time
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="689" data-end="698">Then use:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="699" data-end="730"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sh</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sh"><span>gtime -v your_command
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="731" data-end="788">This provides <strong data-start="745" data-end="787">memory usage, CPU efficiency, and more</strong>.</p><p data-start="790" data-end="857" data-is-last-node="">Would you like a script to measure execution time within Python? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div divisible by 7</strong>.</li></ul><hr data-start="283" data-end="286"><h3 data-start="288" data-end="323"><strong data-start="292" data-end="323"> Example Table (<code data-start="311" <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> numbers 
<span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> number <span class="hljs-keyword">BETWEEN</span> <span class="hljs-number">1000</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> <span class="hljs-number">10000</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> number <span class="hljs-operator">%</span> <span class="hljs-number">7</span> <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="784" data-end="857"><strong data-start="784" data-end="857">Finds all numbers between <code data-start="812" data-end="818">1000</code> and <code data-start="823" data-end="830">10000</code> that are divisible by 7.</strong></p><hr data-start="859" data-end="862"><h3 data-start="864" data-end="902"><strong data-start="868" data-end="902"> Check If <code data-start="881" data-end="893">number * 7</code> Exists</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="903" data-end="1047"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> number 
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> numbers n
<span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">EXISTS</span> (
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> numbers n2 
    <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> n2.number <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number <span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-number">7</span>
)
<span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> n.number <span class="hljs-operator">%</span> <span class="hljs-number">7</span> <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1048" data-end="1136"><strong data-start="1048" data-end="1136">Finds numbers that are multiples of 7 AND have their <code data-start="1103" data-end="1115">number * 7</code> also in the table.</strong></p><p data-start="1138" data-end="1205" data-is-last-node="">Would you like help integrating this into your existing queries? class="w-full text-token-text-primary focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-167" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="aa9e26ec-16f2-4f6e-878e-5ccbc5c54f44" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="171">You can craft an SQL query to find entries in the <code data-start="50" data-end="64">primefactors</code> table where the <strong data-start="81" data-end="123">count of <code data-start="92" data-end="115">(number_id, prime_id)</code> pairs</strong> is exactly <strong data-start="135" data-end="140">2</strong> using <code data-start="147" data-end="157">GROUP BY</code> and <code data-start="162" data-end="170">HAVING</code>.</p><hr data-start="173" data-end="176"><h3 data-start="178" data-end="197"><strong data-start="182" data-end="197"> SQL Query</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="198" data-end="303"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> number_id, prime_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> primefactors
<span class="hljs-keyword">GROUP</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> number_id, prime_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">HAVING</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">COUNT</span>(<span class="hljs-operator">*</span>) <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="305" data-end="308"><h3 data-start="310" data-end="332"><strong data-start="314" data-end="332"> Explanation</strong></h3><ol data-start="333" data-end="511"><li data-start="333" data-end="421"><strong data-start="336" data-end="370"><code data-start="338" data-end="368">GROUP BY number_id, prime_id</code></strong>  Groups the records by <code data-start="395" data-end="418">(number_id, prime_id)</code>.</li><li data-start="422" data-end="511"><strong data-start="425" data-end="450"><code data-start="427" data-end="448">HAVING COUNT(*) = 2</code></strong>  Filters only those groups that appear <strong data-start="491" data-end="508">exactly twice</strong>.</li></ol><hr data-start="513" data-end="516"><h3 data-start="518" data-end="558"><strong data-start="522" data-end="558"> Example Table (<code data-start="541" data-end="555">primefactors</code>)</strong></h3><table data-start="559" data-end="975"><thead query to include <code data-start="1282" data-end="1292">exponent</code> conditions as well? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="14c5aaa8-9080-4015-a5b0-f27ef40adea8" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="125">Yes! You can enforce <strong data-start="21" data-end="35">uniqueness</strong> on <code data-start="39" data-end="62">(number_id, prime_id)</code> in the <code data-start="70" data-end="84">primefactors</code> table by adding a <strong data-start="103" data-end="124">UNIQUE constraint</strong>.</p><hr data-start="127" data-end="130"><h3 data-start="132" data-end="170"><strong data-start="136" data-end="170"> SQL to Modify Existing Table</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="171" data-end="271"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> primefactors <span class="hljs-keyword">ADD</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">CONSTRAINT</span> unique_number_prime <span class="hljs-keyword">UNIQUE</span> (number_id, prime_id);
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="272" data-end="341"> Ensures that <strong data-start="287" data-end="340">each (number_id, prime_id) pair appears only once</strong>.</p><hr data-start="343" data-end="346"><h3 data-start="348" data-end="393"><strong data-start="352" data-end="393"> SQL to Create Table with Uniqueness</strong></h3><p data-start="394" data-end="440">If you're <strong data-start="404" data-end="416">creating</strong> the table from scratch:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="441" data-end="880"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> primefactors (
    primefactor_id <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-keyword">PRIMARY</span> KEY,
    number_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>,
    prime_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>,
    exponent <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>,
    <span class="hljs-keyword">UNIQUE</span> (number_id, prime_id),  <span class="hljs-comment">-- Ensures uniqueness</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FOREIGN</span> KEY (number_id) <span class="hljs-keyword">REFERENCES</span> numbers(number_id) <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> CASCADE,
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FOREIGN</span> KEY (prime_id) <span class="hljs-keyword">REFERENCES</span> primes(prime_id) <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> CASCADE
);
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="881" data-end="1041"> <strong data-start="883" data-end="933">Prevents duplicate (number_id, prime_id) pairs</strong> but allows different exponents.<br data-start="965" data-end="968"> <strong data-start="970" data-end="1040">Maintains referential integrity with <code data-start="1009" data-end="1018">numbers</code> and <code data-start="1023" data-end="1031">primes</code> tables</strong>.</p><hr data-start="1043" data-end="1046"><h3 data-start="1048" data-end="1106"><strong data-start="1052" data-end="1106"> Handling Duplicate Data Before Adding Constraint</strong></h3><p data-start="1107" data-end="1224">If the table <strong data-start="1120" data-end="1146">already has duplicates</strong>, adding the <code data-start="1159" data-end="1167">UNIQUE</code> constraint will fail.<br data-start="1189" data-end="1192">Run this to <strong data-start="1204" data-end="1223">find duplicates</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1225" data-end="1343"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> number_id, prime_id, <span class="hljs-built_in">COUNT</span>(<span class="hljs-operator">*</span>) 
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> primefactors 
<span class="hljs-keyword">GROUP</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> number_id, prime_id 
<span class="hljs-keyword">HAVING</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">COUNT</span>(<span class="hljs-operator">*</span>) <span class="hljs-operator">&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1344" data-end="1395">Then <strong data-start="1349" data-end="1370">remove duplicates</strong>, keeping only one entry:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1396" data-end="1574"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> pf1 
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> primefactors pf1
<span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> primefactors pf2 
<span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf1.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> pf2.number_id 
<span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> pf1.prime_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> pf2.prime_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">AND</span> pf1.primefactor_id <span class="hljs-operator">&gt;</span> pf2.primefactor_id;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1575" data-end="1701"> <strong data-start="1577" data-end="1636">Removes duplicate rows while keeping the earliest entry</strong>.<br data-start="1637" data-end="1640"> Now you can safely run <code data-start="1665" data-end="1678">ALTER TABLE</code> to enforce uniqueness.</p><p data-start="1703" data-end="1796" data-is-last-node="">Would you like me to modify your <strong data-start="1736" data-end="1751">Python code</strong> to handle this constraint when inserting? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-md-heavy"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M11 4.9099C11 4.47485 10.4828 4.24734 10.1621 4.54132L6.67572 7.7372C6.49129 7.90626 6.25019 8.00005 6 8.00005H4C3.44772 8.00005 3 8.44776 3 9.00005V15C3 15.5523 3.44772 16 4 16H6C6.25019 16 6.49129 16.0938 6.67572 16.2629L10.1621 19.4588C10.4828 19.7527 11 19.5252 11 19.0902V4.9099ZM8.81069 3.06701C10.4142 1.59714 13 2.73463 13 4.9099V19.0902C13 21.2655 10.4142 22.403 data-end="75">in</code> keyword.</p><hr data-start="86" data-end="89"><h3 data-start="91" data-end="113"><strong data-start="95" data-end="113"> Basic Syntax</strong></h3><pre items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> key <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> my_dict:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key exists!"</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="173" data-end="176"><h3 data-start="178" data-end="196"><strong data-start="182" data-end="196"> Example</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="197" data-end="389"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span>prime_factors = {<span class="hljs-number">2</span>: <span class="hljs-number">3</span>, <span class="hljs-number">5</span>: <span class="hljs-number">2</span>, <span class="hljs-number">7</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>}

<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-number">5</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> prime_factors:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"5 is a key in the dictionary!"</span>)

<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> <span class="hljs-number">11</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> prime_factors:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"11 is NOT a key in the dictionary."</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="390" data-end="401"><strong data-start="390" data-end="401">Output:</strong></p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="402" data-end="474"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">vbnet</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre"><span><span class="hljs-number">5</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">is</span> a <span class="hljs-keyword">key</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> the dictionary!
<span class="hljs-number">11</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">is</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">NOT</span> a <span class="hljs-keyword">key</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> the dictionary.
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="476" data-end="479"><h3 data-start="481" data-end="521"><strong data-start="485" data-end="521"> Using <code data-start="495" data-end="503">.get()</code> to Avoid Errors</strong></h3><p data-start="522" data-end="590">If you try to access a missing key directly, it raises a <code data-start="579" data-end="589">KeyError</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="591" data-end="647"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(prime_factors[<span class="hljs-number">11</span>])  <span class="hljs-comment">#  KeyError: 11</span>
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="648" data-end="690">Instead, use <code data-start="661" data-end="669">.get()</code> to <strong data-start="673" data-end="689">check safely</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="691" data-end="767"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> prime_factors.get(<span class="hljs-number">11</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">is</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">not</span> <span class="hljs-literal">None</span>:
    <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Key exists!"</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="768" data-end="817"> <strong data-start="770" data-end="817">Returns <code data-start="780" data-end="786">None</code> instead of raising an error.</strong></p><p data-start="819" data-end="893" data-is-last-node="">Would you like an example inside your <strong data-start="857" data-end="889">database-related Python code</strong>? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center justify-center"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="28a59975-fff9-4387-a6c0-1638c27b56ea" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="114">The <strong data-start="4" data-end="16">best way</strong> to backup the <strong data-start="31" data-end="41">schema</strong> (structure only, no data) of a MySQL database is by using <code data-start="100" data-end="111">mysqldump</code>.</p><hr data-start="116" data-end="119"><h3 data-start="121" data-end="155"><strong data-start="125" data-end="155"> Backup MySQL Schema Only</strong></h3><p data-start="156" data-end="201">Run the following command in your terminal:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="202" data-end="281"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sh</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sh"><span>mysqldump -u your_user -p --no-data your_database &gt; backup_schema.sql
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="282" data-end="469"><li data-start="282" data-end="344"><strong data-start="284" data-end="299"><code data-start="286" data-end="297">--no-data</code></strong>  Dumps only the <strong data-start="317" data-end="327">schema</strong>, not the data.</li><li data-start="345" data-end="409"><strong data-start="347" data-end="366"><code data-start="349" data-end="364">your_database</code></strong>  Replace with the actual database name.</li><li data-start="410" data-end="469"><strong data-start="412" data-end="456">Redirects output (<code data-start="432" data-end="453">&gt; backup_schema.sql</code>)</strong> to a file.</li></ul><hr data-start="471" data-end="474"><h3 data-start="476" data-end="519"><strong data-start="480" data-end="519"> Backup Schema + Triggers + Events</strong></h3><p data-start="520" data-end="583">If you need <strong data-start="532" data-end="575">triggers, events, and stored procedures</strong>, use:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="584" data-end="708"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sh</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sh"><span>mysqldump -u your_user -p --no-data --routines --events --triggers your_database &gt; backup_schema_with_triggers.sql
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="709" data-end="757"> <strong data-start="711" data-end="755">Ensures all database logic is backed up.</strong></p><hr data-start="759" data-end="762"><h3 data-start="764" data-end="794"><strong data-start="768" data-end="794"> Restoring the Schema</strong></h3><p data-start="795" data-end="847">To restore the schema on a new server or database:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="848" data-end="912"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sh</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sh"><span>mysql -u your_user -p new_database &lt; backup_schema.sql
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="913" data-end="989"> <strong data-start="915" data-end="987">Creates all tables, constraints, and indexes without inserting data.</strong></p><p data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="d3f2a330-a2cd-4b76-9b93-d69fad9f3ba5" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words
