dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="49">Yes! In <strong data-start="8" data-end="17">MySQL</strong>, you can add <strong data-start="31" data-end="43">comments</strong> to:</p><ul data-start="50" data-end="108"><li data-start="50" data-end="64"><strong data-start="52" data-end="62">Tables</strong></li><li data-start="65" data-end="80"><strong data-start="67" data-end="78">Columns</strong></li><li data-start="81" data-end="108"><strong data-start="83" data-end="106">The entire database</strong></li></ul><hr data-start="110" data-end="113"><h2 data-start="115" data-end="154"><strong data-start="118" data-end="154"> 1. Adding a Comment to a Table</strong></h2><p data-start="155" data-end="218">Use the <code data-start="163" data-end="172">COMMENT</code> attribute in <code data-start="186" data-end="200">CREATE TABLE</code> or <code data-start="204" data-end="217">ALTER TABLE</code>:</p><h3 data-start="220" data-end="252"><strong data-start="224" data-end="252"> During Table Creation</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="253" data-end="541"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> numbers (
    number_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-keyword">PRIMARY</span> KEY,
    number <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">UNIQUE</span>,
    total_factors <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
    unique_factors <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>
) COMMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'Stores numbers and their factorization details'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><h3 data-start="543" data-end="600"><strong data-start="547" data-end="600"> Adding/Updating a Comment on an Existing Table</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="601" data-end="691"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> numbers COMMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'Stores numbers and their factorization details'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="693" data-end="696"><h2 data-start="698" data-end="736"><strong data-start="701" data-end="736"> 2. Adding Comments to Columns</strong></h2><p data-start="737" data-end="800">Use the <code data-start="745" data-end="754">COMMENT</code> attribute in <code data-start="768" data-end="782">CREATE TABLE</code> or <code data-start="786" data-end="799">ALTER TABLE</code>:</p><h3 data-start="802" data-end="835"><strong data-start="806" data-end="835"> During Column Creation</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="836" data-end="1200"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> primefactors (
    primefactor_id <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-keyword">PRIMARY</span> KEY,
    number_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="hljs-string">'References numbers.number_id'</span>,
    prime_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="hljs-string">'References primes.prime_id'</span>,
    exponent <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="hljs-string">'Power of the prime factor in the factorization'</span>
);
</span></code></div></div></pre><h3 data-start="1202" data-end="1245"><strong data-start="1206" data-end="1245"> Adding/Updating a Column Comment</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1246" data-end="1380"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> primefactors MODIFY <span class="hljs-keyword">COLUMN</span> exponent <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="hljs-string">'Exponent of the prime in factorization'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="1382" data-end="1385"><h2 data-start="1387" data-end="1429"><strong data-start="1390" data-end="1429"> 3. Adding a Comment to a Database</strong></h2><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1430" data-end="1520"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> DATABASE PFEN COMMENT <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'Database for storing prime factorization data'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1522" data-end="1685">For an <strong data-start="1529" data-end="1550">existing database</strong>, there is <strong data-start="1561" data-end="1578">no direct way</strong> to modify its comment.<br data-start="1601" data-end="1604">You <strong data-start="1608" data-end="1632">must dump the schema</strong>, update the comment in the SQL file, and restore it.</p><hr data-start="1687" data-end="1690"><h2 data-start="1692" data-end="1720"><strong data-start="1695" data-end="1720"> 4. Viewing Comments</strong></h2><ul data-start="1721" data-end="1962"><li data-start="1721" data-end="1807"><strong data-start="1723" data-end="1746">Show Table Comment:</strong><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1751" data-end="1807"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SHOW</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> STATUS <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> Name <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-string">'numbers'</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre></li><li data-start="1808" data-end="1962"><strong data-start="1810" data-end="1835">Show Column Comments:</strong><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1840" data-end="1962"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_COMMENT

data-testid="conversation-turn-176" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h5 class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="a6dfc236-4b74-4a48-b72e-f1a3247a49d3" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 d="M13.2929 4.29291C15.0641 2.52167 17.9359 2.52167 19.7071 4.2929C21.4784 6.06414 21.4784 8.93588 19.7071 10.7071L18.7073 11.7069L11.6135 18.8007C10.8766 19.5376 9.92793 20.0258 8.89999 focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-177" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="dc8de3eb-f05b-4c49-b657-f671e5c9e886" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="129">Got it! If your database population is <strong data-start="39" data-end="52">very slow</strong>, here are some optimizations you can try to <strong data-start="97" data-end="126">speed it up significantly</strong>:</p><hr data-start="131" data-end="134"><h2 data-start="136" data-end="192"><strong data-start="139" data-end="190"> 1. Use Bulk Inserts Instead of Single Inserts</strong></h2><p data-start="193" data-end="290">Instead of inserting one row at a time, <strong data-start="233" data-end="256">batch multiple rows</strong> into a single <code data-start="271" data-end="279">INSERT</code> statement.</p><h3 data-start="292" data-end="332"><strong data-start="296" data-end="332">Current Slow Insert (One by One)</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="333" data-end="436"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> number <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> numbers:
    number_db.insert_number(number, total_factors, unique_factors)
</span></code></div></div></pre><h3 data-start="438" data-end="470"><strong data-start="442" data-end="470"> Optimized Bulk Insert</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="471" data-end="895"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">bulk_insert_numbers</span>(<span class="hljs-params">numbers</span>):
    sql = <span class="hljs-string">"""
    INSERT INTO numbers (number, total_factors, unique_factors)
    VALUES """</span> + <span class="hljs-string">", "</span>.join([<span class="hljs-string">"(%s, %s, %s)"</span>] * <span class="hljs-built_in">len</span>(numbers)) + <span class="hljs-string">"""
    ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_factors = VALUES(total_factors), unique_factors = VALUES(unique_factors);
    """</span>
    values = [val <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> num <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> numbers <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> val <span class="hljs-keyword">in</span> num]  <span class="hljs-comment"># Flatten values</span>
    number_db.query(sql, values, commit=<span class="hljs-literal">True</span>)
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="896" data-end="973"> <strong data-start="898" data-end="924">Reduces query overhead</strong> from <strong data-start="930" data-end="954">thousands of queries</strong> to <strong data-start="958" data-end="972">just a few</strong>.</p><hr data-start="975" data-end="978"><h2 data-start="980" data-end="1026"><strong data-start="983" data-end="1026"> 2. Disable Indexes Before Bulk Insert</strong></h2><p data-start="1027" data-end="1194">Indexes <strong data-start="1035" data-end="1056">slow down inserts</strong> because MySQL updates them after each row.<br data-start="1099" data-end="1102">Before inserting a large dataset, <strong data-start="1136" data-end="1155">disable indexes</strong>, insert the data, then re-enable them.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1196" data-end="1297"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> numbers DISABLE KEYS;
<span class="hljs-comment">-- Perform bulk inserts</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> numbers ENABLE KEYS;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1298" data-end="1337"> <strong data-start="1300" data-end="1335">Massively speeds up insertions.</strong></p><hr data-start="1339" data-end="1342"><h2 data-start="1344" data-end="1392"><strong data-start="1347" data-end="1392"> 3. Wrap Inserts in a Single Transaction</strong></h2><p data-start="1393" data-end="1528">By default, MySQL commits <strong data-start="1419" data-end="1428">every</strong> insert separately, which is slow.<br data-start="1462" data-end="1465">Using <strong data-start="1471" data-end="1487">transactions</strong> groups multiple inserts into one commit.</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1530" data-end="2188"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">python</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-python"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">def</span> <span class="hljs-title function_">bulk_insert_with_transaction</span>(<span class="hljs-params">numbers</span>):
    conn = number_db.connect()
    <span class="hljs-keyword">try</span>:
        cursor = conn.cursor()
        cursor.execute(<span class="hljs-string">"START TRANSACTION;"</span>)
        
        sql = <span class="hljs-string">"""
        INSERT INTO numbers (number, total_factors, unique_factors)
        VALUES (%s, %s, %s)
        ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_factors = VALUES(total_factors), unique_factors = VALUES(unique_factors);
        """</span>
        
        cursor.executemany(sql, numbers)  <span class="hljs-comment"># Bulk insert</span>
        conn.commit()  <span class="hljs-comment"># Commit once</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">except</span> Exception <span class="hljs-keyword">as</span> e:
        conn.rollback()  <span class="hljs-comment"># Rollback on error</span>
        <span class="hljs-built_in">print</span>(<span class="hljs-string">f"Error: <span class="hljs-subst">{e}</span>"</span>)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">finally</span>:
        cursor.close()
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2189" data-end="2252"> <strong data-start="2191" data-end="2233">Avoids unnecessary disk writes per row</strong>  <strong data-start="2236" data-end="2252">10x speedup!</strong></p><hr data-start="2254" data-end="2257"><h2 data-start="2259" data-end="2331"><strong data-start="2262" data-end="2331"> 4. Increase <code data-start="2278" data-end="2310">innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit</code> for Faster Inserts</strong></h2><p data-start="2332" data-end="2487">If you're using <strong data-start="2348" data-end="2358">InnoDB</strong>, MySQL <strong data-start="2366" data-end="2411">flushes logs to disk on every transaction</strong>, which is slow.<br data-start="2427" data-end="2430">Change the setting temporarily to <strong data-start="2464" data-end="2486">reduce disk writes</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2489" data-end="2546"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SET</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">GLOBAL</span> innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">2</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="2547" data-end="2706"><li data-start="2547" data-end="2612"><strong data-start="2549" data-end="2566"><code data-start="2551" data-end="2554">1</code> (Default)</strong>  Slow, but safe (flushes on every commit).</li><li data-start="2613" data-end="2706"><strong data-start="2615" data-end="2651"><code data-start="2617" data-end="2620">2</code> (Faster, slightly less safe)</strong>  Flushes every second instead of every transaction.</li></ul><p data-start="2708" data-end="2745"> <strong data-start="2710" data-end="2744">Faster inserts, still reliable</strong>.</p><hr data-start="2747" data-end="2750"><h2 data-start="2752" data-end="2807"><strong data-start="2755" data-end="2807"> 5. Use <code data-start="2766" data-end="2784">LOAD DATA INFILE</code> for Massive Speedups</strong></h2><p data-start="2808" data-end="2890">For very large datasets, <strong data-start="2833" data-end="2860">directly loading a file</strong> is much faster than <code data-start="2881" data-end="2889">INSERT</code>.</p><h3 data-start="2892" data-end="2934"><strong data-start="2896" data-end="2934">1 Prepare Data File (<code data-start="2921" data-end="2931">data.txt</code>)</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2935" data-end="2966"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none"></div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre"><span>100,3,2
101,2,1
102,4,3
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2967" data-end="2993">(No headers, just values.)</p><h3 data-start="2995" data-end="3027"><strong data-start="2999" data-end="3027">2 Run This SQL Command</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="3028" data-end="3185"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>LOAD DATA INFILE <span class="hljs-string">'/path/to/data.txt'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">INTO</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> numbers
FIELDS TERMINATED <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> <span class="hljs-string">','</span>
LINES TERMINATED <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> <span class="hljs-string">'\n'</span>
(number, total_factors, unique_factors);
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="3186" data-end="3245"> <strong data-start="3188" data-end="3245">This is 10100x faster than bulk <code data-start="3223" data-end="3231">INSERT</code> statements!</strong></p><hr data-start="3247" data-end="3250"><h2 data-start="3252" data-end="3296"><strong data-start="3255" data-end="3296"> Summary: What You Should Try First</strong></h2><table data-start="3297" data-end="3824"><thead data-start="3297" data-end="3335"><tr data-start="3297" data-end="3335"><th data-start="3297" data-end="3312">Optimization</th><th data-start="3312" data-end="3322">Speedup</th><th data-start="3322" data-end="3335">Try If...</th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="3374" data-end="3824"><tr data-start="3374" data-end="3460"><td><strong data-start="3376" data-end="3409">Bulk Insert (<code data-start="3391" data-end="3406">executemany()</code>)</strong></td><td></td><td>You're inserting <strong data-start="3436" data-end="3458">100s1000s of rows</strong></td></tr><tr data-start="3461" data-end="3550"><td><strong data-start="3463" data-end="3499">Disable Indexes (<code data-start="3482" data-end="3496">DISABLE KEYS</code>)</strong></td><td></td><td>You're inserting <strong data-start="3528" data-end="3548">millions of rows</strong></td></tr><tr data-start="3551" data-end="3641"><td><strong data-start="3553" data-end="3590">Transaction (<code data-start="3568" data-end="3587">START TRANSACTION</code>)</strong></td><td></td><td>Inserts feel slow but are not CPU-bound</td></tr><tr data-start="3642" data-end="3737"><td><strong data-start="3644" data-end="3687">Change <code data-start="3653" data-end="3685">innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit</code></strong></td><td></td><td>Using <strong w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="133">Yes! You can <strong data-start="13" data-end="32">create an index</strong> on the <code data-start="40" data-end="63">(number_id, prime_id)</code> pair in the <code data-start="76" data-end="90">primefactors</code> table to <strong data-start="100" data-end="130">speed up lookups and joins</strong>.</p><hr data-start="135" data-end="138"><h2 data-start="140" data-end="185"><strong data-start="143" data-end="185"> Adding an Index to an Existing Table</strong></h2><p data-start="186" data-end="238">Run this SQL command to <strong data-start="210" data-end="235">add a composite index</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="239" data-end="324"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> primefactors <span class="hljs-keyword">ADD</span> INDEX idx_number_prime (number_id, prime_id);
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="325" data-end="401"> <strong data-start="327" data-end="399">Speeds up queries that filter or join on <code data-start="370" data-end="381">number_id</code> and <code data-start="386" data-end="396">prime_id</code>.</strong></p><hr data-start="403" data-end="406"><h2 data-start="408" data-end="450"><strong data-start="411" data-end="450"> Creating the Table with the Index</strong></h2><p data-start="451" data-end="539">If you're <strong data-start="461" data-end="496">creating the table from scratch</strong>, define the index inside <code data-start="522" data-end="536">CREATE TABLE</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="540" data-end="1089"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> primefactors (
    primefactor_id <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT <span class="hljs-keyword">PRIMARY</span> KEY,
    number_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>,
    prime_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>,
    exponent <span class="hljs-type">INT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>,
    <span class="hljs-keyword">UNIQUE</span> (number_id, prime_id),  <span class="hljs-comment">-- Ensures each (number_id, prime_id) pair is unique</span>
    INDEX idx_number_prime (number_id, prime_id),  <span class="hljs-comment">-- Index for faster lookups</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FOREIGN</span> KEY (number_id) <span class="hljs-keyword">REFERENCES</span> numbers(number_id) <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> CASCADE,
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FOREIGN</span> KEY (prime_id) <span class="hljs-keyword">REFERENCES</span> primes(prime_id) <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> CASCADE
);
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1090" data-end="1153"> <strong data-start="1092" data-end="1150">Faster joins and lookups on <code data-start="1122" data-end="1133">number_id</code> and <code data-start="1138" data-end="1148">prime_id</code></strong>.</p><hr data-start="1155" data-end="1158"><h2 data-start="1160" data-end="1197"><strong data-start="1163" data-end="1197"> Checking If </span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1295" data-end="1348"> <strong data-start="1297" data-end="1346">Verifies that <code data-start="1313" data-end="1331">idx_number_prime</code> was created.</strong></p><hr data-start="1350" data-end="1353"><h2 data-start="1355" data-end="1382"><strong data-start="1358" data-end="1382"> Performance Gains</strong></h2><table data-start="1383" text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="138d5bad-c1ff-4f9a-bbbb-609593693ecb" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="90">Yes! You can create a <strong data-start="22" data-end="30">VIEW</strong> in MySQL to store reusable <strong data-start="58" data-end="69">queries</strong> as virtual tables.</p><hr data-start="92" data-end="95"><h2 data-start="97" data-end="128"><strong data-start="100" data-end="128"> Creating a Simple View</strong></h2><p data-start="129" data-end="214">To create a view named <code data-start="152" data-end="171">prime_factor_view</code> showing <strong data-start="180" data-end="211">number, prime, and exponent</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="215" data-end="405"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">VIEW</span> prime_factor_view <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> n.number, p.prime, pf.exponent
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> primefactors pf
<span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> numbers n <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> primes p <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.prime_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> p.prime_id;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="406" data-end="455"> Now, you can <strong data-start="421" data-end="452">query the view like a table</strong>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="456" data-end="518"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> prime_factor_view <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> number <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">100</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><hr data-start="520" data-end="523"><h2 data-start="525" data-end="559"><strong data-start="528" data-end="559"> Updating an Existing View</strong></h2><p data-start="560" data-end="613">If you need to <strong data-start="575" data-end="585">change</strong> a view, use <code data-start="598" data-end="610">ALTER VIEW</code>:</p><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="614" data-end="817"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">ALTER</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">VIEW</span> prime_factor_view <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> n.number, p.prime, pf.exponent, pf.number_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> primefactors pf
<span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> numbers n <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> primes p <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.prime_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> p.prime_id;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="818" data-end="864"> <strong data-start="820" data-end="862">No need to drop and recreate the view!</strong></p><hr data-start="866" data-end="869"><h2 data-start="871" data-end="895"><strong data-start="874" data-end="895"> Deleting a View</strong></h2><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="896" data-end="945"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">DROP</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">VIEW</span> IF <span class="hljs-keyword">EXISTS</span> prime_factor_view;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="946" data-end="1007"> <strong data-start="948" data-end="1005">Removes the view without affecting underlying tables.</strong></p><hr data-start="1009" data-end="1012"><h2 data-start="1014" data-end="1049"><strong data-start="1017" data-end="1049"> Performance Considerations</strong></h2><ul data-start="1050" data-end="1236"><li data-start="1050" data-end="1108"><strong data-start="1052" data-end="1078">Views dont store data</strong>, they just <strong data-start="1090" data-end="1107">store queries</strong>.</li><li data-start="1109" data-end="1166"><strong data-start="1111" data-end="1143">Indexes on underlying tables</strong> still work with views.</li><li data-start="1167" data-end="1236"><strong data-start="1169" data-end="1208">Complex views can slow down queries</strong> if they include many joins.</li></ul><p data-start="1238" data-end="1319" data-is-last-node="">Would you like help creating <strong data-start="1267" data-end="1299">an indexed materialized view</strong> for performance? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex h-[30px] w-[30px] items-center focus-visible:outline-offset-[-4px]" dir="auto" data-testid="conversation-turn-183" data-scroll-anchor="false"><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="m-auto text-base py-[18px] px-6"><div class="mx-auto flex flex-1 gap-4 text-base md:gap-5 lg:gap-6 md:max-w-3xl lg:max-w-[40rem] xl:max-w-[48rem]"><div class="group/conversation-turn relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn @xs/thread:px-0 @sm/thread:px-1.5 @md/thread:px-4"><div class="flex-col gap-1 md:gap-3"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col flex-grow"><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="2e004c7a-e7cb-43dd-970d-86282cc321c9" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 whitespace-normal break-words text-start [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-4o"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose w-full break-words dark:prose-invert dark"><p data-start="0" data-end="141">MySQL <strong data-start="6" data-end="26">does not support</strong> materialized views natively, but you can <strong data-start="68" data-end="84">simulate one</strong> using a <strong data-start="93" data-end="113">table + triggers</strong> or <strong data-start="117" data-end="138">scheduled updates</strong>.</p><hr data-start="143" data-end="146"><h2 data-start="148" data-end="205"><strong data-start="151" data-end="205"> Creating a "Materialized View" for Prime Factors</strong></h2><h3 data-start="206" data-end="259"><strong data-start="210" data-end="259">Step 1: Create a Table to Store the View Data</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="260" data-end="485"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TABLE</span> prime_factor_materialized (
    number_id <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">PRIMARY</span> KEY,
    number <span class="hljs-type">BIGINT</span>(<span class="hljs-number">20</span>) UNSIGNED <span class="hljs-keyword">UNIQUE</span>,
    prime_factors TEXT <span class="hljs-keyword">NOT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">NULL</span>,
    INDEX idx_number (number)  <span class="hljs-comment">-- Speeds up lookups</span>
);
</span></code></div></div></pre><ul data-start="486" data-end="588"><li data-start="486" data-end="588"><strong data-start="488" data-end="507"><code data-start="490" data-end="505">prime_factors</code></strong> will store a <strong data-start="521" data-end="543">precomputed string</strong> like <code data-start="549" data-end="562">"2^3  5^2"</code> for <strong data-start="567" data-end="587">faster retrieval</strong>.</li></ul><hr data-start="590" data-end="593"><h3 data-start="595" data-end="639"><strong data-start="599" data-end="639">Step 2: Populate the Table Initially</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="640" data-end="979"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">INSERT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">INTO</span> prime_factor_materialized (number_id, number, prime_factors)
<span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> 
    n.number_id, 
    n.number, 
    GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(p.prime, <span class="hljs-string">'^'</span>, pf.exponent) SEPARATOR <span class="hljs-string">'  '</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> prime_factors
<span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> primefactors pf
<span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> numbers n <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> primes p <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.prime_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> p.prime_id
<span class="hljs-keyword">GROUP</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> n.number_id;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="980" data-end="1038"> <strong data-start="982" data-end="1036">Now you have a precomputed table for fast queries.</strong></p><hr data-start="1040" data-end="1043"><h3 data-start="1045" data-end="1106"><strong data-start="1049" data-end="1106">Step 3: Automatically Update the Table Using Triggers</strong></h3><p data-start="1107" data-end="1163">To <strong data-start="1110" data-end="1148">keep the materialized view updated</strong>, use triggers.</p><h4 data-start="1165" data-end="1209"><strong data-start="1170" data-end="1209"> When a new prime factor is added</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1210" data-end="1746"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>DELIMITER $$

<span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TRIGGER</span> after_primefactor_insert
AFTER <span class="hljs-keyword">INSERT</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> primefactors
<span class="hljs-keyword">FOR</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">EACH</span> <span class="hljs-type">ROW</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">BEGIN</span>
    REPLACE <span class="hljs-keyword">INTO</span> prime_factor_materialized (number_id, number, prime_factors)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> 
        n.number_id, 
        n.number, 
        GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(p.prime, <span class="hljs-string">'^'</span>, pf.exponent) SEPARATOR <span class="hljs-string">'  '</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> prime_factors
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> primefactors pf
    <span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> numbers n <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> primes p <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.prime_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> p.prime_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> n.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> NEW.number_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">GROUP</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> n.number_id;
<span class="hljs-keyword">END</span> $$

DELIMITER ;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="1747" data-end="1815"> <strong data-start="1749" data-end="1813">Keeps the table updated when new prime factors are inserted.</strong></p><hr data-start="1817" data-end="1820"><h4 data-start="1822" data-end="1864"><strong data-start="1827" data-end="1864"> When a prime factor is deleted</strong></h4><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="1865" data-end="2401"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span>DELIMITER $$

<span class="hljs-keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">TRIGGER</span> after_primefactor_delete
AFTER <span class="hljs-keyword">DELETE</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> primefactors
<span class="hljs-keyword">FOR</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">EACH</span> <span class="hljs-type">ROW</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">BEGIN</span>
    REPLACE <span class="hljs-keyword">INTO</span> prime_factor_materialized (number_id, number, prime_factors)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> 
        n.number_id, 
        n.number, 
        GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(p.prime, <span class="hljs-string">'^'</span>, pf.exponent) SEPARATOR <span class="hljs-string">'  '</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">AS</span> prime_factors
    <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> primefactors pf
    <span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> numbers n <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> n.number_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">JOIN</span> primes p <span class="hljs-keyword">ON</span> pf.prime_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> p.prime_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> n.number_id <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> OLD.number_id
    <span class="hljs-keyword">GROUP</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">BY</span> n.number_id;
<span class="hljs-keyword">END</span> $$

DELIMITER ;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2402" data-end="2474"> <strong data-start="2404" data-end="2472">Ensures deleted factors are removed from the materialized table.</strong></p><hr data-start="2476" data-end="2479"><h3 data-start="2481" data-end="2524"><strong data-start="2485" data-end="2524">Step 4: Query the Materialized View</strong></h3><pre class="!overflow-visible" data-start="2525" data-end="2595"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-md border-[0.5px] border-token-border-medium relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-gray-950"><div class="flex items-center text-token-text-secondary px-4 py-2 text-xs font-sans justify-between rounded-t-[5px] h-9 bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary select-none">sql</div><div class="sticky top-9 md:top-[5.75rem]"><div class="absolute bottom-0 right-2 flex h-9 items-center"><div class="flex items-center rounded bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary px-2 font-sans text-xs text-token-text-secondary dark:bg-token-main-surface-secondary"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="flex gap-1 items-center select-none py-1" aria-label="Copy"><svg width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="icon-sm"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M7 5C7 3.34315 8.34315 2 10 2H19C20.6569 2 22 3.34315 22 5V14C22 15.6569 20.6569 17 19 17H17V19C17 20.6569 15.6569 22 14 22H5C3.34315 22 2 20.6569 2 19V10C2 8.34315 3.34315 7 5 7H7V5ZM9 7H14C15.6569 7 17 8.34315 17 10V15H19C19.5523 15 20 14.5523 20 14V5C20 4.44772 19.5523 4 19 4H10C9.44772 4 9 4.44772 9 5V7ZM5 9C4.44772 9 4 9.44772 4 10V19C4 19.5523 4.44772 20 5 20H14C14.5523 20 15 19.5523 15 19V10C15 9.44772 14.5523 9 14 9H5Z" fill="currentColor"></path></svg>Copy code</button></span></div></div></div><div class="overflow-y-auto p-4" dir="ltr"><code class="!whitespace-pre language-sql"><span><span class="hljs-keyword">SELECT</span> <span class="hljs-operator">*</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">FROM</span> prime_factor_materialized <span class="hljs-keyword">WHERE</span> number <span class="hljs-operator">=</span> <span class="hljs-number">100</span>;
</span></code></div></div></pre><p data-start="2596" data-end="2650"> <strong data-start="2598" data-end="2648">Much faster than running the joins every time!</strong></p><hr data-start="2652" data-end="2655"><h2 data-start="2657" data-end="2699"><strong data-start="2660" data-end="2699"> Summary: What This Approach Does</strong></h2><table data-start="2700" data-end="3103"><thead data-start="2700" data-end="2762"><tr data-start="2700" data-end="2762"><th data-start="2700" data-end="2710">Feature</th><th data-start="2710" data-end="2729">Traditional View</th><th data-start="2729" data-end="2762">Materialized Table + Triggers</th></tr></thead><tbody data-start="2824" data-end="3103"><tr data-start="2824" data-end="2898"><td><strong data-start="2826" data-end="2835">Speed</strong></td><td> Slow (recalculates every query)</td><td> Fast (precomputed)</td></tr><tr data-start="2899" data-end="2958"><td><strong data-start="2901" data-end="2912">Indexes</strong></td><td> Not possible</td><td> Optimized with indexes</td></tr><tr data-start="2959" data-end="3022"><td><strong data-start="2961" data-end="2976">Auto-Update</strong></td><td> Always updated</td><td> Updated via triggers</td></tr><tr data-start="3023" data-end="3103"><td><strong data-start="3025" data-end="3040">Flexibility</strong></td><td> Can query any columns</td><td> Optimized for specific queries</td></tr></tbody></table><p data-start="3105" data-end="3179" data-is-last-node="">Would you like me to integrate this into your <strong data-start="3151" data-end="3175">Python database code</strong>? </p></div></div></div></div><div class="mb-2 flex gap-3 empty:hidden -ml-2"><div class="items-center justify-start rounded-xl p-1 z-10 -mt-1 bg-token-main-surface-primary screen-arch:mt-1 md:absolute md:sr-only"><div class="flex items-center"><span class="" data-state="closed"><button class="rounded-lg text-token-text-secondary hover:bg-token-main-surface-secondary" aria-label="Read aloud" data-testid="voice-play-turn-action-button"><span class="flex clip-rule="evenodd" d="M11 4.9099C11 4.47485 10.4828 4.24734 10.1621 4.54132L6.67572 7.7372C6.49129 7.90626 6.25019 8.00005 6 8.00005H4C3.44772 8.00005 3 8.44776 3 9.00005V15C3 15.5523 3.44772 16 4
