padding-top: 0px; will-change: auto;"><div class="z-0 flex w-full flex-col items-center"><div id="prosemirror-context-children"></div><div class="relative z-10 flex max-w-full h-fit" id="prosemirror-editor-container" style="padding-bottom: 1rem;"><div class="_main_5jn6z_1 z-10 markdown prose contain-inline-size dark:prose-invert focus:outline-none bg-transparent ProseMirror" contenteditable="false" style="width: 580px;" translate="no"><p><span>Conversation Log:</span></p><div contenteditable="false"><hr></div><p><span>User: I am trying to populate my database, but it has been VERY slow</span></p><p><span>Assistant: Got it! If your database population is very slow, here are some optimizations you can try to speed it up significantly:</span></p><ol data-spread="false" start="1"><li><p><span><strong>Use Bulk Inserts Instead of Single Inserts</strong></span></p></li><li><p><span><strong>Disable Indexes Before Bulk Insert</strong></span></p></li><li><p><span><strong>Wrap Inserts in a Single Transaction</strong></span></p></li><li><p><span><strong>Increase </strong></span><code><span><strong>innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit</strong></span></code><span><strong> for Faster Inserts</strong></span></p></li><li><p><span><strong>Use </strong></span><code><span><strong>LOAD DATA INFILE</strong></span></code><span><strong> for Massive Speedups</strong></span></p></li></ol><p><span>Would you like help implementing one of these in your Python script?</span></p><div contenteditable="false"><hr></div><p><span>User: Thank you! Can I make the (number_id, prime_id) pair an index in the primefactors table?</span></p><p><span>Assistant: Yes! You can create an index on the </span><code><span>(number_id, prime_id)</span></code><span> pair in the </span><code><span>primefactors</span></code><span> table to speed up lookups and joins.</span></p><div class="cm-editor 1 3 4 16 3o" data-is-code-block-view="true" contenteditable="false"><div class="cm-announced" aria-live="polite"></div><div tabindex="-1" class="cm-scroller"><div spellcheck="false" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" translate="no" contenteditable="true" class="cm-content" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true" data-language="sql" style="tab-size: 4;"><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">ALTER</span> <span class="17 b">TABLE</span> <span class="19">primefactors</span> <span class="17 b">ADD</span> <span class="19">INDEX</span> <span class="19">idx_number_prime</span> <span class="1e">(</span><span class="19">number_id</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">prime_id</span><span class="1e">)</span>;</div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-layer-above cm-cursorLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: 150; animation-duration: 1200ms;"><div class="cm-cursor cm-cursor-primary" style="left: 6px; top: 5px; height: 19px;"></div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-selectionLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: -2;"></div></div></div><p><span>Would you like help modifying your Python code to leverage this index efficiently?</span></p><div contenteditable="false"><hr></div><p><span>User: Can I make a view in MySQL?</span></p><p><span>Assistant: Yes! You can create a </span><span><strong>VIEW</strong></span><span> in MySQL to store reusable queries as virtual tables.</span></p><div class="cm-editor 1 3 4 16 3p" data-is-code-block-view="true" contenteditable="false"><div class="cm-announced" aria-live="polite"></div><div tabindex="-1" class="cm-scroller"><div spellcheck="false" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" translate="no" contenteditable="true" class="cm-content" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true" data-language="sql" style="tab-size: 4;"><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">CREATE</span> <span class="17 b">VIEW</span> <span class="19">prime_factor_view</span> <span class="17 b">AS</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">SELECT</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">p</span>.<span class="19">prime</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">exponent</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">FROM</span> <span class="19">primefactors</span> <span class="19">pf</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">JOIN</span> <span class="19">numbers</span> <span class="19">n</span> <span class="17 b">ON</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span> <span class="1e">=</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">JOIN</span> <span class="19">primes</span> <span class="19">p</span> <span class="17 b">ON</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">prime_id</span> <span class="1e">=</span> <span class="19">p</span>.<span class="19">prime_id</span>;</div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-layer-above cm-cursorLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: 150; animation-duration: 1200ms;"><div class="cm-cursor cm-cursor-primary" style="left: 6px; top: 5px; height: 19px;"></div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-selectionLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: -2;"></div></div></div><p><span>Would you like help creating an indexed materialized view for performance?</span></p><div contenteditable="false"><hr></div><p><span>User: Please</span></p><p><span>Assistant: MySQL does not support materialized views natively, but you can simulate one using a </span><span><strong>table + triggers</strong></span><span> or </span><span><strong>scheduled updates</strong></span><span>.</span></p><ol data-spread="false" start="1"><li><p><span><strong>Create a table to store precomputed data:</strong></span></p></li></ol><div class="cm-editor 1 3 4 16 3q" data-is-code-block-view="true" contenteditable="false"><div class="cm-announced" aria-live="polite"></div><div tabindex="-1" class="cm-scroller"><div spellcheck="false" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" translate="no" contenteditable="true" class="cm-content" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true" data-language="sql" style="tab-size: 4;"><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">CREATE</span> <span class="17 b">TABLE</span> <span class="19">prime_factor_materialized</span> <span class="1e">(</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="19">number_id</span> <span class="19">BIGINT</span><span class="1e">(</span><span class="1d d">20</span><span class="1e">)</span> <span class="19">UNSIGNED</span> <span class="17 b">PRIMARY</span> <span class="17 b">KEY</span><span class="1e">,</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="19">number</span> <span class="19">BIGINT</span><span class="1e">(</span><span class="1d d">20</span><span class="1e">)</span> <span class="19">UNSIGNED</span> <span class="17 b">UNIQUE</span><span class="1e">,</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="19">prime_factors</span> <span class="19">TEXT</span> <span class="17 b">NOT</span> <span class="17 b">NULL</span><span class="1e">,</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="19">INDEX</span> <span class="19">idx_number</span> <span class="1e">(</span><span class="19">number</span><span class="1e">)</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="1e">)</span>;</div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-layer-above cm-cursorLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: 150; animation-duration: 1200ms;"><div class="cm-cursor cm-cursor-primary" style="left: 6px; top: 5px; height: 19px;"></div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-selectionLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: -2;"></div></div></div><ol data-spread="false" start="2"><li><p><span><strong>Populate the table initially:</strong></span></p></li></ol><div class="cm-editor 1 3 4 16 3r" data-is-code-block-view="true" contenteditable="false"><div class="cm-announced" aria-live="polite"></div><div tabindex="-1" class="cm-scroller"><div spellcheck="false" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" translate="no" contenteditable="true" class="cm-content" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true" data-language="sql" style="tab-size: 4;"><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">INSERT</span> <span class="17 b">INTO</span> <span class="19">prime_factor_materialized</span> <span class="1e">(</span><span class="19">number_id</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">number</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">prime_factors</span><span class="1e">)</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">SELECT</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">GROUP_CONCAT</span><span class="1e">(</span><span class="19">CONCAT</span><span class="1e">(</span><span class="19">p</span>.<span class="19">prime</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="1g e">'^'</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">exponent</span><span class="1e">)</span> <span class="19">SEPARATOR</span> <span class="1g e">'  '</span><span class="1e">)</span> <span class="17 b">AS</span> <span class="19">prime_factors</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">FROM</span> <span class="19">primefactors</span> <span class="19">pf</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">JOIN</span> <span class="19">numbers</span> <span class="19">n</span> <span class="17 b">ON</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span> <span class="1e">=</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">JOIN</span> <span class="19">primes</span> <span class="19">p</span> <span class="17 b">ON</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">prime_id</span> <span class="1e">=</span> <span class="19">p</span>.<span class="19">prime_id</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">GROUP</span> <span class="17 b">BY</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span>;</div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-layer-above cm-cursorLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: 150; animation-duration: 1200ms;"><div class="cm-cursor cm-cursor-primary" style="left: 6px; top: 5px; height: 19px;"></div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-selectionLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: -2;"></div></div></div><ol data-spread="false" start="3"><li><p><span><strong>Use triggers to auto-update the materialized table:</strong></span></p></li></ol><p><span>When inserting:</span></p><div class="cm-editor 1 3 4 16 3s" data-is-code-block-view="true" contenteditable="false"><div class="cm-announced" aria-live="polite"></div><div tabindex="-1" class="cm-scroller"><div spellcheck="false" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" translate="no" contenteditable="true" class="cm-content" role="textbox" aria-multiline="true" data-language="sql" style="tab-size: 4;"><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">CREATE</span> <span class="17 b">TRIGGER</span> <span class="19">after_primefactor_insert</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">AFTER</span> <span class="17 b">INSERT</span> <span class="17 b">ON</span> <span class="19">primefactors</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">FOR</span> <span class="17 b">EACH</span> <span class="17 b">ROW</span></div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">BEGIN</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="19">REPLACE</span> <span class="17 b">INTO</span> <span class="19">prime_factor_materialized</span> <span class="1e">(</span><span class="19">number_id</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">number</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">prime_factors</span><span class="1e">)</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="17 b">SELECT</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">GROUP_CONCAT</span><span class="1e">(</span><span class="19">CONCAT</span><span class="1e">(</span><span class="19">p</span>.<span class="19">prime</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="1g e">'^'</span><span class="1e">,</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">exponent</span><span class="1e">)</span> <span class="19">SEPARATOR</span> <span class="1g e">'  '</span><span class="1e">)</span> <span class="17 b">AS</span> <span class="19">prime_factors</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="17 b">FROM</span> <span class="19">primefactors</span> <span class="19">pf</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="17 b">JOIN</span> <span class="19">numbers</span> <span class="19">n</span> <span class="17 b">ON</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span> <span class="1e">=</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="17 b">JOIN</span> <span class="19">primes</span> <span class="19">p</span> <span class="17 b">ON</span> <span class="19">pf</span>.<span class="19">prime_id</span> <span class="1e">=</span> <span class="19">p</span>.<span class="19">prime_id</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="17 b">WHERE</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span> <span class="1e">=</span> <span class="19">NEW</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span></div><div class="cm-line">    <span class="17 b">GROUP</span> <span class="17 b">BY</span> <span class="19">n</span>.<span class="19">number_id</span>;</div><div class="cm-line"><span class="17 b">END</span>;</div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-layer-above cm-cursorLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index: 150; animation-duration: 1200ms;"><div class="cm-cursor cm-cursor-primary" style="left: 6px; top: 5px; height: 19px;"></div></div><div class="cm-layer cm-selectionLayer" aria-hidden="true" style="z-index:
